engChrName: Ms. Flona wants to talk to you more...
engSearchText: Ms. Flona wants to talk to you more...
jpnChrName: ……フローナ先生、オジサンのことも とても大切そうにしてた……
jpnSearchText:
……フローナ先生、オジサンのことも
とても大切そうにしてた……

engChrName: ...and I want to, too.
engSearchText: ...and I want to, too.
jpnChrName: ……リンカ、もうすこし おはなししたいかも……
jpnSearchText:
……リンカ、もうすこし
おはなししたいかも……

engChrName: I dunno where Mommy went...
engSearchText: I dunno where Mommy went...
jpnChrName: ……リンカ、ママがどこいったか わからないけど……
jpnSearchText:
……リンカ、ママがどこいったか
わからないけど……

engChrName: But everyone here is really nice to me, and it's warm here. So I'm okay.
engSearchText:
But everyone here is really nice to me, and it's
warm here. So I'm okay.
jpnChrName: ここのみんなはやさしいし…… あたたかいから、ゲンキ、だよ？
jpnSearchText:
ここのみんなはやさしいし……
あたたかいから、ゲンキ、だよ？

engChrName: I can't wait, I can't WAIT!
engSearchText: I can't wait, I can't WAIT!
jpnChrName: うー！　すっごいたのしみっ！
jpnSearchText: うー！　すっごいたのしみっ！

engChrName: Are you guys excited? I sure am!
engSearchText: Are you guys excited? I sure am!
jpnChrName: おにーちゃんおねーちゃんも、 ゼッタイたのしみでしょ！？　でしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
おにーちゃんおねーちゃんも、
ゼッタイたのしみでしょ！？　でしょ！？

engChrName: Aww. I don't wanna sleep.
engSearchText: Aww. I don't wanna sleep.
jpnChrName: うーうー……ボク、まだねむくないよ？
jpnSearchText: うーうー……ボク、まだねむくないよ？

engChrName: Oh, you came back! Hey, hey! Let's play!
engSearchText: Oh, you came back! Hey, hey! Let's play!
jpnChrName: あ、おじしゃんまたきたの？ ねーねー！　あそぼーよ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、おじしゃんまたきたの？
ねーねー！　あそぼーよ！

engChrName: Stop flailing around, Todd. It's not safe, and Rinka's trying to sleep.
engSearchText:
Stop flailing around, Todd. It's not safe, and Rinka's
trying to sleep.
jpnChrName: おいトッド、あんまし動き回るなよ。 危ないしリンカはもうじき寝るんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
おいトッド、あんまし動き回るなよ。
危ないしリンカはもうじき寝るんだぜ？

engChrName: Come on over to the bed, and we can play some cards or something.
engSearchText:
Come on over to the bed, and we can play some cards
or something.
jpnChrName: ほら、カードゲームか何か相手してやるから さっさとベッドに来いよ？
jpnSearchText:
ほら、カードゲームか何か相手してやるから
さっさとベッドに来いよ？

engChrName: Who decided that we have to sleep when it's nighttime? That rule stinks!
engSearchText:
Who decided that we have to sleep when
it's nighttime? That rule stinks!
jpnChrName: なんでヨルはゼッタイねなきゃいけないのかな、 だれかがそうきめたのかな？
jpnSearchText:
なんでヨルはゼッタイねなきゃいけないのかな、
だれかがそうきめたのかな？

engChrName: There's lots of times when I wanna play at night!
engSearchText: There's lots of times when I wanna play at night!
jpnChrName: ボク、ヨルでもまだまだあそびたいとき イッパイあるよ！
jpnSearchText:
ボク、ヨルでもまだまだあそびたいとき
イッパイあるよ！

engChrName: Are you Ms. Flona's friends? Family?
engSearchText: Are you Ms. Flona's friends? Family?
jpnChrName: おじしゃんたち、センセーのトモダチ？ それともカゾク？
jpnSearchText:
おじしゃんたち、センセーのトモダチ？
それともカゾク？

engChrName: I dunno who you are, but I like you!
engSearchText: I dunno who you are, but I like you!
jpnChrName: わかんないけど、いろんなヒトがいて オモシロイよね！
jpnSearchText:
わかんないけど、いろんなヒトがいて
オモシロイよね！

engChrName: Let's play something! I love playing with new people!
engSearchText: Let's play something! I love playing with new people!
jpnChrName: ボクもいろんなヒトとイッショに あそんでみたいの！
jpnSearchText:
ボクもいろんなヒトとイッショに
あそんでみたいの！

engChrName: I wanna play in all kinds of places, but everyone says going somewhere by myself is dangerous.
engSearchText:
I wanna play in all kinds of places, but everyone says
going somewhere by myself is dangerous.
jpnChrName: ボク、もっといろんなところであそんで みたいけど、ミンナがあぶないっていうの。
jpnSearchText:
ボク、もっといろんなところであそんで
みたいけど、ミンナがあぶないっていうの。

engChrName: But Jean and Sophie take me to the market sometimes, so I love them!
engSearchText:
But Jean and Sophie take me to the market
sometimes, so I love them!
jpnChrName: でも、ジャンにーちゃんとソフィーねーちゃん、 たまにイチバとかつれてってくれるからだいすき！
jpnSearchText:
でも、ジャンにーちゃんとソフィーねーちゃん、
たまにイチバとかつれてってくれるからだいすき！

engChrName: One of our patrons asked if he could use our phone to contact the capital, and I happily lent it to him.
engSearchText:
One of our patrons asked if he could use our phone to
contact the capital, and I happily lent it to him.
jpnChrName: 首都方面に連絡したいとの事で こちらのお客様に通信機を貸していたのです。
jpnSearchText:
首都方面に連絡したいとの事で
こちらのお客様に通信機を貸していたのです。

engChrName: A state of emergency has been declared over there, so I understand his concern.
engSearchText:
A state of emergency has been declared over there, so
I understand his concern.
jpnChrName: あちらは非常事態宣言下にありますし 心配される気持ちもわかります……
jpnSearchText:
あちらは非常事態宣言下にありますし
心配される気持ちもわかります……

engChrName: Judging from his excitement, the news he received was positive. I'm happy for him.
engSearchText:
Judging from his excitement, the news he received
was positive. I'm happy for him.
jpnChrName: ですが良き知らせがあったようで なによりですね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが良き知らせがあったようで
なによりですね。

engChrName: Our establishment sometimes attracts a fair number of—let's say—unconventional patrons.
engSearchText:
Our establishment sometimes attracts a fair number
of—let's say—unconventional patrons.
jpnChrName: うちのホテルは、何気にアングラ感のある 人も結構いらっしゃる事もありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
うちのホテルは、何気にアングラ感のある
人も結構いらっしゃる事もありましてね。

engChrName: Though I suppose that comes with the territory. I've more than gotten used to it.
engSearchText:
Though I suppose that comes with the territory.
I've more than gotten used to it.
jpnChrName: まあ、こういう立地のホテルならではの事ですが、 慣れてしまえばどうという事も無いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、こういう立地のホテルならではの事ですが、
慣れてしまえばどうという事も無いですよ。

engChrName: We accept anyone who needs a place to rest.
engSearchText: We accept anyone who needs a place to rest.
jpnChrName: どんな人も受け入れる、休んでもらう…… そして深入りも詮索もしない。
jpnSearchText:
どんな人も受け入れる、休んでもらう……
そして深入りも詮索もしない。

engChrName: That's the owner's mantra.
engSearchText: That's the owner's mantra.
jpnChrName: それで結構何とかなるというのは、 オーナーの経験則だそうです。
jpnSearchText:
それで結構何とかなるというのは、
オーナーの経験則だそうです。

engChrName: Welcome. Are you here to book a room?
engSearchText: Welcome. Are you here to book a room?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、休んで行かれますか？
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃいませ、休んで行かれますか？

engChrName: Or would you like a drink? We have a bar down in the basement.
engSearchText:
Or would you like a drink? We have a bar down in
the basement.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルは地下にバーもありますし、 宿泊でなくともゆっくりできるかと。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルは地下にバーもありますし、
宿泊でなくともゆっくりできるかと。

engChrName: Oración is both a tourist destination and a transportation hub, so many travelers come here to rest.
engSearchText:
Oración is both a tourist destination and a
transportation hub, so many travelers come here
to rest.
jpnChrName: オラシオンは観光地であると共に交通の要衝でも ありますし、旅の人も休んでいかれるもので。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンは観光地であると共に交通の要衝でも
ありますし、旅の人も休んでいかれるもので。

engChrName: Our hotel is valued among those who go on long journeys.
engSearchText:
Our hotel is valued among those who go on
long journeys.
jpnChrName: うちのホテルは、長旅の人にも 重宝していただいているようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
うちのホテルは、長旅の人にも
重宝していただいているようで何よりです。

engChrName: I've been running this hotel for a long time now, so I've met people of all walks of life.
engSearchText:
I've been running this hotel for a long time now, so
I've met people of all walks of life.
jpnChrName: ホテルの経営をしつつ酒場をやって長くなるが、 色々な人が往来する立地だからかね。
jpnSearchText:
ホテルの経営をしつつ酒場をやって長くなるが、
色々な人が往来する立地だからかね。

engChrName: Travelers of every background come here to rest.
engSearchText: Travelers of every background come here to rest.
jpnChrName: ま、何かと慣れてくるものさ、 訳ありな客にもね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何かと慣れてくるものさ、
訳ありな客にもね。

engChrName: ...I heard the Creil Village inn was similar in that regard.
engSearchText:
...I heard the Creil Village inn was similar in
that regard.
jpnChrName: ……それこそ、先日犠牲になった村の 宿屋もそんな感じだったと聞くしな。
jpnSearchText:
……それこそ、先日犠牲になった村の
宿屋もそんな感じだったと聞くしな。

engChrName: This city's got people of all types. And when I mean all types, I mean ALL types.
engSearchText:
This city's got people of all types. And when I mean
all types, I mean ALL types.
jpnChrName: ま、この街も結構色々な人が来る。 多少の事では驚かんさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、この街も結構色々な人が来る。
多少の事では驚かんさ。

engChrName: Nothing really fazes me anymore.
engSearchText: Nothing really fazes me anymore.
jpnChrName: 遠慮は要らんよ、好きに休んでいくが良い。
jpnSearchText: 遠慮は要らんよ、好きに休んでいくが良い。

engChrName: Welcome to Corazón. I more or less run this joint.
engSearchText: Welcome to Corazón. I more or less run this joint.
jpnChrName: 《コラソン》へようこそ。 フフ、一応私がここの経営者でね。
jpnSearchText:
《コラソン》へようこそ。
フフ、一応私がここの経営者でね。

engChrName: I've got a lot of the good stuff here.
engSearchText: I've got a lot of the good stuff here.
jpnChrName: 個人的な趣味もあって このバーにもイイ酒を揃えているのさ。
jpnSearchText:
個人的な趣味もあって
このバーにもイイ酒を揃えているのさ。

engChrName: We also serve nonalcoholic beverages, so you're all welcome here.
engSearchText:
We also serve nonalcoholic beverages, so you're all
welcome here.
jpnChrName: 未成年にはノンアルコールもお出ししよう。 どうか寛いで行ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
未成年にはノンアルコールもお出ししよう。
どうか寛いで行ってくれ。

engChrName: I just finished discussing future plans with a business partner in the capital. Their response was better than I could've hoped.
engSearchText:
I just finished discussing future plans with a business
partner in the capital. Their response was better than
I could've hoped.
jpnChrName: 首都の取引先と今後の予定を話し合って いたんだが、頼もしい話も聞けてね。
jpnSearchText:
首都の取引先と今後の予定を話し合って
いたんだが、頼もしい話も聞けてね。

engChrName: Apparently, Leman's strongest bracer is off to Edith!
engSearchText: Apparently, Leman's strongest bracer is off to Edith!
jpnChrName: 何でも、レマンでは有名なあの遊撃士が イーディスに行っているらしいな……！
jpnSearchText:
何でも、レマンでは有名なあの遊撃士が
イーディスに行っているらしいな……！

engChrName: People say they have the strength of one hundred men.
engSearchText:
People say they have the strength of one
hundred men.
jpnChrName: 私も後から知ったが……何にせよ、 あの人がいるのなら百人力だ……！
jpnSearchText:
私も後から知ったが……何にせよ、
あの人がいるのなら百人力だ……！

engChrName: I'm sure they will turn things around. They'll do us Lemanians proud!
engSearchText:
I'm sure they will turn things around. They'll do us
Lemanians proud!
jpnChrName: 必ずや事態の収束に寄与してくれると、 レマンの一市民として言わせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
必ずや事態の収束に寄与してくれると、
レマンの一市民として言わせてもらおう。

engChrName: I wasn't feeling so hot, so I thought I'd drop by the bar and drink away my sorrows.
engSearchText:
I wasn't feeling so hot, so I thought I'd drop by the
bar and drink away my sorrows.
jpnChrName: 気分が暗くなってきたし、地下のバーで 気晴らしに一杯と思ったのだが……
jpnSearchText:
気分が暗くなってきたし、地下のバーで
気晴らしに一杯と思ったのだが……

engChrName: But when I tried to go in, I felt a cold chill... My body was screaming, 'DANGER! Don't go in there!'
engSearchText:
But when I tried to go in, I felt a cold chill... My body
was screaming, 'DANGER! Don't go in there!'
jpnChrName: 何だろうな……入ろうとしたら言葉に できない悪寒というか、嫌な感じが……
jpnSearchText:
何だろうな……入ろうとしたら言葉に
できない悪寒というか、嫌な感じが……

engChrName: I think I'm going to heed its advice and return to my room.
engSearchText:
I think I'm going to heed its advice and return to
my room.
jpnChrName: 行かない方が良さそうだし……今夜は さっさと寝て気分を変える他無さそうだ……
jpnSearchText:
行かない方が良さそうだし……今夜は
さっさと寝て気分を変える他無さそうだ……

engChrName: I'm here on business from Leman. Everyone here's pretty down due to the news of the tragedy, and I can't say I blame them.
engSearchText:
I'm here on business from Leman. Everyone here's
pretty down due to the news of the tragedy, and I
can't say I blame them.
jpnChrName: レマンから商談で来ていたのだが…… あんな惨劇の話を聞くことになるとはな……
jpnSearchText:
レマンから商談で来ていたのだが……
あんな惨劇の話を聞くことになるとはな……

engChrName: I'm not sure how many people died, but it must've been a lot...
engSearchText:
I'm not sure how many people died, but it must've
been a lot...
jpnChrName: 詳しい事は分からないが……村一つが犠牲に なったという事は、相当な人命が……
jpnSearchText:
詳しい事は分からないが……村一つが犠牲に
なったという事は、相当な人命が……

engChrName: I'd rather not know anything else. Just listening to the news sent a chill down my spine.
engSearchText:
I'd rather not know anything else. Just listening to the
news sent a chill down my spine.
jpnChrName: 続報を聞くのも怖いな……ニュースを 聞くだけで背筋が凍るよ。
jpnSearchText:
続報を聞くのも怖いな……ニュースを
聞くだけで背筋が凍るよ。

engChrName: The capital's on lockdown now, so I'm going to have to wait here for a while.
engSearchText:
The capital's on lockdown now, so I'm going to have
to wait here for a while.
jpnChrName: 首都も封鎖されているとなると当分、 私も待機する他無さそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
首都も封鎖されているとなると当分、
私も待機する他無さそうだが……

engChrName: I wonder what's going to happen... I remember the Republic fell into panic and chaos during those terrorist attacks a few years ago.
engSearchText:
I wonder what's going to happen... I remember the
Republic fell into panic and chaos during those
terrorist attacks a few years ago.
jpnChrName: 今後どうなるんだろうな、数年前にテロが 頻発してた時も、共和国は恐慌に陥ったが……
jpnSearchText:
今後どうなるんだろうな、数年前にテロが
頻発してた時も、共和国は恐慌に陥ったが……

engChrName: Business was good this month. I think I'll splurge on some good wine to celebrate.
engSearchText:
Business was good this month. I think I'll splurge on
some good wine to celebrate.
jpnChrName: ふむ、今月も良い取引ができたし 上等なワインをたんまり買えそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、今月も良い取引ができたし
上等なワインをたんまり買えそうだ。

engChrName: I should consider stocking up on it. Profits may be down next month, depending on what the Republic's situation is going forward.
engSearchText:
I should consider stocking up on it. Profits may be
down next month, depending on what the Republic's
situation is going forward.
jpnChrName: 今後の共和国の状況次第じゃ来月の収入も減るしな、 今のうちにワインは蓄えておきたいもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今後の共和国の状況次第じゃ来月の収入も減るしな、
今のうちにワインは蓄えておきたいもんだ。

engChrName: How can I be expected to make it through the end of the year without my wine?
engSearchText:
How can I be expected to make it through the end of
the year without my wine?
jpnChrName: こういう時じゃ、一層ワインが無きゃ 年末もやっていられないってもんだしな……
jpnSearchText:
こういう時じゃ、一層ワインが無きゃ
年末もやっていられないってもんだしな……

engChrName: I'm sure Filenkov will enjoy his time in the free cities, but I have no idea how he plans to get back to Edith in time for the festival.
engSearchText:
I'm sure Filenkov will enjoy his time in the free cities,
but I have no idea how he plans to get back to Edith
in time for the festival.
jpnChrName: しかしフィレンコフを自由都市圏に送り出すのは 良いがあいつ、いつ首都に帰るつもりだか。
jpnSearchText:
しかしフィレンコフを自由都市圏に送り出すのは
良いがあいつ、いつ首都に帰るつもりだか。

engChrName: It'll be hard for him to get home after leaving the country, given the current situation.
engSearchText:
It'll be hard for him to get home after leaving the
country, given the current situation.
jpnChrName: 記念祭には息子達に顔を見せたいそうだが…… この状況じゃ一回出国したら帰りにくそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭には息子達に顔を見せたいそうだが……
この状況じゃ一回出国したら帰りにくそうだが。

engChrName: Guess I'll just have to do what I can to see that it happens.
engSearchText:
Guess I'll just have to do what I can to see that
it happens.
jpnChrName: ま……馴染みとして出来る範囲で せいぜい計らってやるか。
jpnSearchText:
ま……馴染みとして出来る範囲で
せいぜい計らってやるか。

engChrName: The man said he was gonna hit up the weapons shop in the Quincy Department Store.
engSearchText:
The man said he was gonna hit up the weapons shop
in the Quincy Department Store.
jpnChrName: スーツの男が『次はクインシー百貨店の 武器屋に用事がある』とか何とか言ってたな。
jpnSearchText:
スーツの男が『次はクインシー百貨店の
武器屋に用事がある』とか何とか言ってたな。

engChrName: That officer was pursuing him just like you guys.
engSearchText: That officer was pursuing him just like you guys.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、婦警の方もアンタらと同じく 男の行方を追っているようでな……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、婦警の方もアンタらと同じく
男の行方を追っているようでな……

engChrName: So I told her where he was headed.
engSearchText: So I told her where he was headed.
jpnChrName: 婦警にも同じように男の行く先を教えてやったよ。
jpnSearchText: 婦警にも同じように男の行く先を教えてやったよ。

engChrName: If you're going after him, be careful.
engSearchText: If you're going after him, be careful.
jpnChrName: 追いかけるなら、せいぜい気を付けるこった。
jpnSearchText: 追いかけるなら、せいぜい気を付けるこった。

engChrName: Ungern will be delivering export to the free cities, so that's a huge weight off my shoulders.
engSearchText:
Ungern will be delivering export to the free cities, so
that's a huge weight off my shoulders.
jpnChrName: さて、今月もウンゲルンが自由都市圏方面への 輸出を引き受けてくれて助かったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今月もウンゲルンが自由都市圏方面への
輸出を引き受けてくれて助かったもんだ。

engChrName: Relics from the old kingdom are in high demand outside Calvard. Selling them there is always worth the trouble.
engSearchText:
Relics from the old kingdom are in high demand
outside Calvard. Selling them there is always worth
the trouble.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの旧王国時代の遺物は外国の好事家にも 人気だしな、多少の手間をかける価値はある。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの旧王国時代の遺物は外国の好事家にも
人気だしな、多少の手間をかける価値はある。

engChrName: I asked him to bring Filenkov along for the trip. Hopefully I'll be hearing good news come next month.
engSearchText:
I asked him to bring Filenkov along for the trip.
Hopefully I'll be hearing good news come
next month.
jpnChrName: 今回はフィレンコフの同行も頼んだことだし、 来月に何か良い話を持ってくる事でも期待するか。
jpnSearchText:
今回はフィレンコフの同行も頼んだことだし、
来月に何か良い話を持ってくる事でも期待するか。

engChrName: You guys looking for precious goods? Then I'm your man.
engSearchText:
You guys looking for precious goods? Then I'm
your man.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あんたらも何か貴重な品の取引かね、 それならば力になるとしようじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あんたらも何か貴重な品の取引かね、
それならば力になるとしようじゃないか。

engChrName: Antiques from the old kingdom get dug up fairly often around here. Selling those to collectors is my job.
engSearchText:
Antiques from the old kingdom get dug up fairly
often around here. Selling those to collectors is
my job.
jpnChrName: この地は旧王国時代の骨董品もよく掘り出される、 それらを好事家の人らに売るのも俺の生業さ。
jpnSearchText:
この地は旧王国時代の骨董品もよく掘り出される、
それらを好事家の人らに売るのも俺の生業さ。

engChrName: Filenkov's specialty is in mechanics, but he has an eye for these things. We like to scratch each other's backs every now and then.
engSearchText:
Filenkov's specialty is in mechanics, but he has an eye
for these things. We like to scratch each other's backs
every now and then.
jpnChrName: フィレンコフも本来の専門は機械系とはいえ 目利きは確かだから、お互い世話になるものさ。
jpnSearchText:
フィレンコフも本来の専門は機械系とはいえ
目利きは確かだから、お互い世話になるものさ。

engChrName: You can't deny a partnership would be mutually beneficial in our current situation.
engSearchText:
You can't deny a partnership would be mutually
beneficial in our current situation.
jpnChrName: フフ、事ここに至っては 我々も手を取り合うべきかと──
jpnSearchText:
フフ、事ここに至っては
我々も手を取り合うべきかと──

engChrName: Why not give it some thought? I'll even try to forget the fact that you crushed many of our businesses if you agree.
engSearchText:
Why not give it some thought? I'll even try to forget
the fact that you crushed many of our businesses if
you agree.
jpnChrName: そちらに過去、我々のビジネスをいくつも 潰された事はひとまず水に流すとして。
jpnSearchText:
そちらに過去、我々のビジネスをいくつも
潰された事はひとまず水に流すとして。

engChrName: Someone's holding a grudge. Listen, I was just doin' my job...
engSearchText:
Someone's holding a grudge. Listen, I was just doin'
my job...
jpnChrName: って思いっきり根に持ってるな。 俺は仕事をしただけなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
って思いっきり根に持ってるな。
俺は仕事をしただけなんだが……

engChrName: Ahaha. Well, why don't we just settle for exchanging info for the time being?
engSearchText:
Ahaha. Well, why don't we just settle for exchanging
info for the time being?
jpnChrName: あはは……ひとまず動きようも ありませんし、情報交換でも……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ひとまず動きようも
ありませんし、情報交換でも……

engChrName: Never thought I'd be sharin' a drink with the two of you.
engSearchText:
Never thought I'd be sharin' a drink with the two
of you.
jpnChrName: しかしなんだ、お前さん達と こうして飲む事になるとはなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしなんだ、お前さん達と
こうして飲む事になるとはなぁ。

engChrName: Agreed. The last time this happened was during Operation Mille Mirage—though things were quite tense at the time.
engSearchText:
Agreed. The last time this happened was during
Operation Mille Mirage—though things were quite
tense at the time.
jpnChrName: ええ……“千の陽炎作戦”以来でしょうか。 あの時も緊迫した状況でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……“千の陽炎作戦”以来でしょうか。
あの時も緊迫した状況でしたが……

engChrName: Every crisis brings opportunity. What say we join hands and work to overcome this predicament together?
engSearchText:
Every crisis brings opportunity. What say we join
hands and work to overcome this
predicament together?
jpnChrName: フフ、ピンチはチャンスと申しますし 是非ここは手を取り合って打開策を──
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ピンチはチャンスと申しますし
是非ここは手を取り合って打開策を──

engChrName: Pass. I'd rather not make a deal with the devil.
engSearchText: Pass. I'd rather not make a deal with the devil.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、お前さんが見てるのは 黒月の利益だけだからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、お前さんが見てるのは
黒月の利益だけだからなぁ。

engChrName: (My, this is quite the unusual gathering.)
engSearchText: (My, this is quite the unusual gathering.)
jpnChrName: （これはまた意外な組み合わせですが……）
jpnSearchText: （これはまた意外な組み合わせですが……）

engChrName: (You said it. The guild and Heiyue are constantly at each other's throats, but I guess there's not much reason for them to fight now.)
engSearchText:
(You said it. The guild and Heiyue are constantly at
each other's throats, but I guess there's not much
reason for them to fight now.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、ギルドと黒月は犬猿の仲だが   お互い手持ち無沙汰みてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、ギルドと黒月は犬猿の仲だが
お互い手持ち無沙汰みてえだな。）

engChrName: (Huh. This is my first time seein' Yin in casual clothes. She looks nice.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. This is my first time seein' Yin in
casual clothes. She looks nice.)
jpnChrName: （それにしても……《銀》は私服か。   初めて見るが……）
jpnSearchText:
（それにしても……《銀》は私服か。
初めて見るが……）

engChrName: (Hey, quit staring at her, you creep!)
engSearchText: (Hey, quit staring at her, you creep!)
jpnChrName: （ってあんた……！　瀑布であたしの裸を   見ただけでは飽き足らず……）
jpnSearchText:
（ってあんた……！　瀑布であたしの裸を
見ただけでは飽き足らず……）

engChrName: (You lost the right to look at other women after what happened in Longlai!)
engSearchText:
(You lost the right to look at other women after what
happened in Longlai!)
jpnChrName: （あたしのライバルまで変な目で……！   サイッテー！！）
jpnSearchText:
（あたしのライバルまで変な目で……！
サイッテー！！）

engChrName: (I wasn't staring, damn it! And stop holding that over my head!)
engSearchText:
(I wasn't staring, damn it! And stop holding that over
my head!)
jpnChrName: （違ぇわ！　変に取るんじゃねえっつの！！）
jpnSearchText: （違ぇわ！　変に取るんじゃねえっつの！！）

engChrName: The last time I got to work with Rixia was a year and a half ago.
engSearchText:
The last time I got to work with Rixia was a year and
a half ago.
jpnChrName: 《銀（リーシャ）》と共闘したのは、“黄昏”と “再事変”くらいにはなるけど……
jpnSearchText:
《銀（リーシャ）》と共闘したのは、“黄昏”と
“再事変”くらいにはなるけど……

engChrName: She's pretty familiar with the members of my class, so there's lots for us to talk about.
engSearchText:
She's pretty familiar with the members of my class, so
there's lots for us to talk about.
jpnChrName: 《トールズⅦ組》との縁はそれなりにあるし 積もる話もあってね。
jpnSearchText:
《トールズⅦ組》との縁はそれなりにあるし
積もる話もあってね。

engChrName: When we get the chance, I'll tell you all about them, too, Feri.
engSearchText:
When we get the chance, I'll tell you all about them,
too, Feri.
jpnChrName: また機会があったら話してあげる。 そっちもしっかりね。
jpnSearchText:
また機会があったら話してあげる。
そっちもしっかりね。

engChrName: Oh, hey, you guys.
engSearchText: Oh, hey, you guys.
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンにフェリ達……
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンにフェリ達……

engChrName: It's good to see you again, Judith.
engSearchText: It's good to see you again, Judith.
jpnChrName: それに……ジュディス。
jpnSearchText: それに……ジュディス。

engChrName: What the hell are you two doing together?
engSearchText: What the hell are you two doing together?
jpnChrName: おいおい、帝国のＢ級と《銀》が 何してやがるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、帝国のＢ級と《銀》が
何してやがるんだ？

engChrName: They're catchin' up, of course. They fought side by side together back in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
They're catchin' up, of course. They fought side by
side together back in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: あー、確かクロスベルやら帝国やらの 事件で共闘した仲なんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
あー、確かクロスベルやら帝国やらの
事件で共闘した仲なんだったか？

engChrName: You've sure met a lot of good people since you moved there.
engSearchText:
You've sure met a lot of good people since you
moved there.
jpnChrName: その辺りのきっかけで、あんたが 拠点をクロスベルに移したのよね……
jpnSearchText:
その辺りのきっかけで、あんたが
拠点をクロスベルに移したのよね……

engChrName: Yes. Although my reasons for moving there were self-indulgent, a lot of good came from that decision.
engSearchText:
Yes. Although my reasons for moving there were
self-indulgent, a lot of good came from that decision.
jpnChrName: ええ、まあ…… 結局は私の我儘のようなものだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まあ……
結局は私の我儘のようなものだけど。

engChrName: Including meeting the members of Thors' Class VII.
engSearchText: Including meeting the members of Thors' Class VII.
jpnChrName: でも後悔はしてないかな。 《トールズⅦ組》と知り合えた事も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
でも後悔はしてないかな。
《トールズⅦ組》と知り合えた事も含めて。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Weren't they the people who put a stop to the Great Twilight?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Weren't they the people who put a stop to
the Great Twilight?
jpnChrName: トールズⅦ組……帝国の“黄昏”を 止めたという人たちですね！
jpnSearchText:
トールズⅦ組……帝国の“黄昏”を
止めたという人たちですね！

engChrName: Yup, and I was one of them.
engSearchText: Yup, and I was one of them.
jpnChrName: ん、裏でもそれなりに 有名になっちゃったかな。
jpnSearchText:
ん、裏でもそれなりに
有名になっちゃったかな。

engChrName: If you'd like, I can tell you more about my classmates someday. Lots to talk about with them.
engSearchText:
If you'd like, I can tell you more about my
classmates someday. Lots to talk about with them.
jpnChrName: わたしも出身だけど、色んな人がいるよ。 また機会があったら話してあげる。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも出身だけど、色んな人がいるよ。
また機会があったら話してあげる。

engChrName: That sounds great! Let's do that!
engSearchText: That sounds great! Let's do that!
jpnChrName: えへへ、楽しみにしてますっ！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、楽しみにしてますっ！

engChrName: (But in order for them to have that opportunity...)
engSearchText: (But in order for them to have that opportunity...)
jpnChrName: （そんな機会を持つためにも──）
jpnSearchText: （そんな機会を持つためにも──）

engChrName: (...we have to put a stop to Almata's scheme!)
engSearchText: (...we have to put a stop to Almata's scheme!)
jpnChrName: （ええ、必ずアルマータを   止めてみせるわよっ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、必ずアルマータを
止めてみせるわよっ！！）

engChrName: The Ikaruga jaegers are Easterners like me and the people from Heiyue, but their roots are different from ours.
engSearchText:
The Ikaruga jaegers are Easterners like me and the
people from Heiyue, but their roots are different
from ours.
jpnChrName: 斑鳩……同じ東方系でもあたしや黒月みたいな、 煌都の住人とはルーツが違うって話。
jpnSearchText:
斑鳩……同じ東方系でもあたしや黒月みたいな、
煌都の住人とはルーツが違うって話。

engChrName: Kazan, on the other hand, bears a closer resemblance to them.
engSearchText:
Kazan, on the other hand, bears a closer resemblance
to them.
jpnChrName: このカザンの方が、 むしろ連中に比較的近いっぽいね？
jpnSearchText:
このカザンの方が、
むしろ連中に比較的近いっぽいね？

engChrName: Evidently, they're the strongest corps in the East, and we're competing with them in a death game...
engSearchText:
Evidently, they're the strongest corps in the East, and
we're competing with them in a death game...
jpnChrName: 何にせよ……奴らは東方最強、そんな連中 相手にギルドがデスゲームだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ……奴らは東方最強、そんな連中
相手にギルドがデスゲームだなんて……

engChrName: It's not that I don't believe in Zin and Elaine—I know they'll kick their butts. However, I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried...
engSearchText:
It's not that I don't believe in Zin and Elaine—I
know they'll kick their butts. However, I'd be lying if
I said I wasn't worried...
jpnChrName: ジンさんやエレインさん達は信じてるけど 流石に心配ね……
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんやエレインさん達は信じてるけど
流石に心配ね……

engChrName: Evidently, they're the strongest corps in the East, and now they're competing in a death game...
engSearchText:
Evidently, they're the strongest corps in the East, and
now they're competing in a death game...
jpnChrName: 何にせよ……奴らは東方最強、そんな連中が このデスゲームに参加しているとなると……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ……奴らは東方最強、そんな連中が
このデスゲームに参加しているとなると……

engChrName: The guild might've dropped out, but that doesn't mean they couldn't still attack us!
engSearchText:
The guild might've dropped out, but that doesn't
mean they couldn't still attack us!
jpnChrName: ギルド（ウチ）は脱落したとはいえ、結社共々 警戒しておくに越した事は無いね……！
jpnSearchText:
ギルド（ウチ）は脱落したとはいえ、結社共々
警戒しておくに越した事は無いね……！

engChrName: Is Ikaruga really that strong?
engSearchText: Is Ikaruga really that strong?
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりその《斑鳩》って猟兵団、 そこまで手強いね？
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりその《斑鳩》って猟兵団、
そこまで手強いね？

engChrName: They are. I heard some nasty things about them back in the East.
engSearchText:
They are. I heard some nasty things about them back
in the East.
jpnChrName: ああ、東にいた時からヤバい話は いくつも聞いている……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、東にいた時からヤバい話は
いくつも聞いている……

engChrName: As it happens, a few people from my village ended up becoming jaegers like them.
engSearchText:
As it happens, a few people from my village ended up
becoming jaegers like them.
jpnChrName: 俺の里からも、猟兵になった奴は いくらかいたが……
jpnSearchText:
俺の里からも、猟兵になった奴は
いくらかいたが……

engChrName: If even half the stories they've told me are true, then I can believe they're the strongest corps.
engSearchText:
If even half the stories they've told me are true, then I
can believe they're the strongest corps.
jpnChrName: そいつら伝手で聞く限りでも、連中が 最強ってのは大袈裟でも何でもねぇよ……
jpnSearchText:
そいつら伝手で聞く限りでも、連中が
最強ってのは大袈裟でも何でもねぇよ……

engChrName: Wow. It's rare to see you give such a serious assessment.
engSearchText:
Wow. It's rare to see you give such a
serious assessment.
jpnChrName: ……お調子者のアンタに そこまで言わせるとはね……
jpnSearchText:
……お調子者のアンタに
そこまで言わせるとはね……

engChrName: Now you've got me worried. I hope they don't end up crossing paths with Zin's team.
engSearchText:
Now you've got me worried. I hope they don't end up
crossing paths with Zin's team.
jpnChrName: ジンさん達がかち合う事にならないか 本当に心配ね……！
jpnSearchText:
ジンさん達がかち合う事にならないか
本当に心配ね……！

engChrName: I'm really worried about how this death game is going to turn out.
engSearchText:
I'm really worried about how this death game is going
to turn out.
jpnChrName: このデスゲームがどうなるか 本当に心配ね……！
jpnSearchText:
このデスゲームがどうなるか
本当に心配ね……！

engChrName: Hopefully it'll all end okay. I'm still surprised they even bothered coming all the way out here.
engSearchText:
Hopefully it'll all end okay. I'm still surprised they
even bothered coming all the way out here.
jpnChrName: ああ、全くだぜ。 まさか西方に来てまで連中と出くわすとは……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、全くだぜ。
まさか西方に来てまで連中と出くわすとは……

engChrName: Wait a minute. Is it possible that thing I sensed in Longlai was... No, I shouldn't be thinking about this.
engSearchText:
Wait a minute. Is it possible that thing I sensed in
Longlai was... No, I shouldn't be thinking about this.
jpnChrName: 思えば龍來で感じたあの気配も…… いや、一旦考えないでおいた方が良いか……
jpnSearchText:
思えば龍來で感じたあの気配も……
いや、一旦考えないでおいた方が良いか……

engChrName: Of all the Eastern jaeger corps that could've come here, it just had to be Ikaruga. This sucks big time.
engSearchText:
Of all the Eastern jaeger corps that could've come
here, it just had to be Ikaruga. This sucks big time.
jpnChrName: よりにもよって東方系の猟兵団で来てんのが 斑鳩かよ……マジでシャレにならねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
よりにもよって東方系の猟兵団で来てんのが
斑鳩かよ……マジでシャレにならねぇ……

engChrName: What are they even after? Why come all the way out here?
engSearchText:
What are they even after? Why come all the way
out here?
jpnChrName: それにしても……連中の狙いは一体何なんだ？ わざわざこんな地まで出向いて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……連中の狙いは一体何なんだ？
わざわざこんな地まで出向いて……

engChrName: Even considering their activities in Longlai, I... Urgh, what's going on?
engSearchText:
Even considering their activities in Longlai, I...
Urgh, what's going on?
jpnChrName: ──やっぱり、龍來近辺の動きと併せて 考えても……くっ、どうなってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
──やっぱり、龍來近辺の動きと併せて
考えても……くっ、どうなってやがる。

engChrName: As they say, the pen is mightier than the sword.
engSearchText: As they say, the pen is mightier than the sword.
jpnChrName: 記者としてできるのは、情報の力で 現状を打破する事……ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
記者としてできるのは、情報の力で
現状を打破する事……ですよね。

engChrName: The local journalists and I can fight using the power of words! We can do this!
engSearchText:
The local journalists and I can fight using the power
of words! We can do this!
jpnChrName: 現地の記者さんも……どうやら、その根っこの 部分だけは共感してくれそうですし、何とか……！
jpnSearchText:
現地の記者さんも……どうやら、その根っこの
部分だけは共感してくれそうですし、何とか……！

engChrName: There has to be something I can do.
engSearchText: There has to be something I can do.
jpnChrName: どんな異常な状況でも、記者として できる事は何かしらあるはず……
jpnSearchText:
どんな異常な状況でも、記者として
できる事は何かしらあるはず……

engChrName: If Dingo were here, he would never ever give up!
engSearchText: If Dingo were here, he would never ever give up!
jpnChrName: 少なくともディンゴさんなら、 絶対に諦めたりしないはずですっ！
jpnSearchText:
少なくともディンゴさんなら、
絶対に諦めたりしないはずですっ！

engChrName: And that's why, if he were in our shoes, Dingo would've fought until the very end!
engSearchText:
And that's why, if he were in our shoes, Dingo
would've fought until the very end!
jpnChrName: ですから……そのディンゴさんという人は、 この状況の中で最後まで……っ！
jpnSearchText:
ですから……そのディンゴさんという人は、
この状況の中で最後まで……っ！

engChrName: He was the best at what he did—and we have to be just like him, especially now of all times!
engSearchText:
He was the best at what he did—and we have to be
just like him, especially now of all times!
jpnChrName: 私達記者は、彼のように戦わないと いけないんですよ、こんな時にこそ……！
jpnSearchText:
私達記者は、彼のように戦わないと
いけないんですよ、こんな時にこそ……！

engChrName: O-Okay, I got it. You've definitely convinced me that he was a model journalist.
engSearchText:
O-Okay, I got it. You've definitely convinced me that
he was a model journalist.
jpnChrName: わ、わかった……そのディンゴという男の 凄さも君の熱意も伝わったから……
jpnSearchText:
わ、わかった……そのディンゴという男の
凄さも君の熱意も伝わったから……

engChrName: But what exactly do you want from me? Do you need my help with something?
engSearchText:
But what exactly do you want from me? Do you need
my help with something?
jpnChrName: それで結局、僕にどうしろと……？ 同じ記者として協力、とはいっても……
jpnSearchText:
それで結局、僕にどうしろと……？
同じ記者として協力、とはいっても……

engChrName: U-Uhh... Well, sort of. I can't really go into why...
engSearchText: U-Uhh... Well, sort of. I can't really go into why...
jpnChrName: え、あ……その、今起きている事自体は 私の立場では説明できないんですが……！
jpnSearchText:
え、あ……その、今起きている事自体は
私の立場では説明できないんですが……！

engChrName: ...but I can say that there's something going on—and I can't just sit around doing nothing! Dingo would've felt the same.
engSearchText:
...but I can say that there's something going on—and
I can't just sit around doing nothing! Dingo would've
felt the same.
jpnChrName: それでも、やらない後悔より、やって後悔、 あの人だってそう思うと思うんですっ！
jpnSearchText:
それでも、やらない後悔より、やって後悔、
あの人だってそう思うと思うんですっ！

engChrName: Even if I can only help in a small way, I have to do something. So could you help me...?
engSearchText:
Even if I can only help in a small way, I have to
do something. So could you help me...?
jpnChrName: どんな小さな事でも、記者としての力を 活かせる事が目の前にあるなら……
jpnSearchText:
どんな小さな事でも、記者としての力を
活かせる事が目の前にあるなら……

engChrName: *sigh* You've sure got a lot of energy. Wish we had people as motivated as you at our company.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You've sure got a lot of energy. Wish we had
people as motivated as you at our company.
jpnChrName: ふう……本当に君は熱血なのか何なのか……
jpnSearchText: ふう……本当に君は熱血なのか何なのか……

engChrName: Fine, you've won me over.
engSearchText: Fine, you've won me over.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、僕の会社じゃ見慣れないタイプ だしな、話してて気づかされないでもないか。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、僕の会社じゃ見慣れないタイプ
だしな、話してて気づかされないでもないか。

engChrName: R-Really?
engSearchText: R-Really?
jpnChrName: そ、それじゃあ……
jpnSearchText: そ、それじゃあ……

engChrName: I still have my own work to do, but I promise I'll do what I can to help.
engSearchText:
I still have my own work to do, but I promise I'll do
what I can to help.
jpnChrName: 僕にも仕事はあるが、同業者として できる限りの連携はしても良いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
僕にも仕事はあるが、同業者として
できる限りの連携はしても良いだろう。

engChrName: This is an unprecedented national crisis. Now's not the time for news companies to be bickering with each other.
engSearchText:
This is an unprecedented national crisis. Now's not
the time for news companies to be bickering with
each other.
jpnChrName: 未曾有の国難とでもいうべき事態だしな、 通信社同士で張り合ってばかりも良くない。
jpnSearchText:
未曾有の国難とでもいうべき事態だしな、
通信社同士で張り合ってばかりも良くない。

engChrName: Would you like to swap contact information?
engSearchText: Would you like to swap contact information?
jpnChrName: まあ、本当にできる事しかしないが、 せいぜい連絡先は交換しておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、本当にできる事しかしないが、
せいぜい連絡先は交換しておこうか。

engChrName: Y-Yes, that sounds great! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Y-Yes, that sounds great! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: あ、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Let's do our best out there!
engSearchText: Let's do our best out there!
jpnChrName: 一緒に記者として、悔いの無いように……！
jpnSearchText: 一緒に記者として、悔いの無いように……！

engChrName: (She's seekin' the help of a local writer? What the hell is that girl thinking?)
engSearchText:
(She's seekin' the help of a local writer? What the hell
is that girl thinking?)
jpnChrName: （現地の記者に何かを頼んでいるようだが……   一体何を考えているんだ？）
jpnSearchText:
（現地の記者に何かを頼んでいるようだが……
一体何を考えているんだ？）

engChrName: (If she tells him about the game, we'll be screwed.)
engSearchText: (If she tells him about the game, we'll be screwed.)
jpnChrName: （うっかりデスゲームについて口を   滑らせないと良いが……）
jpnSearchText:
（うっかりデスゲームについて口を
滑らせないと良いが……）

engChrName: (Actually...maybe I should have a little more faith. She of all people wouldn't wanna let Dingo down.)
engSearchText:
(Actually...maybe I should have a little more faith.
She of all people wouldn't wanna let Dingo down.)
jpnChrName: （だが……あいつもディンゴの遺志を継ごうと   必死なんだろうしな、ここは見守ってやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（だが……あいつもディンゴの遺志を継ごうと
必死なんだろうしな、ここは見守ってやるか。）

engChrName: So, what are your impressions of this old city?
engSearchText: So, what are your impressions of this old city?
jpnChrName: それで……改めてどうだったかしら、 この優美な白亜の古都は？
jpnSearchText:
それで……改めてどうだったかしら、
この優美な白亜の古都は？

engChrName: Well, after interviewing several of the locals, I can definitely tell something's off.
engSearchText:
Well, after interviewing several of the locals, I can
definitely tell something's off.
jpnChrName: 街の人にも取材しましたけど、 やっぱり何か異様な感じというか……
jpnSearchText:
街の人にも取材しましたけど、
やっぱり何か異様な感じというか……

engChrName: They may be citizens of the Republic like me, but they still seem so...different from us.
engSearchText:
They may be citizens of the Republic like me, but
they still seem so...different from us.
jpnChrName: 同じ共和国の人のはずなのに 時々感覚が全然違って……
jpnSearchText:
同じ共和国の人のはずなのに
時々感覚が全然違って……

engChrName: And it feels like they're hiding something... Something they feel they can't ever talk about.
engSearchText:
And it feels like they're hiding something...
Something they feel they can't ever talk about.
jpnChrName: それに、何か触れちゃいけない事が ありそうな雰囲気も……
jpnSearchText:
それに、何か触れちゃいけない事が
ありそうな雰囲気も……

engChrName: Your feeling is right on the mark.
engSearchText: Your feeling is right on the mark.
jpnChrName: うふふ、まあ予想通りね。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、まあ予想通りね。

engChrName: Oración's upper-class citizens have been—and still are—defined by their lust for power. They're far removed from your average Calvardian.
engSearchText:
Oración's upper-class citizens have been—and still
are—defined by their lust for power. They're far
removed from your average Calvardian.
jpnChrName: オラシオン上流階級──あの人達の 権力欲には感心するばかりだわ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン上流階級──あの人達の
権力欲には感心するばかりだわ。

engChrName: There are also many things boiling under the surface—but good luck getting them to open up about it.
engSearchText:
There are also many things boiling under the
surface—but good luck getting them to open up
about it.
jpnChrName: やましい事なんていくらでもあるはずだけど、 この街でタブーを犯す者はいないでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
やましい事なんていくらでもあるはずだけど、
この街でタブーを犯す者はいないでしょうし。

engChrName: A place where people ignore the problems that are staring them in the face makes for the perfect home base for Almata.
engSearchText:
A place where people ignore the problems that are
staring them in the face makes for the perfect home
base for Almata.
jpnChrName: だとしたら……きっと、尚更 もってこいなんですよね……
jpnSearchText:
だとしたら……きっと、尚更
もってこいなんですよね……

engChrName: It even lets them create connections with racial terrorists directly.
engSearchText:
It even lets them create connections with racial
terrorists directly.
jpnChrName: アルマータみたいな人達が潜むにも、 “民族テロ”の関係者と繋がりを作るのも……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータみたいな人達が潜むにも、
“民族テロ”の関係者と繋がりを作るのも……

engChrName: It might be dangerous for people like me to be here, but there has to be some way for me to help.
engSearchText:
It might be dangerous for people like me to be here,
but there has to be some way for me to help.
jpnChrName: ……だとしても、わたしがこの街に来れた事には きっと意味があるはずですっ！
jpnSearchText:
……だとしても、わたしがこの街に来れた事には
きっと意味があるはずですっ！

engChrName: I want to believe there's meaning in me being here!
engSearchText: I want to believe there's meaning in me being here!
jpnChrName: 記者として、記者だからこそ できる事が必ず……！
jpnSearchText:
記者として、記者だからこそ
できる事が必ず……！

engChrName: Heehee. It's like you read my mind. I was just about to tell you it's dangerous for you to be out and about.
engSearchText:
Heehee. It's like you read my mind. I was just about
to tell you it's dangerous for you to be out and about.
jpnChrName: うふふ、危ないから手を引きなさい、 と言っても無駄そうね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、危ないから手を引きなさい、
と言っても無駄そうね。

engChrName: But I know your type, so I know there's little point in trying to stop you.
engSearchText:
But I know your type, so I know there's little point in
trying to stop you.
jpnChrName: いいわ、あの記者さんの弔いの意味もあるし 私も力を貸してあげる。
jpnSearchText:
いいわ、あの記者さんの弔いの意味もあるし
私も力を貸してあげる。

engChrName: I'll even help you out during my break tomorrow. That'll be my way of showing my appreciation for that man.
engSearchText:
I'll even help you out during my break tomorrow.
That'll be my way of showing my appreciation for
that man.
jpnChrName: 仕事の合間にはなるけど、 きっと全ては繋がっているはずだから。
jpnSearchText:
仕事の合間にはなるけど、
きっと全ては繋がっているはずだから。

engChrName: I suppose I have no choice but to help her now.
engSearchText: I suppose I have no choice but to help her now.
jpnChrName: ふふ、仕方がないから 私も力を貸してあげるとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、仕方がないから
私も力を貸してあげるとしましょうか。

engChrName: Though she does have plenty of people to lean on. I noticed she even enlisted the aid of a Royal Guardian reporter.
engSearchText:
Though she does have plenty of people to lean on.
I noticed she even enlisted the aid of a Royal
Guardian reporter.
jpnChrName: そういえば、昼にはＲＧ（ロイヤルガーディアン）の記者さんとも 何かお話していたようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、昼にはＲＧ（ロイヤルガーディアン）の記者さんとも
何かお話していたようだけど……

engChrName: Heehee. It'll be interesting to observe how she inherits that man's will.
engSearchText:
Heehee. It'll be interesting to observe how she
inherits that man's will.
jpnChrName: ふふ……どうやってあのお兄さんの遺志を継ぐのか、 助け舟も出しながら見守らせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……どうやってあのお兄さんの遺志を継ぐのか、
助け舟も出しながら見守らせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Van and Judith probably know this already, but I was able to choose my own path.
engSearchText:
Van and Judith probably know this already, but I was
able to choose my own path.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんやジュディスはご存じかも 知れないですが……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんやジュディスはご存じかも
知れないですが……

engChrName: A path that strayed from the one laid out for me by my predecessor.
engSearchText:
A path that strayed from the one laid out for me by
my predecessor.
jpnChrName: 私が代々受け継がれて来た凶手の《銀》として だけではなく、私として道を選ぶようになった……
jpnSearchText:
私が代々受け継がれて来た凶手の《銀》として
だけではなく、私として道を選ぶようになった……

engChrName: The two people who gave me that opportunity are similar to the two who helped Fie find her own calling.
engSearchText:
The two people who gave me that opportunity are
similar to the two who helped Fie find her
own calling.
jpnChrName: そのきっかけをくれた二人の人物は、フィーさんを 今の道に導いた二人とそれぞれどこか似ていて……
jpnSearchText:
そのきっかけをくれた二人の人物は、フィーさんを
今の道に導いた二人とそれぞれどこか似ていて……

engChrName: I only realized this after the fact. I'd love to talk about it more with her when we get the chance.
engSearchText:
I only realized this after the fact. I'd love to talk about
it more with her when we get the chance.
jpnChrName: ふふ、後になってそうした部分にも気づけるもので、 なるべく機会があればお話したいんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、後になってそうした部分にも気づけるもので、
なるべく機会があればお話したいんです。

engChrName: Hey, you guys. Figured you'd come see me sooner or later.
engSearchText:
Hey, you guys. Figured you'd come see me sooner
or later.
jpnChrName: 君たちか、来るとは思っていたよ。
jpnSearchText: 君たちか、来るとは思っていたよ。

engChrName: So, what're you up to? Getting a grasp of the bigger picture while doing your fixer work, I imagine?
engSearchText:
So, what're you up to? Getting a grasp of the bigger
picture while doing your fixer work, I imagine?
jpnChrName: ふふ、何か見えてくる事を期待して 解決業務もこなしている、という所かな？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、何か見えてくる事を期待して
解決業務もこなしている、という所かな？

engChrName: If you knew the answer, why'd you even ask?
engSearchText: If you knew the answer, why'd you even ask?
jpnChrName: 相も変わらず見通しやがって……
jpnSearchText: 相も変わらず見通しやがって……

engChrName: Just making light conversation to ease the tension— since you're all so clearly on edge.
engSearchText:
Just making light conversation to ease the tension—
since you're all so clearly on edge.
jpnChrName: ふふ、これくらいは普通に察せる範囲だと 思うけど……どうやら随分警戒してるみたいだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、これくらいは普通に察せる範囲だと
思うけど……どうやら随分警戒してるみたいだ。

engChrName: We're partners, aren't we? You ought to be a little more trusting.
engSearchText:
We're partners, aren't we? You ought to be a little
more trusting.
jpnChrName: 一応、協力関係なんだし少しは 信用して欲しいものだけど。
jpnSearchText:
一応、協力関係なんだし少しは
信用して欲しいものだけど。

engChrName: Lady, we know jack shit about you.
engSearchText: Lady, we know jack shit about you.
jpnChrName: 流石に得体が知れなさ過ぎんだよ……
jpnSearchText: 流石に得体が知れなさ過ぎんだよ……

engChrName: Perhaps we would be a little less uneasy if you told us what you were doing out here.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we would be a little less uneasy if you told us
what you were doing out here.
jpnChrName: そういうあなたこそ…… 一人で表に出て一体何を……
jpnSearchText:
そういうあなたこそ……
一人で表に出て一体何を……

engChrName: *sigh* No faith at all. You wound me.
engSearchText: *sigh* No faith at all. You wound me.
jpnChrName: そこまで構えられると流石に傷つくな……なに、 少し街の様子を見に繰り出しただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
そこまで構えられると流石に傷つくな……なに、
少し街の様子を見に繰り出しただけさ。

engChrName: I'm just exploring the city. I'm from the East, so it shouldn't be that hard to believe I'd want to do some sightseeing here, right?
engSearchText:
I'm just exploring the city. I'm from the East, so it
shouldn't be that hard to believe I'd want to do some
sightseeing here, right?
jpnChrName: 一応、私も東から遥々来た身だしね。 状況が状況なら観光気分に浸りたいくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、私も東から遥々来た身だしね。
状況が状況なら観光気分に浸りたいくらいだ。

engChrName: I call bullshit. I bet you're just doing some recon so you can use this city's layout and situation to your advantage.
engSearchText:
I call bullshit. I bet you're just doing some recon so
you can use this city's layout and situation to
your advantage.
jpnChrName: ハッ、要は状況偵察ってところか。 いざとなりゃ街の構造も状況も利用して──
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、要は状況偵察ってところか。
いざとなりゃ街の構造も状況も利用して──

engChrName: Wow. You guys really like to assume the worst of me, don't you?
engSearchText:
Wow. You guys really like to assume the worst of me,
don't you?
jpnChrName: うーん、つれないなぁ。
jpnSearchText: うーん、つれないなぁ。

engChrName: I was even being half serious about wanting to play tourist.
engSearchText:
I was even being half serious about wanting to
play tourist.
jpnChrName: 一応、観光気分というのも半分は 本当なんだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
一応、観光気分というのも半分は
本当なんだけどね……

engChrName: (She may be a jaeger, but she's not at all like Abi or the people from the Eisenschild...)
engSearchText:
(She may be a jaeger, but she's not at all like Abi or
the people from the Eisenschild...)
jpnChrName: （同じ猟兵団でも……お父さん（アブ）や   アイゼンシルトとは全く違うというか……）
jpnSearchText:
（同じ猟兵団でも……お父さん（アブ）や
アイゼンシルトとは全く違うというか……）

engChrName: (She wasn't lying when she said other members of Ikaruga are lying low on the surface. I can sense them nearby.)
engSearchText:
(She wasn't lying when she said other members of
Ikaruga are lying low on the surface. I can sense
them nearby.)
jpnChrName: （……ふむ、この気配──かの者の言う   “草”も多く根を張っておるようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……ふむ、この気配──かの者の言う
“草”も多く根を張っておるようだが……）

engChrName: (But I doubt that's why the Silverblade is so composed. She's inordinately strong—and she knows it.)
engSearchText:
(But I doubt that's why the Silverblade is
so composed. She's inordinately strong—and she
knows it.)
jpnChrName: （だが……この白銀の姫がかくも余裕を   見せるのも、それだけ故ではないだろうな。）
jpnSearchText:
（だが……この白銀の姫がかくも余裕を
見せるのも、それだけ故ではないだろうな。）

engChrName: What the hell are you doing out here?!
engSearchText: What the hell are you doing out here?!
jpnChrName: 斑鳩の……一体、こんな街に繰り出して どういうつもりだ……！
jpnSearchText:
斑鳩の……一体、こんな街に繰り出して
どういうつもりだ……！

engChrName: Now, now. No need to tense up. It's not like I'm gonna sneak attack you or anything.
engSearchText:
Now, now. No need to tense up. It's not like I'm
gonna sneak attack you or anything.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そう構えないでも良いさ。 闇討ちみたいな事は狙っていないしね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そう構えないでも良いさ。
闇討ちみたいな事は狙っていないしね。

engChrName: I'm just getting some supplies and bringing them back to our boat. It's by the waterway near here.
engSearchText:
I'm just getting some supplies and bringing them
back to our boat. It's by the waterway near here.
jpnChrName: ほら、一応私達の拠点は 市場近くの水路にある舟だしね。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、一応私達の拠点は
市場近くの水路にある舟だしね。

engChrName: Well, I suppose that's a natural thing for a jaeger to do...but the leader doesn't often go out on their own.
engSearchText:
Well, I suppose that's a natural thing for a jaeger to
do...but the leader doesn't often go out on their own.
jpnChrName: 拠点周辺の情勢把握と不足物資の買い出し……？ 猟兵なら当然ですが、頭目格が一人で──
jpnSearchText:
拠点周辺の情勢把握と不足物資の買い出し……？
猟兵なら当然ですが、頭目格が一人で──

engChrName: Okay, let's just say I also wanted to go for a little stroll by myself. Surely you can believe that.
engSearchText:
Okay, let's just say I also wanted to go for a little stroll
by myself. Surely you can believe that.
jpnChrName: 一応、物珍しさでの街歩きも兼ねている── それじゃあ納得できないかな？
jpnSearchText:
一応、物珍しさでの街歩きも兼ねている──
それじゃあ納得できないかな？

engChrName: Yeah, I call bull!
engSearchText: Yeah, I call bull!
jpnChrName: 出来る訳ねぇだろ！？
jpnSearchText: 出来る訳ねぇだろ！？

engChrName: (I have a firm grasp of Ikaruga's threat level, but I can't say the same for this woman's.)
engSearchText:
(I have a firm grasp of Ikaruga's threat level, but I
can't say the same for this woman's.)
jpnChrName: （斑鳩……組織そのものの脅威度は把握して   おりますが、この方は……）
jpnSearchText:
（斑鳩……組織そのものの脅威度は把握して
おりますが、この方は……）

engChrName: (The Silverblade isn't like the rest of her group. She's as wildly unpredictable as they come.)
engSearchText:
(The Silverblade isn't like the rest of her group.
She's as wildly unpredictable as they come.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、この奔放さも含めて、斑鳩そのもの   とも違った底知れなさがあると言えよう。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、この奔放さも含めて、斑鳩そのもの
とも違った底知れなさがあると言えよう。）

engChrName: (She doesn't appear to be lying, but it would be unwise to take what she says at face value.)
engSearchText:
(She doesn't appear to be lying, but it would be
unwise to take what she says at face value.)
jpnChrName: （この者の振る舞いも……偽りは無きように   見えるが、それこそが策やもしれぬしな……）
jpnSearchText:
（この者の振る舞いも……偽りは無きように
見えるが、それこそが策やもしれぬしな……）

engChrName: Heehee. Your reactions are all so different—but they're hilarious all the same! I think I'm growing to like you guys.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Your reactions are all so different—but
they're hilarious all the same! I think I'm growing to
like you guys.
jpnChrName: ふふ、三者三様の反応。 でも共にする筋は同じ、やはり君達は面白いね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、三者三様の反応。
でも共にする筋は同じ、やはり君達は面白いね。

engChrName: Oh, by the way, could we keep our little encounter a secret?
engSearchText:
Oh, by the way, could we keep our little encounter
a secret?
jpnChrName: そうそう、一つ提案なんだが、ここで会った事は 無かったことにしてくれないかな？
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、一つ提案なんだが、ここで会った事は
無かったことにしてくれないかな？

engChrName: Kurogane's been a pain in the butt lately. He'll totally give me an earful if he catches wind of this.
engSearchText:
Kurogane's been a pain in the butt lately. He'll totally
give me an earful if he catches wind of this.
jpnChrName: 最近クロガネがうるさくてね。 知れると色々面倒なんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近クロガネがうるさくてね。
知れると色々面倒なんだよ。

jpnChrName: （なんつーか、まあ……）
jpnSearchText: （なんつーか、まあ……）

engChrName: (Well, that's one way to suck the tension out of the room.)
engSearchText:
(Well, that's one way to suck the tension out of
the room.)
jpnChrName: （うん……底知れないかと思えば   毒気を抜かれるというか……）
jpnSearchText:
（うん……底知れないかと思えば
毒気を抜かれるというか……）

engChrName: (It's almost impossible to get a read on her. I'm glad she's on our side, but I still can't help but feel nervous around her.)
engSearchText:
(It's almost impossible to get a read on her. I'm glad
she's on our side, but I still can't help but feel nervous
around her.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、不思議な方です。   協力して頂ける間は心強いですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、不思議な方です。
協力して頂ける間は心強いですが……）

engChrName: (It's almost impossible to get a read on her. We can't afford to let our guard down around her.)
engSearchText:
(It's almost impossible to get a read on her. We can't
afford to let our guard down around her.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、不思議な方です。   今は警戒を解くわけにはいきませんが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、不思議な方です。
今は警戒を解くわけにはいきませんが……）

engChrName: It's kinda funny to see the people here go about their days blissfully unaware that their lives are all hanging by a thread.
engSearchText:
It's kinda funny to see the people here go about their
days blissfully unaware that their lives are all hanging
by a thread.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それにしても裏の勢力が陰で蠢く傍らで、 日々の暮らしと享楽はそのままの白亜の都……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それにしても裏の勢力が陰で蠢く傍らで、
日々の暮らしと享楽はそのままの白亜の都……

engChrName: I'm not saying I like what Almata's doing, but you can't deny that the way they've put the ignorance of this city on full display is fascinating.
engSearchText:
I'm not saying I like what Almata's doing, but you
can't deny that the way they've put the ignorance of
this city on full display is fascinating.
jpnChrName: アルマータの悪趣味に同調するつもりも無いが、 そうそうは見れない見物なのは確かだね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの悪趣味に同調するつもりも無いが、
そうそうは見れない見物なのは確かだね。

engChrName: And the stupid must be contagious. Even the tourists here are wandering into danger like a moth to a flame.
engSearchText:
And the stupid must be contagious. Even the tourists
here are wandering into danger like a moth to
a flame.
jpnChrName: ……といっても、一般人が戦場に 迷い込むのは流石に見過ごせないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
……といっても、一般人が戦場に
迷い込むのは流石に見過ごせないけどね。

engChrName: (How the hell does she know about that?)
engSearchText: (How the hell does she know about that?)
jpnChrName: （ってしっかり察知してやがる……）
jpnSearchText: （ってしっかり察知してやがる……）

engChrName: (These Ikaruga freaks must have eyes everywhere.)
engSearchText: (These Ikaruga freaks must have eyes everywhere.)
jpnChrName: （チッ……つくづくバケモンだな、  こいつはよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（チッ……つくづくバケモンだな、
こいつはよ。）

engChrName: So you made it to the final phase. I'm impressed.
engSearchText: So you made it to the final phase. I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: クク、いよいよ最終フェーズだってな？ いやあ、オジサン感心したぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、いよいよ最終フェーズだってな？
いやあ、オジサン感心したぜ。

engChrName: Too bad you disposed of my insurance, though.
engSearchText: Too bad you disposed of my insurance, though.
jpnChrName: ま、これなら俺が用意しといた最後の保険を 切り崩した甲斐、見せられんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、これなら俺が用意しといた最後の保険を
切り崩した甲斐、見せられんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: Insurance, my ass.
engSearchText: Insurance, my ass.
jpnChrName: ハッ……あれが保険でたまるかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……あれが保険でたまるかよ。

engChrName: Hey, you can't deny it would've been useful. You could've annihilated the whole lot of them with a flick of your wrist...
engSearchText:
Hey, you can't deny it would've been useful.
You could've annihilated the whole lot of them with a
flick of your wrist...
jpnChrName: そうか？　でも、確実に連中を……ついでに 地下に呼ばれた人でなし共を一掃できるんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そうか？　でも、確実に連中を……ついでに
地下に呼ばれた人でなし共を一掃できるんだぜ？

engChrName: ...and brought us all one step closer to world peace in the process.
engSearchText:
...and brought us all one step closer to world peace in
the process.
jpnChrName: 何やかんや、その一発で世界平和に 一歩近づくって見方もあるかもな？
jpnSearchText:
何やかんや、その一発で世界平和に
一歩近づくって見方もあるかもな？

engChrName: Any peace that is obtained with weapons of that variety is no peace at all.
engSearchText:
Any peace that is obtained with weapons of that
variety is no peace at all.
jpnChrName: 嬉々としてそのような事を……度し難いな。
jpnSearchText: 嬉々としてそのような事を……度し難いな。

engChrName: So what are you plotting now?
engSearchText: So what are you plotting now?
jpnChrName: まだ、何か企んでいるのですか？
jpnSearchText: まだ、何か企んでいるのですか？

engChrName: Oh, I'm just going to spectate from here. I don't spend every hour of the day scheming, you know.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm just going to spectate from here. I don't
spend every hour of the day scheming, you know.
jpnChrName: 信用無いねぇ……別に、今は傍観だよ傍観。
jpnSearchText: 信用無いねぇ……別に、今は傍観だよ傍観。

engChrName: I'm having a ball just watching you all scamper and scurry about trying to save the day.
engSearchText:
I'm having a ball just watching you all scamper and
scurry about trying to save the day.
jpnChrName: 自分が手を下さなくても、楽しみ方自体は いくらでもあるってモンなのさ、これが。
jpnSearchText:
自分が手を下さなくても、楽しみ方自体は
いくらでもあるってモンなのさ、これが。

engChrName: Keep up the good work. You're doing a great job keeping me entertained.
engSearchText:
Keep up the good work. You're doing a great job
keeping me entertained.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、俺を退屈させない感じでアルマータに 引導を渡す所を見せてくれよ、裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、俺を退屈させない感じでアルマータに
引導を渡す所を見せてくれよ、裏解決屋。

engChrName: We aren't friggin' tools for your amusement, you dick.
engSearchText:
We aren't friggin' tools for your amusement,
you dick.
jpnChrName: チッ、誰がお前の愉悦のために……
jpnSearchText: チッ、誰がお前の愉悦のために……

engChrName: On the contrary, that's exactly what I hired you for.
engSearchText: On the contrary, that's exactly what I hired you for.
jpnChrName: あー、一応俺も今回は依頼者でもあるからな？ ま、せいぜい期待に沿ってくれや……
jpnSearchText:
あー、一応俺も今回は依頼者でもあるからな？
ま、せいぜい期待に沿ってくれや……

engChrName: If you weren't my client, I'd kick your ass right here and now.
engSearchText:
If you weren't my client, I'd kick your ass right here
and now.
jpnChrName: ……どこまでも気分の悪い野郎だ。
jpnSearchText: ……どこまでも気分の悪い野郎だ。

engChrName: Since you destroyed my trump card, you better put on a good show, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Since you destroyed my trump card, you better put on
a good show, spriggan.
jpnChrName: クク、俺の切り札をパーにした分はせいぜい、 面白い幕引きを見せてくれよな裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
クク、俺の切り札をパーにした分はせいぜい、
面白い幕引きを見せてくれよな裏解決屋。

engChrName: I'm counting on you to keep me entertained.
engSearchText: I'm counting on you to keep me entertained.
jpnChrName: 依頼者としても期待しているぜ。
jpnSearchText: 依頼者としても期待しているぜ。

engChrName: I'm impressed you were able to see through my plan. You might be a good fit for the society.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed you were able to see through my plan.
You might be a good fit for the society.
jpnChrName: クク、それにしても俺の奥の手を見抜いちまうとは、 解決屋、案外結社に向いているんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、それにしても俺の奥の手を見抜いちまうとは、
解決屋、案外結社に向いているんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Might as well forget about recruiting me 'cause I'd never work under you. You'd probably make the worst boss of all time.
engSearchText:
Might as well forget about recruiting me 'cause I'd
never work under you. You'd probably make the
worst boss of all time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、向いていようが向いていなかろうが、 あんたの部下になるってのはマジで勘弁だ……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、向いていようが向いていなかろうが、
あんたの部下になるってのはマジで勘弁だ……

engChrName: Such a cold thing to say—but I won't deny it.
engSearchText: Such a cold thing to say—but I won't deny it.
jpnChrName: つれないねぇ……しかし、それもそうかもな。
jpnSearchText: つれないねぇ……しかし、それもそうかもな。

engChrName: Shame you didn't let me make use of my trump card, but I guess that just isn't how you do things.
engSearchText:
Shame you didn't let me make use of my trump card,
but I guess that just isn't how you do things.
jpnChrName: オジサンのこの戦力を利用しようとも しなかったのも、“流儀”ってヤツだろうしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
オジサンのこの戦力を利用しようとも
しなかったのも、“流儀”ってヤツだろうしなぁ。

engChrName: Oh, well. Guess I'll go back to thinking up a new crime.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Guess I'll go back to thinking up a
new crime.
jpnChrName: ま、見抜かれちまった以上は……他の完全犯罪を 考えておく楽しみが増えたと捉えておくとすっかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、見抜かれちまった以上は……他の完全犯罪を
考えておく楽しみが増えたと捉えておくとすっかねぇ。

engChrName: (Nothing good can come from that, no doubt...)
engSearchText: (Nothing good can come from that, no doubt...)
jpnChrName: （相変わらず、最後にまたとんでもない事を……）
jpnSearchText: （相変わらず、最後にまたとんでもない事を……）

engChrName: I look forward to seeing how you handle this.
engSearchText: I look forward to seeing how you handle this.
jpnChrName: ま、せいぜいお前らの流儀ってのを 見せてもらうとするさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、せいぜいお前らの流儀ってのを
見せてもらうとするさ。

engChrName: If breaking oaths and rules is my way of living, then yours is slipping through the cracks in them.
engSearchText:
If breaking oaths and rules is my way of living, then
yours is slipping through the cracks in them.
jpnChrName: 俺は“戒”を破るのが生き様だが、解決屋は “すり抜ける”といったところか。
jpnSearchText:
俺は“戒”を破るのが生き様だが、解決屋は
“すり抜ける”といったところか。

engChrName: Now that my trump card's been destroyed, I'll be expecting you to make up for it by putting on one hell of a show.
engSearchText:
Now that my trump card's been destroyed, I'll be
expecting you to make up for it by putting on one hell
of a show.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、最後の切り札を潰したのに見合う 程度には面白く振る舞ってくれると嬉しいねェ。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、最後の切り札を潰したのに見合う
程度には面白く振る舞ってくれると嬉しいねェ。

engChrName: I see Renne's grown to resent me.
engSearchText: I see Renne's grown to resent me.
jpnChrName: クク、オジサンもレンには随分と嫌われたもんだ。 昔のアイツなら、俺のやり方に興味くらいは……
jpnSearchText:
クク、オジサンもレンには随分と嫌われたもんだ。
昔のアイツなら、俺のやり方に興味くらいは……

engChrName: Back in the day, she used to be interested in how I went about my work, but I see things have changed.
engSearchText:
Back in the day, she used to be interested in how I
went about my work, but I see things have changed.
jpnChrName: ま、それもどうかは怪しいか。
jpnSearchText: ま、それもどうかは怪しいか。

engChrName: She doesn't seem to be fond of people like me who break oaths and rules at every turn.
engSearchText:
She doesn't seem to be fond of people like me who
break oaths and rules at every turn.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、アイツも見違えた中でのこの舞台だ、 “戒”も、“ルール”も一層破り甲斐あるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、アイツも見違えた中でのこの舞台だ、
“戒”も、“ルール”も一層破り甲斐あるかもな。

engChrName: Perhaps she's grown to like people such as you—who prefer to slip through the cracks in them.
engSearchText:
Perhaps she's grown to like people such as you—who
prefer to slip through the cracks in them.
jpnChrName: なあ、裏解決屋もそう思わないか？ いや、あんたは破るよりすり抜けんのが愉しいか。
jpnSearchText:
なあ、裏解決屋もそう思わないか？
いや、あんたは破るよりすり抜けんのが愉しいか。

engChrName: Yeah, sure. For the record, I do sometimes turn my back on the rules or look for ways to get around them.
engSearchText:
Yeah, sure. For the record, I do sometimes turn my
back on the rules or look for ways to get around them.
jpnChrName: ハッ、確かに俺も決まり事に背を向ける事もありゃ 抜け道を探す事もあるが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、確かに俺も決まり事に背を向ける事もありゃ
抜け道を探す事もあるが……

engChrName: Though I'm not doing it for fun like you. You're just screwin' around and causin' mayhem for no reason. Maybe that's why no one likes you.
engSearchText:
Though I'm not doing it for fun like you. You're just
screwin' around and causin' mayhem for no reason.
Maybe that's why no one likes you.
jpnChrName: アンタみたいに面白半分でやってる訳じゃねぇ、 悪いがアンタの悪趣味話には付き合えねぇよ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタみたいに面白半分でやってる訳じゃねぇ、
悪いがアンタの悪趣味話には付き合えねぇよ。

engChrName: Wow. Kick a man while he's down, why don't you?
engSearchText: Wow. Kick a man while he's down, why don't you?
jpnChrName: クク、どこまでもつれないねぇ……
jpnSearchText: クク、どこまでもつれないねぇ……

engChrName: So we survived long enough to make it to the final round.
engSearchText:
So we survived long enough to make it to the
final round.
jpnChrName: クク、一緒に最終フェーズに残ってみた 感想はどうだよ裏解決屋？
jpnSearchText:
クク、一緒に最終フェーズに残ってみた
感想はどうだよ裏解決屋？

engChrName: So you survived long enough to make it to the final round.
engSearchText:
So you survived long enough to make it to the
final round.
jpnChrName: クク、テメェらが最終フェーズに残ったか 裏解決屋ァ……
jpnSearchText:
クク、テメェらが最終フェーズに残ったか
裏解決屋ァ……

engChrName: Guess there's no avoiding a battle to the death with those jackasses now.
engSearchText:
Guess there's no avoiding a battle to the death with
those jackasses now.
jpnChrName: ま、何にせよこっからはあの連中との 本当の死合いが避けられねぇって訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何にせよこっからはあの連中との
本当の死合いが避けられねぇって訳だ。

engChrName: You better not show them any mercy, you hear?
engSearchText: You better not show them any mercy, you hear?
jpnChrName: せいぜい……助手共のためとか言って 甘っちょろい事は考えんじゃねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい……助手共のためとか言って
甘っちょろい事は考えんじゃねぇぞ？

engChrName: I don't need you telling me that. I know what I have to do.
engSearchText:
I don't need you telling me that. I know what I have
to do.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、あんたに言われなくとも、 ここに至った時点で覚悟はできてるさ。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、あんたに言われなくとも、
ここに至った時点で覚悟はできてるさ。

engChrName: Cool. Then I'll be lookin' forward to seeing how you pull a win out of your ass.
engSearchText:
Cool. Then I'll be lookin' forward to seeing how you
pull a win out of your ass.
jpnChrName: クク、良いねぇ……それじゃあ俺も、 テメェの選ぶ道を見届けてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、良いねぇ……それじゃあ俺も、
テメェの選ぶ道を見届けてやるよ。

engChrName: I can't imagine you'd half-ass things at this stage of the game.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine you'd half-ass things at this stage of
the game.
jpnChrName: クク、まさか今更ハンパな事は考えちゃ いねぇだろうな裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まさか今更ハンパな事は考えちゃ
いねぇだろうな裏解決屋。

engChrName: The Oathbreaker's plan was some pretty vile shit, but it would've made for an effective trump card.
engSearchText:
The Oathbreaker's plan was some pretty vile shit, but
it would've made for an effective trump card.
jpnChrName: 破戒のオッサンの策は最悪ではあるが、 最後の保険、最後の切り札としちゃ有効だった。
jpnSearchText:
破戒のオッサンの策は最悪ではあるが、
最後の保険、最後の切り札としちゃ有効だった。

engChrName: Now that it's been tossed out, you're on your own.
engSearchText: Now that it's been tossed out, you're on your own.
jpnChrName: それを潰した今、お前の筋ってのが どう出るのかせいぜい見させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それを潰した今、お前の筋ってのが
どう出るのかせいぜい見させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Never thought there'd be someone outside the society who'd have the balls to stand in the Oathbreaker's way.
engSearchText:
Never thought there'd be someone outside the society
who'd have the balls to stand in the
Oathbreaker's way.
jpnChrName: クク……まさか破戒のオッサンにここまで ツッコむ奴が外側にいるとはな……
jpnSearchText:
クク……まさか破戒のオッサンにここまで
ツッコむ奴が外側にいるとはな……

engChrName: Though now we're down a man.
engSearchText: Though now we're down a man.
jpnChrName: もっとも、そのせいでこっちの手勢は 一人減っちまった訳だがなァ？
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、そのせいでこっちの手勢は
一人減っちまった訳だがなァ？

engChrName: Not like he's been much help anyway.
engSearchText: Not like he's been much help anyway.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そうは言ってもアンタだって、 このオッサンは戦力として数えちゃいねぇだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……そうは言ってもアンタだって、
このオッサンは戦力として数えちゃいねぇだろ？

engChrName: You ain't wrong. The guy's a lazy asshole.
engSearchText: You ain't wrong. The guy's a lazy asshole.
jpnChrName: ま、それもそうではある。 俺達と肩を並べて戦う手合いでもねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、それもそうではある。
俺達と肩を並べて戦う手合いでもねぇしな。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, we could've easily screwed up with our teleportation. It was never a surefire plan.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, we could've easily screwed
up with our teleportation. It was never a surefire plan.
jpnChrName: 何より、俺達だって“転位”にしくじりゃ どうなるかわかったもんじゃねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
何より、俺達だって“転位”にしくじりゃ
どうなるかわかったもんじゃねぇしな。

engChrName: That guy makes the Faceless look sane, and trust me, that's saying something.
engSearchText:
That guy makes the Faceless look sane, and trust me,
that's saying something.
jpnChrName: ッたく、今思えば《白面》なんざ 生温かったくらいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ッたく、今思えば《白面》なんざ
生温かったくらいだぜ。

engChrName: Guess even you guys have to deal with shit bosses.
engSearchText: Guess even you guys have to deal with shit bosses.
jpnChrName: ハッ、結社でも上司次第の苦労はあるってか……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、結社でも上司次第の苦労はあるってか……

engChrName: From here on out, I say we roll with a frontal attack. Fits my style better.
engSearchText:
From here on out, I say we roll with a frontal attack.
Fits my style better.
jpnChrName: ……ま、せいぜいここからは“正攻法”で行くと しようや、俺もそっちの方が性に合う。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、せいぜいここからは“正攻法”で行くと
しようや、俺もそっちの方が性に合う。

engChrName: Let's all have some fun out there, all right?
engSearchText: Let's all have some fun out there, all right?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、お互い楽しむとしようぜ？
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋、お互い楽しむとしようぜ？

engChrName: I trust that guy as far as I can throw him.
engSearchText: I trust that guy as far as I can throw him.
jpnChrName: クク、このオッサンについては俺らも ぶっちゃけ信用してねぇがなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、このオッサンについては俺らも
ぶっちゃけ信用してねぇがなぁ？

engChrName: He's a damn good fighter, though. You can count on him to deliver the pain.
engSearchText:
He's a damn good fighter, though. You can count on
him to deliver the pain.
jpnChrName: ま、てめぇらとかち合う時には どの道俺も遠慮なく当たらせてもらうが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、てめぇらとかち合う時には
どの道俺も遠慮なく当たらせてもらうが……

engChrName: Whenever we clash someday, don't be too distracted by me. The Oathbreaker's got a knack for pullin' the rug out from under people.
engSearchText:
Whenever we clash someday, don't be too distracted
by me. The Oathbreaker's got a knack for pullin' the
rug out from under people.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、俺に気を取られ過ぎて 破戒に足をすくわれねぇこった。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、俺に気を取られ過ぎて
破戒に足をすくわれねぇこった。

engChrName: I don't mind drinking alone on occasion. It gives me a chance to think.
engSearchText:
I don't mind drinking alone on occasion. It gives me a
chance to think.
jpnChrName: うふふ、たまには一人飲みもオツやねぇ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、たまには一人飲みもオツやねぇ。

engChrName: And my mind sometimes wanders to that detestable man and the things he does.
engSearchText:
And my mind sometimes wanders to that detestable
man and the things he does.
jpnChrName: あの二人と共にいて、何をやっとるのか。 それが客観的に見えてくるもんやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あの二人と共にいて、何をやっとるのか。
それが客観的に見えてくるもんやねぇ。

engChrName: His plans in particular can only be described as deranged.
engSearchText:
His plans in particular can only be described
as deranged.
jpnChrName: うふふ……ほんまに異常やねぇ、 特に旦さんと一緒にしてきた事……
jpnSearchText:
うふふ……ほんまに異常やねぇ、
特に旦さんと一緒にしてきた事……

engChrName: But they do keep things interesting, so I can't complain.
engSearchText:
But they do keep things interesting, so I
can't complain.
jpnChrName: ま、結社について来てからは 一層おもろいから別にええけど……
jpnSearchText:
ま、結社について来てからは
一層おもろいから別にええけど……

engChrName: That was wonderful, darling. The only other person who's been able to work out one of his schemes was Renne.
engSearchText:
That was wonderful, darling. The only other person
who's been able to work out one of his schemes
was Renne.
jpnChrName: うふふ、今のは見事やったなぁ。 レン以来やね、旦さんの手の内に切り込んだのは。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、今のは見事やったなぁ。
レン以来やね、旦さんの手の内に切り込んだのは。

engChrName: Though now you've rendered his trump card unusable.
engSearchText:
Though now you've rendered his trump
card unusable.
jpnChrName: まあ、旦さんが降りた以上、最後の手立ては 使えなくなってしもたけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、旦さんが降りた以上、最後の手立ては
使えなくなってしもたけど。

engChrName: Trump card? I think you mean shit plan.
engSearchText: Trump card? I think you mean shit plan.
jpnChrName: ハッ……最悪の手立ての間違いだろ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ……最悪の手立ての間違いだろ？

engChrName: I'm surprised you aren't more up in arms about this. Aren't you on the same side as the Oathbreaker?
engSearchText:
I'm surprised you aren't more up in arms about this.
Aren't you on the same side as the Oathbreaker?
jpnChrName: てか、お前さんも破戒と同じ古巣の癖して 別に肩を持つわけでもねぇのか。
jpnSearchText:
てか、お前さんも破戒と同じ古巣の癖して
別に肩を持つわけでもねぇのか。

engChrName: The longer I've been with that man, the more clearly I've seen him for who he truly is: wicked and repulsive.
engSearchText:
The longer I've been with that man, the more clearly
I've seen him for who he truly is: wicked
and repulsive.
jpnChrName: うふふ、一緒にいればいるほど、 悪趣味っぷりも身に染みて判るしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、一緒にいればいるほど、
悪趣味っぷりも身に染みて判るしねぇ。

engChrName: Anyway, I believe a frontal assault on the palace may be our only option now.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I believe a frontal assault on the palace may
be our only option now.
jpnChrName: ま、たまにはうちらも正攻法で 行くのも悪くは無さそうやし……
jpnSearchText:
ま、たまにはうちらも正攻法で
行くのも悪くは無さそうやし……

engChrName: It's not the most elegant solution, but it'll do, I suppose.
engSearchText:
It's not the most elegant solution, but it'll do,
I suppose.
jpnChrName: 今のうちの主はあくまでも 盟主はんに他ならへんしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
今のうちの主はあくまでも
盟主はんに他ならへんしなぁ。

engChrName: Just promise me you'll stick to the plan...
engSearchText: Just promise me you'll stick to the plan...
jpnChrName: ……あんたの事も信用したくはねぇが…… ま、せいぜい正攻法を貫いてくれる事を願うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……あんたの事も信用したくはねぇが……
ま、せいぜい正攻法を貫いてくれる事を願うぜ。

engChrName: Witnessing one of his 'perfect crimes' unravel before him was a gratifying sight.
engSearchText:
Witnessing one of his 'perfect crimes' unravel before
him was a gratifying sight.
jpnChrName: うふふ、たまには旦さんを抜いてみるのも また一興──案外、おもろい事になりそうやね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、たまには旦さんを抜いてみるのも
また一興──案外、おもろい事になりそうやね。

engChrName: You have my thanks. It was quite the entertaining spectacle to behold.
engSearchText:
You have my thanks. It was quite the entertaining
spectacle to behold.
jpnChrName: まあ、お兄はんには礼を言わせてもらおか。 なかなか珍しいもんも見れた事やしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お兄はんには礼を言わせてもらおか。
なかなか珍しいもんも見れた事やしねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, my. You look petrified. Could it be that you're more scared of that man than me and Walter dear?
engSearchText:
Oh, my. You look petrified. Could it be that you're
more scared of that man than me and Walter dear?
jpnChrName: うふふ、随分とまあおっかない顔して…… うちやヴァルターはんより旦さんが怖いみたいやなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、随分とまあおっかない顔して……
うちやヴァルターはんより旦さんが怖いみたいやなぁ。

engChrName: Did Renne give you a word of warning, perhaps? She's gotten awfully chatty as of late.
engSearchText:
Did Renne give you a word of warning, perhaps?
She's gotten awfully chatty as of late.
jpnChrName: レンに何か教えてもろた？ あの子もすっかり親切になったもんやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
レンに何か教えてもろた？
あの子もすっかり親切になったもんやねぇ。

engChrName: Well, don't you worry your pretty little head. I don't believe he plans to engage in this conflict any further. Not directly, anyway.
engSearchText:
Well, don't you worry your pretty little head. I don't
believe he plans to engage in this conflict any further.
Not directly, anyway.
jpnChrName: ──ま、何にせよ今回は旦さん、直接刃を交える つもりもないからそこは安心しときや？
jpnSearchText:
──ま、何にせよ今回は旦さん、直接刃を交える
つもりもないからそこは安心しときや？

engChrName: *sigh* Her passion did me in, but maybe that's not such a bad thing.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Her passion did me in, but maybe that's not
such a bad thing.
jpnChrName: ふう、この子の熱意には参ったね…… でも、たまには悪くは無いか。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、この子の熱意には参ったね……
でも、たまには悪くは無いか。

engChrName: It sounds like there's something going on that she can't talk about. What exactly is happening here?
engSearchText:
It sounds like there's something going on that she
can't talk about. What exactly is happening here?
jpnChrName: ……それに、どうも何やら言えない事情が あるようだし、何かが起きているのか……？
jpnSearchText:
……それに、どうも何やら言えない事情が
あるようだし、何かが起きているのか……？

engChrName: Could it have something to do with those jaegers that have been spotted around the city?
engSearchText:
Could it have something to do with those jaegers that
have been spotted around the city?
jpnChrName: そういえば、市内で猟兵団と思しき連中も 見かけるが、何か関係が……？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、市内で猟兵団と思しき連中も
見かけるが、何か関係が……？

engChrName: Hmm... Well, I suppose there's no harm in working with her on this, as long as we aren't putting ourselves in danger.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Well, I suppose there's no harm in working
with her on this, as long as we aren't putting ourselves
in danger.
jpnChrName: ふむ……まあ、身を危険に曝さない範囲でなら 恩を売っておいても悪くはないか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……まあ、身を危険に曝さない範囲でなら
恩を売っておいても悪くはないか……

engChrName: Curses... That infernal Bracer Guild is watching my every move.
engSearchText:
Curses... That infernal Bracer Guild is watching my
every move.
jpnChrName: むう……やはりギルドの監視があると どうしようもないか……
jpnSearchText:
むう……やはりギルドの監視があると
どうしようもないか……

engChrName: They've been a thorn in my side for far too long...
engSearchText: They've been a thorn in my side for far too long...
jpnChrName: 連中とは何度かぶつかった事もあるが、 厄介この上ない……
jpnSearchText:
連中とは何度かぶつかった事もあるが、
厄介この上ない……

engChrName: I have no choice but to flee for now. I'll have other chances in the future, but until then, I'll lay low and wait for the dust to settle.
engSearchText:
I have no choice but to flee for now. I'll have other
chances in the future, but until then, I'll lay low and
wait for the dust to settle.
jpnChrName: やむを得まい……いずれまた好機もあるだろう。 悔しいが、ここは大人しく退いてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
やむを得まい……いずれまた好機もあるだろう。
悔しいが、ここは大人しく退いてやるか。

engChrName: I can't do anything with Heiyue watching my every move!
engSearchText:
I can't do anything with Heiyue watching my
every move!
jpnChrName: 黒月……連中の目がある以上、 下手な事をしたらどうなるか……！
jpnSearchText:
黒月……連中の目がある以上、
下手な事をしたらどうなるか……！

engChrName: Damn them... No group of immigrants should hold so much power!
engSearchText:
Damn them... No group of immigrants should hold
so much power!
jpnChrName: 奴らめ……移民の分際であそこまでの力を…… くっ、ここは大人しく引き下がる他無いか……
jpnSearchText:
奴らめ……移民の分際であそこまでの力を……
くっ、ここは大人しく引き下がる他無いか……

engChrName: I'll have to retreat for now... I refuse to fall into their hands...
engSearchText:
I'll have to retreat for now... I refuse to fall into
their hands...
jpnChrName: 奴らの手にかかるような事に なるのはごめんだ……
jpnSearchText:
奴らの手にかかるような事に
なるのはごめんだ……

engChrName: Hmph. The guild has caught on to my activities, so I'll have to retreat for now.
engSearchText:
Hmph. The guild has caught on to my activities, so
I'll have to retreat for now.
jpnChrName: フン、どうもギルドに勘付かれたかもしれんな…… 仕方ない、一旦出直すとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
フン、どうもギルドに勘付かれたかもしれんな……
仕方ない、一旦出直すとしよう。

engChrName: I was hoping to use this chance to draw out those pro-immigrant traitors, but there's no need to rush.
engSearchText:
I was hoping to use this chance to draw out those
pro-immigrant traitors, but there's no need to rush.
jpnChrName: 親移民派の売国奴共、この機に炙り出して やりたかったが……まあ、急く事もあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
親移民派の売国奴共、この機に炙り出して
やりたかったが……まあ、急く事もあるまい。

engChrName: I have many friends in powerful places, after all. Another chance will reveal itself to me eventually.
engSearchText:
I have many friends in powerful places, after all.
Another chance will reveal itself to me eventually.
jpnChrName: “あの方々”の力添えもある、 機会などまた巡ってくるだろうさ……
jpnSearchText:
“あの方々”の力添えもある、
機会などまた巡ってくるだろうさ……

engChrName: It's not often that I get to lay my eyes on antiques and rarities from the free cities.
engSearchText:
It's not often that I get to lay my eyes on antiques and
rarities from the free cities.
jpnChrName: ふふ、自由都市圏の掘り出し物…… 実に楽しみだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、自由都市圏の掘り出し物……
実に楽しみだねぇ。

engChrName: If I'm going all the way up there, I might as well slip in a visit to Arteria and Leman—
engSearchText:
If I'm going all the way up there, I might as well slip
in a visit to Arteria and Leman—
jpnChrName: しかし、あちらまで足を延ばすなら アルテリア法国やレマン方面にも──
jpnSearchText:
しかし、あちらまで足を延ばすなら
アルテリア法国やレマン方面にも──

engChrName: Wait, if I did that, then I wouldn't be able to make it home in time for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Wait, if I did that, then I wouldn't be able to make it
home in time for the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: って流石に記念祭までに 戻ってこれなくなりそうだし、またの機会かな。
jpnSearchText:
って流石に記念祭までに
戻ってこれなくなりそうだし、またの機会かな。

engChrName: I've known Pershing for a long time.
engSearchText: I've known Pershing for a long time.
jpnChrName: ここの彼とはそれなりに長い付き合いでね。
jpnSearchText: ここの彼とはそれなりに長い付き合いでね。

engChrName: I often swing by to trade for the old kingdom's gear-based devices, which are found in the underground ruins. We do a lot of business together.
engSearchText:
I often swing by to trade for the old kingdom's
gear-based devices, which are found in the
underground ruins. We do a lot of business together.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの地下遺構からも王国時代の歯車仕掛け なんかは時折見つかるから、取引も多いんだ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの地下遺構からも王国時代の歯車仕掛け
なんかは時折見つかるから、取引も多いんだ。

engChrName: I wouldn't call us the best of friends, or anything of the sort, but he helps me out from time to time.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't call us the best of friends, or anything
of the sort, but he helps me out from time to time.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼との仲はそれだけでもないが……今回 頼りにしたいのは北方諸国との伝手だからね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼との仲はそれだけでもないが……今回
頼りにしたいのは北方諸国との伝手だからね。

engChrName: Well, I wasn't expecting a visit from you today. What brings you to Oración?
engSearchText:
Well, I wasn't expecting a visit from you today.
What brings you to Oración?
jpnChrName: 久しいなフィレンコフ、長らく国外に 行っていたと思うんだが……
jpnSearchText:
久しいなフィレンコフ、長らく国外に
行っていたと思うんだが……

engChrName: Don't you have a store and kids to look after?
engSearchText: Don't you have a store and kids to look after?
jpnChrName: どうしてこのタイミングでオラシオンへ？ 店と子供達は良いのか？
jpnSearchText:
どうしてこのタイミングでオラシオンへ？
店と子供達は良いのか？

engChrName: Haha. I'm sure the kids are doing just fine. I'll be home by the Revolution Festival, anyway.
engSearchText:
Haha. I'm sure the kids are doing just fine. I'll be
home by the Revolution Festival, anyway.
jpnChrName: はは、記念祭までには流石に帰るさ。
jpnSearchText: はは、記念祭までには流石に帰るさ。

engChrName: But first, I need to get my hands on some of those antiques over in the free cities.
engSearchText:
But first, I need to get my hands on some of those
antiques over in the free cities.
jpnChrName: だが、自由都市圏の方の 掘り出し物について話を聞いてね。
jpnSearchText:
だが、自由都市圏の方の
掘り出し物について話を聞いてね。

engChrName: You've worked with traders in the free cities before, haven't you?
engSearchText:
You've worked with traders in the free cities before,
haven't you?
jpnChrName: パーシング、確か君は自由都市の交易商とも よろしくやっていたろう？
jpnSearchText:
パーシング、確か君は自由都市の交易商とも
よろしくやっていたろう？

engChrName: I was just thinking that my trip there would go much more smoothly if I had a guide.
engSearchText:
I was just thinking that my trip there would go much
more smoothly if I had a guide.
jpnChrName: 水先案内人がいてくれれば、自由都市圏の旅も 円滑に進むだろうと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
水先案内人がいてくれれば、自由都市圏の旅も
円滑に進むだろうと思ってね。

engChrName: You asking me to act as an intermediary? Sure, I can handle that.
engSearchText:
You asking me to act as an intermediary? Sure, I can
handle that.
jpnChrName: ははあ、それで俺に仲介を頼むってか…… まあ、別に良いけどよ……
jpnSearchText:
ははあ、それで俺に仲介を頼むってか……
まあ、別に良いけどよ……

engChrName: In fact, I know a guy who can help you out.
engSearchText: In fact, I know a guy who can help you out.
jpnChrName: あんた、こうやって芋づる式に交換屋やら 何やらのツテが増えてくんだろうなァ。
jpnSearchText:
あんた、こうやって芋づる式に交換屋やら
何やらのツテが増えてくんだろうなァ。

engChrName: So you're the guy who Pershing was talkin' about. You wanna come with me to the free cities?
engSearchText:
So you're the guy who Pershing was talkin' about.
You wanna come with me to the free cities?
jpnChrName: アンタがパーシングのおやっさんが言ってた人だな、 自由都市圏に同行したいっていう。
jpnSearchText:
アンタがパーシングのおやっさんが言ってた人だな、
自由都市圏に同行したいっていう。

engChrName: That's right. The name's Filenkov, and I'll go anywhere that has rare knickknacks to be found.
engSearchText:
That's right. The name's Filenkov, and I'll go
anywhere that has rare knickknacks to be found.
jpnChrName: ああ、珍しいジャンクの気配が少しでもしたら、 どこへ繰り出すのも惜しまないフィレンコフさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、珍しいジャンクの気配が少しでもしたら、
どこへ繰り出すのも惜しまないフィレンコフさ。

engChrName: A little birdie told me some antique parts from the Middle Ages are being dug up in the free cities as we speak!
engSearchText:
A little birdie told me some antique parts from the
Middle Ages are being dug up in the free cities as
we speak!
jpnChrName: はは、何でも自由都市圏で 中世のアンティークパーツが出たと聞いてね！
jpnSearchText:
はは、何でも自由都市圏で
中世のアンティークパーツが出たと聞いてね！

engChrName: I just must go see them with my own eyes!
engSearchText: I just must go see them with my own eyes!
jpnChrName: これはもう迷ってる余地なんて無いさ！！
jpnSearchText: これはもう迷ってる余地なんて無いさ！！

engChrName: ...You're pretty passionate about this, aren't you?
engSearchText: ...You're pretty passionate about this, aren't you?
jpnChrName: お、おう……俺はそっち系の話に 詳しいワケじゃないが……
jpnSearchText:
お、おう……俺はそっち系の話に
詳しいワケじゃないが……

engChrName: I can see that little twinkle in your eye. You look like a kid in a candy store.
engSearchText:
I can see that little twinkle in your eye. You look like
a kid in a candy store.
jpnChrName: アンタ、凄い目を輝かせやがって…… まるで無邪気な子供みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ、凄い目を輝かせやがって……
まるで無邪気な子供みたいだな。
