engChrName: My apologies if my excitement was a tad off-putting. People often tell me my curiosity's like that of a child.
engSearchText:
My apologies if my excitement was a tad off-putting.
People often tell me my curiosity's like that of
a child.
jpnChrName: ふむ、やはりおかしいかね？　たまーに 好奇心が子供のようだと評されるんだけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、やはりおかしいかね？　たまーに
好奇心が子供のようだと評されるんだけどねぇ。

engChrName: I can see why, but I don't think that's a bad thing. I'm sure this'll make for a fun trip.
engSearchText:
I can see why, but I don't think that's a bad thing.
I'm sure this'll make for a fun trip.
jpnChrName: まあ、変わっちゃいるが……良いんじゃねえか？ 一緒にいて面白そうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、変わっちゃいるが……良いんじゃねえか？
一緒にいて面白そうだしな。

engChrName: I'm only gonna guide you part of the way there, so if you're fine with that, then let's get goin'.
engSearchText:
I'm only gonna guide you part of the way there, so if
you're fine with that, then let's get goin'.
jpnChrName: ま、案内なんて出来んのは途中までだし、 それ以上の期待はせんでくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、案内なんて出来んのは途中までだし、
それ以上の期待はせんでくれよ。

engChrName: Now that these two are okay, I'm going to get back to work.
engSearchText:
Now that these two are okay, I'm going to get back
to work.
jpnChrName: お二人の無事も確認できましたし、 そろそろ僕は戻らせてもらいましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
お二人の無事も確認できましたし、
そろそろ僕は戻らせてもらいましょうか。

engChrName: I'll need to reflect on my mistakes so that this never happens again.
engSearchText:
I'll need to reflect on my mistakes so that this never
happens again.
jpnChrName: 二度とこのような事が起きないように 私も反省しなければいけませんね。
jpnSearchText:
二度とこのような事が起きないように
私も反省しなければいけませんね。

engChrName: Thank you so much, everyone!
engSearchText: Thank you so much, everyone!
jpnChrName: 皆さん、改めて本当に ありがとうございました……！
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、改めて本当に
ありがとうございました……！

engChrName: I can't believe I lost track of those tourists!
engSearchText: I can't believe I lost track of those tourists!
jpnChrName: 旅行客を見失ってしまうなんて、 あるまじき事です……！
jpnSearchText:
旅行客を見失ってしまうなんて、
あるまじき事です……！

engChrName: I have to do something, and quick!
engSearchText: I have to do something, and quick!
jpnChrName: ああ、早く何とかしないと……
jpnSearchText: ああ、早く何とかしないと……

engChrName: I really hope they accept my request...
engSearchText: I really hope they accept my request...
jpnChrName: その為にも、あの依頼を 受けてもらえるといいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
その為にも、あの依頼を
受けてもらえるといいのですが……

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe they got so angry just because I saw their faces...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't believe they got so angry just because I
saw their faces...
jpnChrName: はぁ……素顔を見ちゃっただけで まさかあんなに怒るなんて……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……素顔を見ちゃっただけで
まさかあんなに怒るなんて……

engChrName: Those guys were terrifying, but we got through it, thanks to you guys.
engSearchText:
Those guys were terrifying, but we got through it,
thanks to you guys.
jpnChrName: 本当に恐ろしかったですけど、 カレと皆さんのおかげで助かりました。
jpnSearchText:
本当に恐ろしかったですけど、
カレと皆さんのおかげで助かりました。

engChrName: I'll make sure to take the warnings of tour guides seriously from now on.
engSearchText:
I'll make sure to take the warnings of tour guides
seriously from now on.
jpnChrName: 今度からはちゃんとガイドさんの 言う事を聞くようにしないと……
jpnSearchText:
今度からはちゃんとガイドさんの
言う事を聞くようにしないと……

engChrName: What the heck is 'airsoft,' anyway?
engSearchText: What the heck is 'airsoft,' anyway?
jpnChrName: サバイバルゲーム……略してサバゲーだったか？
jpnSearchText: サバイバルゲーム……略してサバゲーだったか？

engChrName: Doesn't sound like a fun sport to me.
engSearchText: Doesn't sound like a fun sport to me.
jpnChrName: あんなに恐ろしい遊びがあるだなんてな…… 本当の猟兵かと思ってビビったぜ……
jpnSearchText:
あんなに恐ろしい遊びがあるだなんてな……
本当の猟兵かと思ってビビったぜ……

engChrName: Those guys were like jaegers, so I guess we should count ourselves lucky that we made it out safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Those guys were like jaegers, so I guess we should
count ourselves lucky that we made it out safe
and sound.
jpnChrName: なんにせよ俺も彼女も無事に 戻って来れて本当に良かった。
jpnSearchText:
なんにせよ俺も彼女も無事に
戻って来れて本当に良かった。

engChrName: I can't believe we did something so stupid. We only came here to enjoy ourselves...
engSearchText:
I can't believe we did something so stupid. We only
came here to enjoy ourselves...
jpnChrName: 折角の観光だからこそ 馬鹿な事はしないようにしないとな……
jpnSearchText:
折角の観光だからこそ
馬鹿な事はしないようにしないとな……

engChrName: *sigh* Officer Crema is supposed to be on duty right now.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Officer Crema is supposed to be on duty
right now.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……この時間はクレマ巡査が 当直のはずだったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……この時間はクレマ巡査が
当直のはずだったのですが。

engChrName: She said she had urgent business to attend to and went off somewhere.
engSearchText:
She said she had urgent business to attend to and
went off somewhere.
jpnChrName: 火急の用事が出来たそうで、 どこかに行ってしまったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
火急の用事が出来たそうで、
どこかに行ってしまったんですよ。

engChrName: I haven't heard from her since then. I sure hope she's okay.
engSearchText:
I haven't heard from her since then. I sure hope
she's okay.
jpnChrName: あれ以来なんの報告もありませんが…… クレマ巡査の方は大丈夫でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
あれ以来なんの報告もありませんが……
クレマ巡査の方は大丈夫でしょうか……？

engChrName: There're a lot of powerful players here. We've got the mafia, the Gardens, and all these other random groups.
engSearchText:
There're a lot of powerful players here. We've got the
mafia, the Gardens, and all these other
random groups.
jpnChrName: 例のマフィアに《庭園》…… 他にも中々の面子が集まりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
例のマフィアに《庭園》……
他にも中々の面子が集まりそうだ。

engChrName: Heehee. We have our work cut out for us, don't we?
engSearchText: Heehee. We have our work cut out for us, don't we?
jpnChrName: ふふ、ここまでの顔触れとなると “仕事”も簡単には行かないかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ここまでの顔触れとなると
“仕事”も簡単には行かないかな？

engChrName: On the contrary, I believe we could have this whole ordeal settled by the end of the day.
engSearchText:
On the contrary, I believe we could have this whole
ordeal settled by the end of the day.
jpnChrName: その気になれば一両日中にでも。
jpnSearchText: その気になれば一両日中にでも。

engChrName: But I assume you wish to use this rare opportunity to determine what direction this continent is headed.
engSearchText:
But I assume you wish to use this rare opportunity to
determine what direction this continent is headed.
jpnChrName: ですが──今後の大陸の趨勢を占う 前哨戦となるのも確かかと。
jpnSearchText:
ですが──今後の大陸の趨勢を占う
前哨戦となるのも確かかと。

engChrName: Yep. Plus I'll bet there's gonna be a lot of fun surprises by the end, so we should let this show run its course.
engSearchText:
Yep. Plus I'll bet there's gonna be a lot of fun
surprises by the end, so we should let this show run
its course.
jpnChrName: うん、サプライズもありそうだし、 早めに終わったら勿体ないかもね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、サプライズもありそうだし、
早めに終わったら勿体ないかもね。

engChrName: Can't say I'm thrilled about havin' another run-in with that freak from the Gardens...
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm thrilled about havin' another run-in
with that freak from the Gardens...
jpnChrName: クク……アンタが放置してた 悪趣味極まる“庭”の方はともかく。
jpnSearchText:
クク……アンタが放置してた
悪趣味極まる“庭”の方はともかく。

engChrName: ...but I'm still psyched as hell for this thing. That Dantès guy sure knows how to throw a party.
engSearchText:
...but I'm still psyched as hell for this thing.
That Dantès guy sure knows how to throw a party.
jpnChrName: 仕掛け人（イベンター）としては中々じゃねえか、 ジェラールとかいう野郎も。
jpnSearchText:
仕掛け人（イベンター）としては中々じゃねえか、
ジェラールとかいう野郎も。

engChrName: Well, good host or not, that man is a veritable monster. He's almost as bad as our friend in the silly blue coat.
engSearchText:
Well, good host or not, that man is a
veritable monster. He's almost as bad as our friend in
the silly blue coat.
jpnChrName: うふふ、どうやら旦さん並みに えげつない事を考えてそうやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、どうやら旦さん並みに
えげつない事を考えてそうやねぇ。

engChrName: Hey, now. I resent that. I'll have you know I'm a model gentleman.
engSearchText:
Hey, now. I resent that. I'll have you know I'm a
model gentleman.
jpnChrName: 失礼だねぇキミたち。 こんな善良なオジサンを捕まえて。
jpnSearchText:
失礼だねぇキミたち。
こんな善良なオジサンを捕まえて。

engChrName: One thing's for certain, though. This is going to be a festival to remember.
engSearchText:
One thing's for certain, though. This is going to be a
festival to remember.
jpnChrName: さぁて──どんな風に ゾクゾクさせてくれんのかねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
さぁて──どんな風に
ゾクゾクさせてくれんのかねぇ？

engChrName: These ruins have existed since the days when this country was a kingdom—and when this city was its capital.
engSearchText:
These ruins have existed since the days when this
country was a kingdom—and when this city was
its capital.
jpnChrName: 旧王都であるオラシオンの地下には、 カルバード王国時代の遺構が広がっている。
jpnSearchText:
旧王都であるオラシオンの地下には、
カルバード王国時代の遺構が広がっている。

engChrName: They shall serve as the arena for our game. Once you have bathed in the blood of your peers, you will earn the right to challenge one of my pawns.
engSearchText:
They shall serve as the arena for our game. Once you
have bathed in the blood of your peers, you will earn
the right to challenge one of my pawns.
jpnChrName: そこをゲームの領域に見立て、各自潰し合った後、 こちらの“駒”とやり合ってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
そこをゲームの領域に見立て、各自潰し合った後、
こちらの“駒”とやり合ってもらう。

engChrName: Should you take all of my pieces, the last team standing will have the opportunity to checkmate me here in Vashtar Palace.
engSearchText:
Should you take all of my pieces, the last team
standing will have the opportunity to checkmate me
here in Vashtar Palace.
jpnChrName: そうして最後まで生き残った者たちだけが この《ヴァシュタール宮跡》に辿り着ける──
jpnSearchText:
そうして最後まで生き残った者たちだけが
この《ヴァシュタール宮跡》に辿り着ける──

engChrName: That is the long and short of it.
engSearchText: That is the long and short of it.
jpnChrName: まあ、そんな趣向だ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そんな趣向だ。

engChrName: He wants us to duke it out in a battle royale?!
engSearchText: He wants us to duke it out in a battle royale?!
jpnChrName: 各勢力による潰し合い（バトルロイヤル）だと……！？
jpnSearchText: 各勢力による潰し合い（バトルロイヤル）だと……！？

engChrName: They must be sick in the head if they think we'll play along with this insanity—
engSearchText:
They must be sick in the head if they think we'll play
along with this insanity—
jpnChrName: ふ、ふざけんじゃないわよ。 そんなの誰が付き合うと──
jpnSearchText:
ふ、ふざけんじゃないわよ。
そんなの誰が付き合うと──

engChrName: Ah! I should mention that participation is compulsory, so I would not skip out on this if I were you.
engSearchText:
Ah! I should mention that participation is
compulsory, so I would not skip out on this if I
were you.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちなみに参加は強制だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ちなみに参加は強制だ。

engChrName: That is, if you value your own lives—as well as those of the 280,000 innocents in this city.
engSearchText:
That is, if you value your own lives—as well as those
of the 280,000 innocents in this city.
jpnChrName: オラシオン市民２８万の命もろとも 消え去りたくなければな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン市民２８万の命もろとも
消え去りたくなければな。

engChrName: Th-That's a nuclear weapon!
engSearchText: Th-That's a nuclear weapon!
jpnChrName: は、反応兵器……！
jpnSearchText: は、反応兵器……！

engChrName: Just like the one that destroyed Creil...
engSearchText: Just like the one that destroyed Creil...
jpnChrName: ……クレイユを滅ぼした……
jpnSearchText: ……クレイユを滅ぼした……

engChrName: They had another one of those damn things after all.
engSearchText: They had another one of those damn things after all.
jpnChrName: ……やはり、 まだ持っていやがったか。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり、
まだ持っていやがったか。

engChrName: That must be the last of Professor Callaghan's incomplete prototypes.
engSearchText:
That must be the last of Professor Callaghan's
incomplete prototypes.
jpnChrName: ああ……恐らくキャラハン先生が 試作した、未完成品の最後の一つ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……恐らくキャラハン先生が
試作した、未完成品の最後の一つ……

engChrName: I trust that an explanation of this device's capabilities is unnecessary.
engSearchText:
I trust that an explanation of this device's capabilities
is unnecessary.
jpnChrName: これが“何”なのかは 今さら説明するまでもないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
これが“何”なのかは
今さら説明するまでもないだろう。

engChrName: This game has a number of rules that govern participation, the evacuation of civilians, and other such matters.
engSearchText:
This game has a number of rules that govern
participation, the evacuation of civilians, and other
such matters.
jpnChrName: お前たちの参加拒否、当局の介入や住民避難を含め、 ゲームには幾つかの“ルール”を用意してある。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちの参加拒否、当局の介入や住民避難を含め、
ゲームには幾つかの“ルール”を用意してある。

engChrName: Should anyone break the rules, the device will instantly detonate, sending everyone straight to the afterlife, whether that be heaven or Gehenna.
engSearchText:
Should anyone break the rules, the device will
instantly detonate, sending everyone straight to the
afterlife, whether that be heaven or Gehenna.
jpnChrName: 破った時点で、コイツは即座に“起爆”する── その時は全員が女神行き、ないし煉獄行きだ。
jpnSearchText:
破った時点で、コイツは即座に“起爆”する──
その時は全員が女神行き、ないし煉獄行きだ。

engChrName: Rule violations will be assessed on a case-by-case basis by an impartial surveillance system, which is run by this relic.
engSearchText:
Rule violations will be assessed on a case-by-case
basis by an impartial surveillance system, which is run
by this relic.
jpnChrName: 裁定を下すのはこの装置──こちらの “とある遺産”を利用した監視システムになる。
jpnSearchText:
裁定を下すのはこの装置──こちらの
“とある遺産”を利用した監視システムになる。

engChrName: The sixth Genesis!
engSearchText: The sixth Genesis!
jpnChrName: 第６の《ゲネシス》……！
jpnSearchText: 第６の《ゲネシス》……！

engChrName: We knew it would be involved in some manner.
engSearchText: We knew it would be involved in some manner.
jpnChrName: やはり関わっていましたか……
jpnSearchText: やはり関わっていましたか……

engChrName: The device's judgment is absolute. Do not think you can pull the wool over its all-seeing eye.
engSearchText:
The device's judgment is absolute. Do not think you
can pull the wool over its all-seeing eye.
jpnChrName: この装置の裁定（ジャッジ）は絶対だ。 出し抜くことは不可能だと断言しておこう。
jpnSearchText:
この装置の裁定（ジャッジ）は絶対だ。
出し抜くことは不可能だと断言しておこう。

engChrName: Should you wish to face me in battle, you must eliminate the other teams and conquer the game. It really is that simple.
engSearchText:
Should you wish to face me in battle, you must
eliminate the other teams and conquer the game.
It really is that simple.
jpnChrName: 俺たちに用があるなら このゲームに参加し、勝ち残るしかない。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちに用があるなら
このゲームに参加し、勝ち残るしかない。

engChrName: I do hope you will enjoy this carnival that we have dutifully prepared. I know that I will.
engSearchText:
I do hope you will enjoy this carnival that we have
dutifully prepared. I know that I will.
jpnChrName: 俺たちが用意した最高の“謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）”── せいぜい愉しんでいってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちが用意した最高の“謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）”──
せいぜい愉しんでいってくれ。

engChrName: Figured I'd find you here.
engSearchText: Figured I'd find you here.
jpnChrName: やっぱ、ここにいたか。
jpnSearchText: やっぱ、ここにいたか。

engChrName: Hey, c'mon! At least hear me out, will ya?
engSearchText: Hey, c'mon! At least hear me out, will ya?
jpnChrName: 待て待て、逃げるな。 別に捕まえに来たわけじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
待て待て、逃げるな。
別に捕まえに来たわけじゃねえ。

engChrName: As you can see, I came alone, and no one followed me. I just wanna chat. Promise.
engSearchText:
As you can see, I came alone, and no one
followed me. I just wanna chat. Promise.
jpnChrName: 一人で来てるのは気配で分かるだろ？ 少しくらい話に付き合えや。
jpnSearchText:
一人で来てるのは気配で分かるだろ？
少しくらい話に付き合えや。
………………………………

engChrName: All right, then.
engSearchText: All right, then.
jpnChrName: ……分かったわ。
jpnSearchText: ……分かったわ。

engChrName: I thought maybe Zin had asked you to come and get me.
engSearchText:
I thought maybe Zin had asked you to come and
get me.
jpnChrName: ジンさんに頼まれて私を 連れ戻しに来たわけでもなさそうね。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんに頼まれて私を
連れ戻しに来たわけでもなさそうね。

engChrName: So, how did you know to find me here?
engSearchText: So, how did you know to find me here?
jpnChrName: ……そもそもどうして、 ここだって分かったのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……そもそもどうして、
ここだって分かったのかしら？

engChrName: 'Cause back when we were little, you'd always come to this spot whenever you got upset.
engSearchText:
'Cause back when we were little, you'd always come
to this spot whenever you got upset.
jpnChrName: お前は嫌なことがあったら よくここに来てたからな。
jpnSearchText:
お前は嫌なことがあったら
よくここに来てたからな。

engChrName: Might've been fifteen years ago, but I still remember that clear as day.
engSearchText:
Might've been fifteen years ago, but I still remember
that clear as day.
jpnChrName: １５年も前だが──ちゃんと覚えてる。
jpnSearchText: １５年も前だが──ちゃんと覚えてる。
……………………………

engChrName: Also, I'm the hide-and-seek master, remember? I beat you every time when we played it as kids.
engSearchText:
Also, I'm the hide-and-seek master, remember? I beat
you every time when we played it as kids.
jpnChrName: それにガキの頃、一度でも俺に 隠れんぼで勝ったことがあるかよ？
jpnSearchText:
それにガキの頃、一度でも俺に
隠れんぼで勝ったことがあるかよ？

engChrName: ...You're going to hold that over my head for the rest of my life, aren't you?
engSearchText:
...You're going to hold that over my head for the rest
of my life, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ……ホントずるいわね、 裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
……ホントずるいわね、
裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: Of course. What're friends for?
engSearchText: Of course. What're friends for?
jpnChrName: いや、このくらいは 幼馴染の特権でいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、このくらいは
幼馴染の特権でいいだろ。

engChrName: Now, you had something you wanted to say to me, right? Out with it, then.
engSearchText:
Now, you had something you wanted to say to
me, right? Out with it, then.
jpnChrName: ……話をしに来たんでしょう？ なにか言ってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
……話をしに来たんでしょう？
なにか言ってちょうだい。

engChrName: Actually, I had a lot I wanted to say to you, but...now I'm having second thoughts about whether I should lay it all out.
engSearchText:
Actually, I had a lot I wanted to say to you, but...now
I'm having second thoughts about whether I should
lay it all out.
jpnChrName: ……色々聞きたいと思ったが、 なんかもういいかって気がしてな。
jpnSearchText:
……色々聞きたいと思ったが、
なんかもういいかって気がしてな。

engChrName: Are you holding back because...I'm annoying to deal with?
engSearchText:
Are you holding back because...I'm annoying to
deal with?
jpnChrName: ……面倒な女だから？
jpnSearchText: ……面倒な女だから？

engChrName: I mean, you can be a handful sometimes...
engSearchText: I mean, you can be a handful sometimes...
jpnChrName: 自覚あんのかよ……
jpnSearchText: <S3>自覚あんのかよ……

engChrName: Sorry, sorry. What I meant was...I just think I'm gonna have trouble getting through to you right now.
engSearchText:
Sorry, sorry. What I meant was...I just think I'm
gonna have trouble getting through to you right now.
jpnChrName: そうじゃねえ、なんつーか…… 多分何を聞いて話しても無駄だろ。
jpnSearchText:
そうじゃねえ、なんつーか……
多分何を聞いて話しても無駄だろ。

engChrName: Once you've set your mind to something, no one— not even Aidios Herself—can do anything to get you to change course.
engSearchText:
Once you've set your mind to something, no one—
not even Aidios Herself—can do anything to get you
to change course.
jpnChrName: お前がそこまでやったら もう誰の言葉も聞き入れやしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お前がそこまでやったら
もう誰の言葉も聞き入れやしねぇ。

engChrName: That's always how you've been. Stubborn to a fault.
engSearchText: That's always how you've been. Stubborn to a fault.
jpnChrName: 昔から変な所で頑固だからな。
jpnSearchText: 昔から変な所で頑固だからな。

engChrName: That makes two of us.
engSearchText: That makes two of us.
jpnChrName: 貴方に言われてもね……
jpnSearchText: 貴方に言われてもね……

engChrName: Yeah, but you're a special case...in more ways than one.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but you're a special case...in more ways
than one.
jpnChrName: 大体お前は、昔から規格外なんだよ。
jpnSearchText: 大体お前は、昔から規格外なんだよ。

engChrName: You're the daughter of the biggest family in the entire region—and you were always off playin' with some problematic, orphaned punk.
engSearchText:
You're the daughter of the biggest family in the entire
region—and you were always off playin' with some
problematic, orphaned punk.
jpnChrName: 地元一の名家の跡取り娘なのに 孤児院のガキと構わずつるんで──
jpnSearchText:
地元一の名家の跡取り娘なのに
孤児院のガキと構わずつるんで──

engChrName: Then you left for Aramis and became its Student Council president, but after graduation, you went against your dad's wishes and joined the guild.
engSearchText:
Then you left for Aramis and became its Student
Council president, but after graduation, you went
against your dad's wishes and joined the guild.
jpnChrName: 首都の名門校の生徒会長までやりながら 実家とやり合って卒業後はまさかのギルド入り。
jpnSearchText:
首都の名門校の生徒会長までやりながら
実家とやり合って卒業後はまさかのギルド入り。

engChrName: And from there, you went on to make great strides as a bracer and reached A-rank in no time flat—and here you are now, running off on your own.
engSearchText:
And from there, you went on to make great strides as
a bracer and reached A-rank in no time flat—and
here you are now, running off on your own.
jpnChrName: 最年少でＡ級を取ったかと思えば 今度はギルドからいきなり出奔とは。
jpnSearchText:
最年少でＡ級を取ったかと思えば
今度はギルドからいきなり出奔とは。

engChrName: You're a model student at heart, but you've got one hell of a rebellious streak.
engSearchText:
You're a model student at heart, but you've got one
hell of a rebellious streak.
jpnChrName: 優等生のくせにやらかす事が 不良そのものじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
優等生のくせにやらかす事が
不良そのものじゃねぇか。

engChrName: I wonder where I got that from? Oh, right. It was the troublemaking delinquent who corrupted me from a young age.
engSearchText:
I wonder where I got that from? Oh, right.
It was the troublemaking delinquent who
corrupted me from a young age.
jpnChrName: だとしたらきっと本物の不良の 貴方に影響されたからよ。
jpnSearchText:
だとしたらきっと本物の不良の
貴方に影響されたからよ。

engChrName: Everything that's gone wrong in my life traces back to you.
engSearchText:
Everything that's gone wrong in my life traces back
to you.
jpnChrName: 全部、貴方が悪いわ。
jpnSearchText: 全部、貴方が悪いわ。

engChrName: Pinning it all on me, huh?
engSearchText: Pinning it all on me, huh?
jpnChrName: 俺のせいかよ……
jpnSearchText: 俺のせいかよ……

engChrName: And why wouldn't I? You're the very reason I became estranged from my father in the first place.
engSearchText:
And why wouldn't I? You're the very reason I became
estranged from my father in the first place.
jpnChrName: そうよ、貴方のせい。 そもそも私が父と疎遠になったのも。
jpnSearchText:
そうよ、貴方のせい。
そもそも私が父と疎遠になったのも。

engChrName: He was behind your sudden disappearance fourteen years ago, wasn't he?
engSearchText:
He was behind your sudden disappearance fourteen
years ago, wasn't he?
jpnChrName: １４年前、貴方が突然いなくなったのは、 本当は父が何かしたからなんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
１４年前、貴方が突然いなくなったのは、
本当は父が何かしたからなんでしょう？

engChrName: Your 'adoption' was arranged by him personally. He sent you away—just to force you out of my life.
engSearchText:
Your 'adoption' was arranged by him personally.
He sent you away—just to force you out of my life.
jpnChrName: 身寄りのなかった貴方を煙たがって、 孤児院に“里親”まで手配して……
jpnSearchText:
身寄りのなかった貴方を煙たがって、
孤児院に“里親”まで手配して……

engChrName: And then...you...
engSearchText: And then...you...
jpnChrName: それで、貴方は……
jpnSearchText: それで、貴方は……

engChrName: ...You're right. It's all my fault.
engSearchText: ...You're right. It's all my fault.
jpnChrName: ……ま、確かに俺のせいか。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、確かに俺のせいか。

engChrName: Exactly. I blame you for everything.
engSearchText: Exactly. I blame you for everything.
jpnChrName: そうよ。 全部、貴方のせい。
jpnSearchText:
そうよ。
全部、貴方のせい。

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. I don't know why I'm taking this out on you.
engSearchText:
...I'm sorry. I don't know why I'm taking this out
on you.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、ウソ。
jpnSearchText: ごめんなさい、ウソ。

engChrName: You did nothing wrong. I know full well the fault lies squarely with me.
engSearchText:
You did nothing wrong. I know full well the fault lies
squarely with me.
jpnChrName: 本当は分かっているのよ、 全部、私のせいだって。
jpnSearchText:
本当は分かっているのよ、
全部、私のせいだって。

engChrName: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry... Please forgive me.
engSearchText: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry... Please forgive me.
jpnChrName: ………本当に、ごめんなさい。
jpnSearchText: ………本当に、ごめんなさい。

engChrName: No. I won't.
engSearchText: No. I won't.
jpnChrName: いいや、許せねえな。
jpnSearchText: いいや、許せねえな。
……っ………

engChrName: And that's because you had it right the first time. It's not your fault—it's mine.
engSearchText:
And that's because you had it right the first time.
It's not your fault—it's mine.
jpnChrName: 勝手に人の責任を奪うんじゃねぇ。 全部、俺のせいだ。
jpnSearchText:
勝手に人の責任を奪うんじゃねぇ。
全部、俺のせいだ。

engChrName: I wrecked your life—I drove it right off the rails and sent it careening off the cliff. Even now, my presence is making it spiral further down...
engSearchText:
I wrecked your life—I drove it right off the rails and
sent it careening off the cliff. Even now, my presence
is making it spiral further down...
jpnChrName: お前をそうさせちまったのも、 ……ひょっとしたらこの事態を──
jpnSearchText:
お前をそうさせちまったのも、
……ひょっとしたらこの事態を──

engChrName: What do you mean by that?
engSearchText: What do you mean by that?
jpnChrName: ヴァン……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……？

engChrName: You can lift the guilt off your shoulders and pile the blame on mine. If that puts you at ease, then I'll gladly carry it for you, Lainey.
engSearchText:
You can lift the guilt off your shoulders and pile the
blame on mine. If that puts you at ease, then I'll
gladly carry it for you, Lainey.
jpnChrName: ……全部俺のせいでいい。 だから一人で背負い込むな、エレ公。
jpnSearchText:
……全部俺のせいでいい。
だから一人で背負い込むな、エレ公。

engChrName: If you can't rely on the pampered prince or the guild, you can always turn to me. That's what I'm here fo—
engSearchText:
If you can't rely on the pampered prince or the guild,
you can always turn to me. That's what I'm here fo—
jpnChrName: ルネ坊ちゃんに、ギルドも頼れないなら せめて俺だけでも──
jpnSearchText:
ルネ坊ちゃんに、ギルドも頼れないなら
せめて俺だけでも──

engChrName: There you go again.
engSearchText: There you go again.
jpnChrName: やっぱりずるいわ、貴方って……
jpnSearchText: やっぱりずるいわ、貴方って……

engChrName: I'm not going to do that to you, Van.
engSearchText: I'm not going to do that to you, Van.
jpnChrName: でも、ダメよ。
jpnSearchText: でも、ダメよ。

engChrName: I would never put that on your shoulders. You're already carrying so much.
engSearchText:
I would never put that on your shoulders. You're
already carrying so much.
jpnChrName: 今の貴方には、やらなきゃいけない 大事なことがあるでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
今の貴方には、やらなきゃいけない
大事なことがあるでしょう？

engChrName: But I'm not—
engSearchText: But I'm not—
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: Yes, you are. You're holding the weight of everyone's expectations. My guildmates, René, and... even the society are all counting on you.
engSearchText:
Yes, you are. You're holding the weight of
everyone's expectations. My guildmates, René, and...
even the society are all counting on you.
jpnChrName: みんな貴方たちに期待してる。 ジンさんたちも、ルネも、結社ですらも……
jpnSearchText:
みんな貴方たちに期待してる。
ジンさんたちも、ルネも、結社ですらも……

engChrName: And I am as well.
engSearchText: And I am as well.
jpnChrName: もちろん、私も……
jpnSearchText: もちろん、私も……

engChrName: This twisted game will come to a head tomorrow, and you and your friends are the only ones who can put an end to it.
engSearchText:
This twisted game will come to a head tomorrow, and
you and your friends are the only ones who can put an
end to it.
jpnChrName: 明日終わるゲーム──きっとアルマータと 真に決着を付けられるのは、貴方たちだけ。
jpnSearchText:
明日終わるゲーム──きっとアルマータと
真に決着を付けられるのは、貴方たちだけ。

engChrName: So put me out of your mind. You have more important things to be worrying about right now.
engSearchText:
So put me out of your mind. You have more
important things to be worrying about right now.
jpnChrName: だから…… 私に構う暇なんて、ないでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
だから……
私に構う暇なんて、ないでしょう？

engChrName: I'm quite used to handling my problems on my own, so don't worry about me.
engSearchText:
I'm quite used to handling my problems on my own,
so don't worry about me.
jpnChrName: 一人で、何とかする。
jpnSearchText: 一人で、何とかする。

engChrName: Also, if you're thinking of telling me to lean on someone else, don't. I won't hear it—not until you can practice what you preach.
engSearchText:
Also, if you're thinking of telling me to lean on
someone else, don't. I won't hear it—not until you
can practice what you preach.
jpnChrName: 昔から散々そうしてきた貴方が 文句を言っても、聞かない。
jpnSearchText:
昔から散々そうしてきた貴方が
文句を言っても、聞かない。

engChrName: Tomorrow will be a big day for both of us. I'm going to try and get some rest, and I suggest you do the same.
engSearchText:
Tomorrow will be a big day for both of us. I'm going
to try and get some rest, and I suggest you do
the same.
jpnChrName: 明日はお互い山場になるはず── もう帰って、休んでちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
明日はお互い山場になるはず──
もう帰って、休んでちょうだい。

engChrName: And for the time being...I need you to keep being the person whom I can place my frustrations on.
engSearchText:
And for the time being...I need you to keep being the
person whom I can place my frustrations on.
jpnChrName: ……貴方は今の、私が嫌いな ひどい貴方のままでいて。
jpnSearchText:
……貴方は今の、私が嫌いな
ひどい貴方のままでいて。

engChrName: Elaine, I—
engSearchText: Elaine, I—
jpnChrName: エレイン、俺は──
jpnSearchText: エレイン、俺は──

engChrName: ...What the hell am I even doing?
engSearchText: ...What the hell am I even doing?
jpnChrName: ………何やってんだ、俺は。
jpnSearchText: ………何やってんだ、俺は。

engChrName: The view from here's the same as it always was. Guess some things never change.
engSearchText:
The view from here's the same as it always was.
Guess some things never change.
jpnChrName: ここから見える景色は…… ………何も変わらねぇのにな。
jpnSearchText:
ここから見える景色は……
………何も変わらねぇのにな。

engChrName: *pant* *pant* We're...alive, aren't we?
engSearchText: *pant* *pant* We're...alive, aren't we?
jpnChrName: はあ、はあ…… ……生きて、ますよね……？
jpnSearchText:
はあ、はあ……
……生きて、ますよね……？

engChrName: I-I think so...
engSearchText: I-I think so...
jpnChrName: ……は、はい……なんとか……
jpnSearchText: ……は、はい……なんとか……

engChrName: Why in the HELL did you think that was a good idea?! Are you some kinda maniac?
engSearchText:
Why in the HELL did you think that was a
good idea?! Are you some kinda maniac?
jpnChrName: クソ……あんなとこから ダイブさせるヤツがいるかよ……
jpnSearchText:
クソ……あんなとこから
ダイブさせるヤツがいるかよ……

engChrName: Maniac or not, we're alive, so yeah, I think it was a solid plan.
engSearchText:
Maniac or not, we're alive, so yeah, I think it was a
solid plan.
jpnChrName: 文句言うな…… 助かったんだから結果オーライだろ。
jpnSearchText:
文句言うな……
助かったんだから結果オーライだろ。

engChrName: My attempt to soften our landing with shards proved successful.
engSearchText:
My attempt to soften our landing with shards
proved successful.
jpnChrName: ええ、シャード力場による 衝撃緩和も上手くいきましたし……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、シャード力場による
衝撃緩和も上手くいきましたし……

engChrName: *pant* I wish you remembered that some of us aren't the athletic type...
engSearchText:
*pant* I wish you remembered that some of us aren't
the athletic type...
jpnChrName: はあはあ……インドア派に 無茶させないで欲しいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……インドア派に
無茶させないで欲しいんだけど……

engChrName: That was AWESOME! It felt like we were acting out the climax of a movie or something.
engSearchText:
That was AWESOME! It felt like we were acting
out the climax of a movie or something.
jpnChrName: ああもう、映画のクライマックスみたいで ちょっとアガっちゃったけどね……！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、映画のクライマックスみたいで
ちょっとアガっちゃったけどね……！

engChrName: Heh. As long as everyone is alive and well, I won't complain.
engSearchText:
Heh. As long as everyone is alive and well, I
won't complain.
jpnChrName: フフ……無事で何よりだろう。
jpnSearchText: フフ……無事で何よりだろう。

engChrName: It's finally over...
engSearchText: It's finally over...
jpnChrName: ……終わったんですね……
jpnSearchText: ……終わったんですね……

engChrName: Yeah. We've closed the books on this case.
engSearchText: Yeah. We've closed the books on this case.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、多分な。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、多分な。

engChrName: Though we still have plenty of work ahead of us. And the lives Almata stole will never be returned...
engSearchText:
Though we still have plenty of work ahead of us.
And the lives Almata stole will never be returned...
jpnChrName: 忙しくなるのはこれから…… ヤツらに奪われたモンは戻らねえ。
jpnSearchText:
忙しくなるのはこれから……
ヤツらに奪われたモンは戻らねえ。

engChrName: ...but I think we've paid back the debt we owed those people and then some. For now, that's good enough for me.
engSearchText:
...but I think we've paid back the debt we owed those
people and then some. For now, that's good enough
for me.
jpnChrName: だが、デカすぎる借りは返せた。 ──今はそれで充分だろう。
jpnSearchText:
だが、デカすぎる借りは返せた。
──今はそれで充分だろう。

engChrName: I was finally able to avenge my bros.
engSearchText: I was finally able to avenge my bros.
jpnChrName: ……セイたちの仇も取れたしな。
jpnSearchText: ……セイたちの仇も取れたしな。

engChrName: Yeah. I hope Aida's smiling from up above.
engSearchText: Yeah. I hope Aida's smiling from up above.
jpnChrName: はい……アイーダさんも 喜んでくれてるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
はい……アイーダさんも
喜んでくれてるはずです。

engChrName: I'm sure she is.
engSearchText: I'm sure she is.
jpnChrName: ……ん、きっと。
jpnSearchText: ……ん、きっと。

engChrName: Maybe the people of Basel can rest easy now.
engSearchText: Maybe the people of Basel can rest easy now.
jpnChrName: 博士や先生も 安心してくれるかな……
jpnSearchText:
博士や先生も
安心してくれるかな……

engChrName: Oh! Hey, you guys!
engSearchText: Oh! Hey, you guys!
jpnChrName: ああっ、皆さ～ん……！！
jpnSearchText: ああっ、皆さ～ん……！！

engChrName: Is everyone okay?!
engSearchText: Is everyone okay?!
jpnChrName: みんな、大丈夫なの……！？
jpnSearchText: みんな、大丈夫なの……！？

engChrName: It looks like they're all in one piece, at least.
engSearchText: It looks like they're all in one piece, at least.
jpnChrName: ふう、何とか無事みたいね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、何とか無事みたいね。

engChrName: Renne! Elaine! Marielle!
engSearchText: Renne! Elaine! Marielle!
jpnChrName: レン先輩、エレインさんに マリエルさんも……！
jpnSearchText:
レン先輩、エレインさんに
マリエルさんも……！

engChrName: Here comes the welcome wagon.
engSearchText: Here comes the welcome wagon.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……
jpnSearchText: やれやれ……

engChrName: Things are gonna get pretty busy around these parts, but if we work together, we'll be done in no time.
engSearchText:
Things are gonna get pretty busy around these parts,
but if we work together, we'll be done in no time.
jpnChrName: ハハ……お互い２、３日は 忙しくなっちまいそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……お互い２、３日は
忙しくなっちまいそうだな？

engChrName: Huh?! Who's 'we'?!
engSearchText: Huh?! Who's 'we'?!
jpnChrName: って、俺たちもかよ！？
jpnSearchText: って、俺たちもかよ！？

engChrName: Don't be like that. We have a lot of cleanup to do, and you're helping.
engSearchText:
Don't be like that. We have a lot of cleanup to do,
and you're helping.
jpnChrName: 当然──少しくらいは 後始末を手伝ってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
当然──少しくらいは
後始末を手伝ってもらう。

engChrName: Think of it as helping out Elaine. She's going to be busier than any of us.
engSearchText:
Think of it as helping out Elaine. She's going to be
busier than any of us.
jpnChrName: エレインはそれ以上に 忙しくなりそうだし、ね。
jpnSearchText:
エレインはそれ以上に
忙しくなりそうだし、ね。

engChrName: Guess that's true.
engSearchText: Guess that's true.
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: Fine, you win. We'll do what we can.
engSearchText: Fine, you win. We'll do what we can.
jpnChrName: ──しゃあねぇ。 あくまでやれる範囲でだがな。
jpnSearchText:
──しゃあねぇ。
あくまでやれる範囲でだがな。

engChrName: Heehee. Compared to dismantling the mafia, cleanup should be a walk in the park.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Compared to dismantling the mafia, cleanup
should be a walk in the park.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… あとひとふんばり、ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
あとひとふんばり、ですね。

engChrName: We shall excuse ourselves. I'm sure we will meet again soon enough.
engSearchText:
We shall excuse ourselves. I'm sure we will meet again
soon enough.
jpnChrName: それでは私たちはこの辺りで。 近いうちに、また会いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは私たちはこの辺りで。
近いうちに、また会いましょう。

engChrName: It was a pleasure to fight alongside you all. I'll see you again soon, Judith.
engSearchText:
It was a pleasure to fight alongside you all. I'll see you
again soon, Judith.
jpnChrName: お疲れ様でした。 ──ジュディスも、また。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ様でした。
──ジュディスも、また。

engChrName: Yeah. See you.
engSearchText: Yeah. See you.
jpnChrName: うん……そうね。
jpnSearchText: うん……そうね。

engChrName: With Almata out of the picture, Heiyue's gonna be pretty damn busy.
engSearchText:
With Almata out of the picture, Heiyue's gonna be
pretty damn busy.
jpnChrName: アルマータ壊滅か…… 黒月にとっても大忙しだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ壊滅か……
黒月にとっても大忙しだろうな。

engChrName: Yeah, but you know Cao. He and the Lu family can handle just about anything.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but you know Cao. He and the Lu family can
handle just about anything.
jpnChrName: ああ……だがツァオに ルウ家なら何とか収めるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……だがツァオに
ルウ家なら何とか収めるだろ。

engChrName: Wait, what happened to Shizuna and Kurogane?!
engSearchText: Wait, what happened to Shizuna and Kurogane?!
jpnChrName: あれっ…… 斑鳩のお二人は……！？
jpnSearchText:
あれっ……
斑鳩のお二人は……！？

engChrName: They were just here a moment ago...
engSearchText: They were just here a moment ago...
jpnChrName: い、一体どこに……
jpnSearchText: い、一体どこに……

engChrName: Disappeared the moment they finished their job. That's shinobi for you.
engSearchText:
Disappeared the moment they finished their job.
That's shinobi for you.
jpnChrName: 連中は連中で依頼を果たしたんだろう。 ったく、忍びらしくはあるが……
jpnSearchText:
連中は連中で依頼を果たしたんだろう。
ったく、忍びらしくはあるが……

engChrName: It's been a while since I had that much fun.
engSearchText: It's been a while since I had that much fun.
jpnChrName: ふふ、なかなか楽しかったかな？ 久々に熱くさせてもらったし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、なかなか楽しかったかな？
久々に熱くさせてもらったし。

engChrName: And if we take the timetable of our main contract into account, I'd say this wild ride's barely gotten started.
engSearchText:
And if we take the timetable of our main contract
into account, I'd say this wild ride's barely
gotten started.
jpnChrName: ──“主契約”の流れを考えると、 全ては“これから”だろうけど。
jpnSearchText:
──“主契約”の流れを考えると、
全ては“これから”だろうけど。

engChrName: Indeed. Everything hinges on the president's future orders.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Everything hinges on the president's
future orders.
jpnChrName: ええ、大統領府からの 今後のオーダー次第かと。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、大統領府からの
今後のオーダー次第かと。

engChrName: We have disposed of the boat and can retreat at any time.
engSearchText:
We have disposed of the boat and can retreat at
any time.
jpnChrName: 既に舟は破棄、いつでも撤収可能です。
jpnSearchText: 既に舟は破棄、いつでも撤収可能です。

engChrName: Okay, then. Let's skedaddle. See you around, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Okay, then. Let's skedaddle. See you
around, spriggan.
jpnChrName: うん、行こうか。 ──それじゃあまたね、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText:
うん、行こうか。
──それじゃあまたね、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: Wait, what happened to the Enforcers?!
engSearchText: Wait, what happened to the Enforcers?!
jpnChrName: あれっ…… 結社のお二人は……！？
jpnSearchText:
あれっ……
結社のお二人は……！？

engChrName: They were just here a moment ago...
engSearchText: They were just here a moment ago...
jpnChrName: い、一体どこに……
jpnSearchText: い、一体どこに……

engChrName: They've finished what they set out to do. Guessin' they wanted to peace out before the CID shows up.
engSearchText:
They've finished what they set out to do.
Guessin' they wanted to peace out before the CID
shows up.
jpnChrName: 連中は連中で目的を果たしたんだろう。 ＣＩＤも来るだろうし離脱しやがったか。
jpnSearchText:
連中は連中で目的を果たしたんだろう。
ＣＩＤも来るだろうし離脱しやがったか。

engChrName: And good riddance... Wait. Where's our pay?
engSearchText: And good riddance... Wait. Where's our pay?
jpnChrName: せいせいするが──って、 そういや報酬の話はどうなった！？
jpnSearchText:
せいせいするが──って、
そういや報酬の話はどうなった！？

engChrName: Now that you mention it, we never got around to discussing payment details with them.
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, we never got around to
discussing payment details with them.
jpnChrName: ああ、振り込みの話とかは まだ伺っていませんでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、振り込みの話とかは
まだ伺っていませんでしたね。

engChrName: Perhaps it would be best to let this one go...
engSearchText: Perhaps it would be best to let this one go...
jpnChrName: うーん、深追いしない方がいいんじゃ……
jpnSearchText: うーん、深追いしない方がいいんじゃ……

engChrName: Oh, HELL no! Give me my damn money, you scamming assholes!
engSearchText:
Oh, HELL no! Give me my damn money, you
scamming assholes!
jpnChrName: ンなワケに行くか！？ オイコラ、どこ行きやがった蛇どもっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ンなワケに行くか！？
オイコラ、どこ行きやがった蛇どもっ！！

engChrName: Heheh. Good work, you two. We've already wired the mira to them, but I couldn't pass up the opportunity to see them squirm.
engSearchText:
Heheh. Good work, you two. We've already wired
the mira to them, but I couldn't pass up the
opportunity to see them squirm.
jpnChrName: クク、安心しろ。 とっくに振り込んでやってるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、安心しろ。
とっくに振り込んでやってるからよ。

engChrName: He may still blow a fuse when he learns I paid below his rates. Though he did enlist our help, so it's only fair.
engSearchText:
He may still blow a fuse when he learns I paid below
his rates. Though he did enlist our help, so it's
only fair.
jpnChrName: こっちの協力分は差し引いといたがな。
jpnSearchText: こっちの協力分は差し引いといたがな。

engChrName: Heehee. You are such a stingy old man. Can you not throw the poor things a bone?
engSearchText:
Heehee. You are such a stingy old man. Can you not
throw the poor things a bone?
jpnChrName: うふふ、イケズやねぇ。 そのくらいサービスすればええのに。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、イケズやねぇ。
そのくらいサービスすればええのに。

engChrName: He's probably just pissed that they ruined all the prep work he did.
engSearchText:
He's probably just pissed that they ruined all the prep
work he did.
jpnChrName: クク、仕込みも無駄になっちまったし ちょっとした嫌がらせのつもりかよ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、仕込みも無駄になっちまったし
ちょっとした嫌がらせのつもりかよ？

engChrName: Not at all. This ended up being an oddly invigorating experience for me.
engSearchText:
Not at all. This ended up being an oddly invigorating
experience for me.
jpnChrName: いや、むしろ新鮮な気分で 鑑賞できてオジサン大満足だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
いや、むしろ新鮮な気分で
鑑賞できてオジサン大満足だぜ？

engChrName: Life is dull if everything goes the way you want it to. Isn't that right, spriggan?
engSearchText:
Life is dull if everything goes the way you want it to.
Isn't that right, spriggan?
jpnChrName: 何もかも思い通りじゃつまらねぇ。 ──そうだろう、裏解決屋（スプリガン）？
jpnSearchText:
何もかも思い通りじゃつまらねぇ。
──そうだろう、裏解決屋（スプリガン）？

engChrName: He didn't do half bad for a dropout.
engSearchText: He didn't do half bad for a dropout.
jpnChrName: ……ま、落ちこぼれの裏弟子なりに 頑張ったんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
……ま、落ちこぼれの裏弟子なりに
頑張ったんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: I am afraid I'll require a little more proof before I accept that he is worthy of our time and trust.
engSearchText:
I am afraid I'll require a little more proof before I
accept that he is worthy of our time and trust.
jpnChrName: さて…… 認めるのはまだ早いと思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
さて……
認めるのはまだ早いと思いますが。

engChrName: Anyway, what should we do from here? We were unable to recover those artifacts.
engSearchText:
Anyway, what should we do from here? We were
unable to recover those artifacts.
jpnChrName: しかし、回収し損ねた古代遺物は 何とかする必要がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、回収し損ねた古代遺物は
何とかする必要がありますね。

engChrName: Ugh. Don't remind me. Guess I oughta hit up the CID's chief and see what our next move is.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Don't remind me. Guess I oughta hit up the
CID's chief and see what our next move is.
jpnChrName: ああ、クソ面倒だがなぁ…… 室長さんあたりと相談してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、クソ面倒だがなぁ……
室長さんあたりと相談してみるか。

engChrName: I suppose we can call this a job well done.
engSearchText: I suppose we can call this a job well done.
jpnChrName: フフ、これにて落着かな？
jpnSearchText: フフ、これにて落着かな？

engChrName: Indeed. We met all of the objectives that were issued to us by the president.
engSearchText:
Indeed. We met all of the objectives that were issued
to us by the president.
jpnChrName: ええ、大統領府のオーダーは 全て問題なくクリアできたかと。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、大統領府のオーダーは
全て問題なくクリアできたかと。

engChrName: However, our main AI's predicted danger level remains the same...
engSearchText:
However, our main AI's predicted danger level
remains the same...
jpnChrName: ですがメインＡＩの危険度判定は──
jpnSearchText: ですがメインＡＩの危険度判定は──

engChrName: It should have changed by now, but it's still showing as yellow.
engSearchText:
It should have changed by now, but it's still showing
as yellow.
jpnChrName: なぜか未だに“イエロー”か。
jpnSearchText: なぜか未だに“イエロー”か。

engChrName: We must remain vigilant as we wait for the grand reveal next month.
engSearchText:
We must remain vigilant as we wait for the grand
reveal next month.
jpnChrName: フフ、来月のお披露目に向けて まだまだ気が抜けなさそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、来月のお披露目に向けて
まだまだ気が抜けなさそうだね。

engChrName: Most of our primary objectives have been accomplished. However, I regret to inform you that the overseer of the thorns managed to escape.
engSearchText:
Most of our primary objectives have
been accomplished. However, I regret to inform you
that the overseer of the thorns managed to escape.
jpnChrName: 全て滞りなく完了しました。 ですが“棘（ソーン）”は戦域より離脱。
jpnSearchText:
全て滞りなく完了しました。
ですが“棘（ソーン）”は戦域より離脱。

engChrName: I must also apologize about the matter related to the dark blue core.
engSearchText:
I must also apologize about the matter related to the
dark blue core.
jpnChrName: ──それと申しわけありません、 件の“黎（あおぐろ）き核”については……
jpnSearchText:
──それと申しわけありません、
件の“黎（あおぐろ）き核”については……

engChrName: We have already begun pursuit of the former target, and we will expand our search radius for the latter.
engSearchText:
We have already begun pursuit of the former target,
and we will expand our search radius for the latter.
jpnChrName: ……前者は既に追跡を開始、 後者は捜索対象を広げようかと。
jpnSearchText:
……前者は既に追跡を開始、
後者は捜索対象を広げようかと。

engChrName: Everything will be taken care of, Captain.
engSearchText: Everything will be taken care of, Captain.
jpnChrName: こちらは一旦お任せを──僧兵長殿。
jpnSearchText: こちらは一旦お任せを──僧兵長殿。

engChrName: Main 4SPG [Business Trip to Oración] completed! Received
engSearchText:
Main 4SPG [Business Trip to Oración] completed!
Received
jpnChrName: メイン４ｓｐｇ【オラシオンへの出張業務】の 報酬として
jpnSearchText:
メイン４ｓｐｇ【オラシオンへの出張業務】の
報酬として

engChrName: 'Earles Orphanage'...
engSearchText: 'Earles Orphanage'...
jpnChrName: ここは……孤児院か。
jpnSearchText: ここは……孤児院か。

engChrName: Ah. I see now.
engSearchText: Ah. I see now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど。

engChrName: Is something the matter, Van?
engSearchText: Is something the matter, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん？

engChrName: ...Nah, I'm good.
engSearchText: ...Nah, I'm good.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、オラシオンの孤児院だな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、オラシオンの孤児院だな。

engChrName: We've got no business here, so why don't we head someplace else?
engSearchText:
We've got no business here, so why don't we head
someplace else?
jpnChrName: 特に用があるわけでもねえから さっさと次に行くか。
jpnSearchText:
特に用があるわけでもねえから
さっさと次に行くか。

engChrName: I'll race you there!
engSearchText: I'll race you there!
jpnChrName: 早く早く～！
jpnSearchText: 早く早く～！

engChrName: Wait up, Jean! The others still aren't—
engSearchText: Wait up, Jean! The others still aren't—
jpnChrName: まってよ、あの子たちがまだ……
jpnSearchText: まってよ、あの子たちがまだ……

engChrName: C'mooon! Last one there is a rotten e—
engSearchText: C'mooon! Last one there is a rotten e—
jpnChrName: ったく、置いてっちゃうぞ～！ オレが先に──
jpnSearchText:
ったく、置いてっちゃうぞ～！
オレが先に──

engChrName: Aaah!
engSearchText: Aaah!
jpnChrName: あッ！
jpnSearchText: あッ！

engChrName: Crap.
engSearchText: Crap.
jpnChrName: おっと。
jpnSearchText: おっと。

engChrName: Phew. Close call.
engSearchText: Phew. Close call.
jpnChrName: 危なかったぁ……
jpnSearchText: 危なかったぁ……

engChrName: Gotta be more careful, kiddo.
engSearchText: Gotta be more careful, kiddo.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、足元には気を付けな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、足元には気を付けな。

engChrName: That's what you get for not paying attention. As USUAL!
engSearchText:
That's what you get for not paying attention.
As USUAL!
jpnChrName: もう！　だからいつも言ってるのに！
jpnSearchText: もう！　だからいつも言ってるのに！

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...

engChrName: Thanks for catching him, Grampy!
engSearchText: Thanks for catching him, Grampy!
jpnChrName: オジサン、さっきはありがとう。
jpnSearchText: オジサン、さっきはありがとう。

engChrName: ...Don't call me that.
engSearchText: ...Don't call me that.
jpnChrName: オジサンって……
jpnSearchText: オジサンって……

engChrName: Yeah! I owe you big time, Grampy!
engSearchText: Yeah! I owe you big time, Grampy!
jpnChrName: 本当に助かったよ、 ありがとうオジサン！
jpnSearchText:
本当に助かったよ、
ありがとうオジサン！

engChrName: Wanna play with us? We can play tag, hide and seek, or...
engSearchText:
Wanna play with us? We can play tag, hide and
seek, or...
jpnChrName: ねえねえオジサン、オレたちと一緒に遊ぼうよ！
jpnSearchText: ねえねえオジサン、オレたちと一緒に遊ぼうよ！

engChrName: Sorry, kid, but I don't got time to be playin' around—
engSearchText: Sorry, kid, but I don't got time to be playin' around—
jpnChrName: いや、ガキの相手をする余裕はねえから……
jpnSearchText: いや、ガキの相手をする余裕はねえから……

engChrName: Yes, you do! Old people always have lots of free time!
engSearchText: Yes, you do! Old people always have lots of free time!
jpnChrName: いいじゃん、オジサン暇そうだし！
jpnSearchText: いいじゃん、オジサン暇そうだし！

engChrName: I ain't takin' this crap.
engSearchText: I ain't takin' this crap.
jpnChrName: どういう意味だよ！
jpnSearchText: どういう意味だよ！

engChrName: They're cute, aren't they?
engSearchText: They're cute, aren't they?
jpnChrName: 孤児院の子か。
jpnSearchText: 孤児院の子か。

engChrName: Very much so. I'm glad he wasn't hurt.
engSearchText: Very much so. I'm glad he wasn't hurt.
jpnChrName: ふふ、怪我がないみたいで良かったですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、怪我がないみたいで良かったですね。

engChrName: Seeing them reminds me of my little brother and sister. They're adorable.
engSearchText:
Seeing them reminds me of my little brother
and sister. They're adorable.
jpnChrName: 弟たちのことを思い出して、 とても和みます。
jpnSearchText:
弟たちのことを思い出して、
とても和みます。

engChrName: You're funny, Grampy!
engSearchText: You're funny, Grampy!
jpnChrName: おじしゃん、おもしろ～い！
jpnSearchText: おじしゃん、おもしろ～い！

engChrName: Can you play with us? Pretty pleaaase?
engSearchText: Can you play with us? Pretty pleaaase?
jpnChrName: ……あそぼ？
jpnSearchText: ……あそぼ？

engChrName: What the...? Where'd you two come from?!
engSearchText: What the...? Where'd you two come from?!
jpnChrName: って、いつの間にか増えてるし！
jpnSearchText: って、いつの間にか増えてるし！

engChrName: They've really taken a liking to him, haven't they?
engSearchText: They've really taken a liking to him, haven't they?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様にとても懐いているようです。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様にとても懐いているようです。

engChrName: They're practically swarming him.
engSearchText: They're practically swarming him.
jpnChrName: 貴方、意外と子供に好かれるタイプねえ。
jpnSearchText: 貴方、意外と子供に好かれるタイプねえ。

engChrName: Well, aren't you Mister Popular, G R A M P Y?
engSearchText: Well, aren't you Mister Popular, G R A M P Y?
jpnChrName: ククッ、大人気だなァ“ オ ジ サ ン ”。
jpnSearchText: ククッ、大人気だなァ“ オ ジ サ ン ”。

engChrName: You shut your mouth!
engSearchText: You shut your mouth!
jpnChrName: うっせぇよ！
jpnSearchText: うっせぇよ！

engChrName: Don't let him escape!
engSearchText: Don't let him escape!
jpnChrName: みんな、このオジサンを逃がすなよ！
jpnSearchText: みんな、このオジサンを逃がすなよ！

engChrName: We won't!
engSearchText: We won't!
jpnChrName: おおぉ～～！
jpnSearchText: おおぉ～～！

engChrName: What's going on out here? Are you kids causing trouble for other people again?
engSearchText:
What's going on out here? Are you kids causing
trouble for other people again?
jpnChrName: どうかしましたか？ ご近所に迷惑をかけてはいけませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうかしましたか？
ご近所に迷惑をかけてはいけませんよ。

engChrName: Oh, a visitor?
engSearchText: Oh, a visitor?
jpnChrName: あら、お客さん？
jpnSearchText: あら、お客さん？

engChrName: Wait... Is that...you, Van?
engSearchText: Wait... Is that...you, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァン……くん？ あなた、ヴァン君でしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン……くん？
あなた、ヴァン君でしょう！？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: えっ！？
jpnSearchText: えっ！？

engChrName: Hang on a sec...
engSearchText: Hang on a sec...
jpnChrName: それって……！
jpnSearchText: それって……！

engChrName: Long time no see, Flona.
engSearchText: Long time no see, Flona.
jpnChrName: ……久しぶりだな、フローナさん。
jpnSearchText: ……久しぶりだな、フローナさん。

engChrName: Who would've thought our favorite little troublemaker would grow into such a fine young man?
engSearchText:
Who would've thought our favorite little
troublemaker would grow into such a fine
young man?
jpnChrName: あのやんちゃなヴァン君が こんなに逞しく成長していたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
あのやんちゃなヴァン君が
こんなに逞しく成長していたなんて……

engChrName: It makes me want to burst into tears.
engSearchText: It makes me want to burst into tears.
jpnChrName: 本当に感慨深いものですね。
jpnSearchText: 本当に感慨深いものですね。

engChrName: So Van grew up here?
engSearchText: So Van grew up here?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが子供の頃に 過ごしていた場所だったんですね……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんが子供の頃に
過ごしていた場所だったんですね……

engChrName: This job's been one big homecoming for you, hasn't it? No wonder you've been looking all sentimental this whole time.
engSearchText:
This job's been one big homecoming for you,
hasn't it? No wonder you've been looking all
sentimental this whole time.
jpnChrName: つまり今回は里帰りってことか、 どうりで妙にセンチな顔してやがると思ったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
つまり今回は里帰りってことか、
どうりで妙にセンチな顔してやがると思ったぜ。

engChrName: I have NOT been lookin' sentimental!
engSearchText: I have NOT been lookin' sentimental!
jpnChrName: してねえっつうの。
jpnSearchText: してねえっつうの。

engChrName: I'm guessing he lived here until he became an adult?
engSearchText: I'm guessing he lived here until he became an adult?
jpnChrName: するとヴァンさんは成人までここに？
jpnSearchText: するとヴァンさんは成人までここに？

engChrName: No, he left Oración long before that. Someone from far away adopted him.
engSearchText:
No, he left Oración long before that. Someone from
far away adopted him.
jpnChrName: いいえ、彼はその前に遠方に引き取られて、 オラシオンから離れました。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ、彼はその前に遠方に引き取られて、
オラシオンから離れました。

engChrName: If memory serves, that was about fourteen years ago.
engSearchText: If memory serves, that was about fourteen years ago.
jpnChrName: あれは確か……１４年前でしたね。
jpnSearchText: あれは確か……１４年前でしたね。

engChrName: I was just a supporting caregiver back then. Director Arkride was the one in charge.
engSearchText:
I was just a supporting caregiver back then.
Director Arkride was the one in charge.
jpnChrName: あの時の私はまだここのお手伝いで、 アークライド院長が孤児院を運営していました。
jpnSearchText:
あの時の私はまだここのお手伝いで、
アークライド院長が孤児院を運営していました。

engChrName: Arkride?!
engSearchText: Arkride?!
jpnChrName: アークライド院長って……！
jpnSearchText: アークライド院長って……！

engChrName: So that's where your surname comes from.
engSearchText: So that's where your surname comes from.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様の名字はその方から いただいたわけですね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様の名字はその方から
いただいたわけですね。

engChrName: Yep. Didn't feel like wastin' time thinking up a name, so I just went with the first one that came to mind.
engSearchText:
Yep. Didn't feel like wastin' time thinking up a name,
so I just went with the first one that came to mind.
jpnChrName: まあ、そういうことだ。 新しく考えるのも面倒だったしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そういうことだ。
新しく考えるのも面倒だったしな。

engChrName: (Now that I think about it, he's never once talked about the people who took him in...)
engSearchText:
(Now that I think about it, he's never once talked
about the people who took him in...)
jpnChrName: （引き取られた先のご家族の話は   聞いたことありませんが……）
jpnSearchText:
（引き取られた先のご家族の話は
聞いたことありませんが……）

engChrName: Young Van was always the center of attention, and he got along very well with children outside the orphanage.
engSearchText:
Young Van was always the center of attention, and he
got along very well with children outside
the orphanage.
jpnChrName: あの時のヴァン君もよく皆の中心にいて、 院の外の子供たちとも仲が良くって。
jpnSearchText:
あの時のヴァン君もよく皆の中心にいて、
院の外の子供たちとも仲が良くって。

engChrName: I see that part hasn't changed one bit. You have so many people working with you.
engSearchText:
I see that part hasn't changed one bit. You have so
many people working with you.
jpnChrName: それは今も変わらないみたいですね。 こんな大勢な仕事仲間に囲まれて。
jpnSearchText:
それは今も変わらないみたいですね。
こんな大勢な仕事仲間に囲まれて。

engChrName: From the bottom of my heart, thank you all for supporting him.
engSearchText:
From the bottom of my heart, thank you all for
supporting him.
jpnChrName: 彼を支えてくれて、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: 彼を支えてくれて、ありがとう。

engChrName: Aww.
engSearchText: Aww.
jpnChrName: えへへ……
jpnSearchText: えへへ……

engChrName: Trust me, he supports us much more than we do him.
engSearchText: Trust me, he supports us much more than we do him.
jpnChrName: いいえ、私たちの方こそ 支えられてばかりです。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ、私たちの方こそ
支えられてばかりです。

engChrName: I don't exactly 'work' with him. I'm just kinda along for the ride.
engSearchText:
I don't exactly 'work' with him. I'm just kinda along
for the ride.
jpnChrName: あたしは別に、仕事仲間じゃないけどね。
jpnSearchText: あたしは別に、仕事仲間じゃないけどね。

engChrName: (Heh.)
engSearchText: (Heh.)

engChrName: Have you all had lunch yet? You're more than welcome to join us if you haven't.
engSearchText:
Have you all had lunch yet? You're more than
welcome to join us if you haven't.
jpnChrName: そうでした、皆さん、昼食はどうしますか？ 良かったら一緒に用意しましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
そうでした、皆さん、昼食はどうしますか？
良かったら一緒に用意しましょうか？

engChrName: It's lovely of you to offer...
engSearchText: It's lovely of you to offer...
jpnChrName: いえ、私たちは、その……
jpnSearchText: いえ、私たちは、その……

engChrName: ...but we've got something we gotta take care of.
engSearchText: ...but we've got something we gotta take care of.
jpnChrName: 悪いがまだ用事があってな。 そろそろ行かなきゃならねえ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いがまだ用事があってな。
そろそろ行かなきゃならねえ。

engChrName: That's too bad... Perhaps next time, then.
engSearchText: That's too bad... Perhaps next time, then.
jpnChrName: 残念ですが、仕方ありませんね。
jpnSearchText: 残念ですが、仕方ありませんね。

engChrName: Oh, one more thing. You aren't havin' any trouble running the place, right? Any money woes?
engSearchText:
Oh, one more thing. You aren't havin' any trouble
running the place, right? Any money woes?
jpnChrName: ところで……孤児院の運営に、 何か困ったことはねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
ところで……孤児院の運営に、
何か困ったことはねぇか？

engChrName: None whatsoever, thankfully.
engSearchText: None whatsoever, thankfully.
jpnChrName: ふふ、何も困っていませんよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、何も困っていませんよ。

engChrName: The cathedral is close, so people from the church do a lot to help us.
engSearchText:
The cathedral is close, so people from the church do a
lot to help us.
jpnChrName: 大聖堂が近いおかげで、 教会に色々と助けてもらっています。
jpnSearchText:
大聖堂が近いおかげで、
教会に色々と助けてもらっています。

engChrName: We also receive a large donation from an anonymous benefactor every year.
engSearchText:
We also receive a large donation from an anonymous
benefactor every year.
jpnChrName: 教会以外にも、年に一度、銀行を通して 匿名で寄付して下さる方もいまして。
jpnSearchText:
教会以外にも、年に一度、銀行を通して
匿名で寄付して下さる方もいまして。

engChrName: Oooh, that's nice. Is it from a charity organization or something?
engSearchText:
Oooh, that's nice. Is it from a charity organization
or something?
jpnChrName: へえ？　どこかの慈善団体かしら？
jpnSearchText: へえ？　どこかの慈善団体かしら？

engChrName: I'm not sure. They've never reached out to us, so I don't know who they are.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure. They've never reached out to us, so I
don't know who they are.
jpnChrName: 一度も連絡してきたこともないので、 どなたかまでは……
jpnSearchText:
一度も連絡してきたこともないので、
どなたかまでは……

engChrName: All we have are the sender headers on the digital receipts, which only say 'From SPG.'
engSearchText:
All we have are the sender headers on the digital
receipts, which only say 'From SPG.'
jpnChrName: いつも差出人のところに “ｆｒｏｍＳｐｇ”と書かれているだけで……
jpnSearchText:
いつも差出人のところに
“ｆｒｏｍＳｐｇ”と書かれているだけで……

engChrName: (Wait, that's...)
engSearchText: (Wait, that's...)
jpnChrName: （！　それって………）
jpnSearchText: （！　それって………）

engChrName: ...Heh. Nice to hear there's still good people in the world.
engSearchText:
...Heh. Nice to hear there's still good people in
the world.
jpnChrName: ……へえ、世の中には 奇特な奴もいるもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
……へえ、世の中には
奇特な奴もいるもんだな。

engChrName: (What a goody two-shoes.)
engSearchText: (What a goody two-shoes.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、白々しいっつうの……）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、白々しいっつうの……）

engChrName: (I don't get why he feels the need to hide it...)
engSearchText: (I don't get why he feels the need to hide it...)
jpnChrName: （別に隠すことじゃないと思うけど。）
jpnSearchText: （別に隠すことじゃないと思うけど。）

engChrName: (How very him.)
engSearchText: (How very him.)
jpnChrName: （ヴァン様らしいかと。）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァン様らしいかと。）

engChrName: You're leaving? Aww...
engSearchText: You're leaving? Aww...
jpnChrName: オジサン、もう行っちゃうのー？
jpnSearchText: オジサン、もう行っちゃうのー？

engChrName: Can't you stay a little longer?
engSearchText: Can't you stay a little longer?
jpnChrName: もっとゆっくりしていけばいいのに。
jpnSearchText: もっとゆっくりしていけばいいのに。

engChrName: Sorry, kiddos. It ain't easy bein' an adult. Lotta responsibilities.
engSearchText:
Sorry, kiddos. It ain't easy bein' an adult.
Lotta responsibilities.
jpnChrName: 大人は色々と忙しいんだよ。
jpnSearchText: 大人は色々と忙しいんだよ。

engChrName: Y'all do me a favor: play your little hearts out while you're still a kid—or you'll regret it later.
engSearchText:
Y'all do me a favor: play your little hearts out while
you're still a kid—or you'll regret it later.
jpnChrName: 子供のうちにちゃんと遊んどけよ？ でないと後悔するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
子供のうちにちゃんと遊んどけよ？
でないと後悔するぞ。

engChrName: Okay! I hope we can play with you sometime, too!
engSearchText: Okay! I hope we can play with you sometime, too!
jpnChrName: あそぶー！　おじしゃんもいっしょー！
jpnSearchText: あそぶー！　おじしゃんもいっしょー！

engChrName: You'll come back, right, mister?
engSearchText: You'll come back, right, mister?
jpnChrName: ……また、くる？
jpnSearchText: ……また、くる？

engChrName: ...Sure. At some point.
engSearchText: ...Sure. At some point.
jpnChrName: ………ま、そのうちにな。
jpnSearchText: ………ま、そのうちにな。

engChrName: I'll get out of your hair now. We'll be in the city for another few days, so we'll try and come back before we leave.
engSearchText:
I'll get out of your hair now. We'll be in the city for
another few days, so we'll try and come back before
we leave.
jpnChrName: それじゃ院長先生、俺たちはこれで。 少しの間滞在するからまた寄らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ院長先生、俺たちはこれで。
少しの間滞在するからまた寄らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: That would be lovely. Please take care of yourselves.
engSearchText: That would be lovely. Please take care of yourselves.
jpnChrName: ええ、気を付けて行ってらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText: ええ、気を付けて行ってらっしゃい。

engChrName: If we don't succeed, then...
engSearchText: If we don't succeed, then...
jpnChrName: もしゲームが最悪の結果になったら……
jpnSearchText: もしゲームが最悪の結果になったら……

engChrName: ...We'll succeed. I know we will.
engSearchText: ...We'll succeed. I know we will.
jpnChrName: ……やれる事をやるだけだ。
jpnSearchText: ……やれる事をやるだけだ。

engChrName: Didn't think you'd come and see us again so soon. Miss us already?
engSearchText:
Didn't think you'd come and see us again so soon.
Miss us already?
jpnChrName: ハン……さっそく来たのかよ？
jpnSearchText: ハン……さっそく来たのかよ？

engChrName: Would you like to join us? I'd be happy to buy you all a drink.
engSearchText:
Would you like to join us? I'd be happy to buy you all
a drink.
jpnChrName: うふふ、折角やしお姉さんが みんなに一杯奢ってあげよか？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、折角やしお姉さんが
みんなに一杯奢ってあげよか？

engChrName: Really?! Don't mind if we do, then!
engSearchText: Really?! Don't mind if we do, then!
jpnChrName: わあっ、いいんですかっ？
jpnSearchText: わあっ、いいんですかっ？

engChrName: (F-Feri...)
engSearchText: (F-Feri...)
jpnChrName: （ちょ、ちょっとフェリちゃん。）
jpnSearchText: （ちょ、ちょっとフェリちゃん。）

engChrName: (They may be on the same team as us, but we still need to be cautious around them.)
engSearchText:
(They may be on the same team as us, but we still
need to be cautious around them.)
jpnChrName: （……一応協力関係にはあるけど   あんまり信用しない方がいいかもね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……一応協力関係にはあるけど
あんまり信用しない方がいいかもね。）

engChrName: (Oh! Yeah, I guess you're right...)
engSearchText: (Oh! Yeah, I guess you're right...)
jpnChrName: （はっ、そうでした……）
jpnSearchText: （はっ、そうでした……）

engChrName: Nah, we don't got time for that. I'm just here to have a little chat with your boss.
engSearchText:
Nah, we don't got time for that. I'm just here to have
a little chat with your boss.
jpnChrName: ま、時間もねぇし遠慮しとくぜ。 ──用があるのはそっちのアンタでな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、時間もねぇし遠慮しとくぜ。
──用があるのはそっちのアンタでな。

engChrName: Oh? What about?
engSearchText: Oh? What about?
jpnChrName: なんだ、俺に話でもあんのか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、俺に話でもあんのか？

engChrName: If it's about the game, why not talk to Retzy and Walter instead? I'm sort of out of the loop, remember?
engSearchText:
If it's about the game, why not talk to Retzy
and Walter instead? I'm sort of out of the
loop, remember?
jpnChrName: 攻略はレティとヴァルターに任せてる。 特にアドバイスが出来るとも思えねえが。
jpnSearchText:
攻略はレティとヴァルターに任せてる。
特にアドバイスが出来るとも思えねえが。

engChrName: Nah this is only something you can answer. Tell me, Ellroy. Are you up to something?
engSearchText:
Nah this is only something you can answer.
Tell me, Ellroy. Are you up to something?
jpnChrName: それはいい…… ──だがアンタ、何を企んでる？
jpnSearchText:
それはいい……
──だがアンタ、何を企んでる？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Haha. Now that's a silly question.
engSearchText: Haha. Now that's a silly question.
jpnChrName: ハハ、つまらねぇ質問だな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、つまらねぇ質問だな。

engChrName: Allow me to let you in on a little secret: I'm always up to something.
engSearchText:
Allow me to let you in on a little secret: I'm always up
to something.
jpnChrName: これでもオジサン、働き者でなぁ。 企んでねぇ時間の方が短いくらいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
これでもオジサン、働き者でなぁ。
企んでねぇ時間の方が短いくらいだぜ。

engChrName: Okay, let me rephrase.
engSearchText: Okay, let me rephrase.
jpnChrName: なら質問を変えるが……
jpnSearchText: なら質問を変えるが……

engChrName: What's your real reason for not fightin' with us?
engSearchText: What's your real reason for not fightin' with us?
jpnChrName: 俺たちと一緒の行動を避ける 本当の理由はなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
俺たちと一緒の行動を避ける
本当の理由はなんだ？

engChrName: Oh? Did Renne give you a word of warning about me, perhaps?
engSearchText:
Oh? Did Renne give you a word of warning about
me, perhaps?
jpnChrName: クク……レンあたりの忠告ってトコか？
jpnSearchText: クク……レンあたりの忠告ってトコか？

engChrName: And here I was thinking she took a liking to me. Unlike the professor, I was reasonably nice to her when she was a child.
engSearchText:
And here I was thinking she took a liking to me.
Unlike the professor, I was reasonably nice to her
when she was a child.
jpnChrName: あいつがガキの頃、博士よりは 優しく接してやったつもりなんだがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつがガキの頃、博士よりは
優しく接してやったつもりなんだがなぁ。

engChrName: If you thought you could fool Renne with fake smiles and honeyed words, then you clearly didn't know her.
engSearchText:
If you thought you could fool Renne with fake smiles
and honeyed words, then you clearly didn't know her.
jpnChrName: ガキだから、だろう。 あの天稟（てんぴん）に加えて本質を見抜く年頃だ。
jpnSearchText:
ガキだから、だろう。
あの天稟（てんぴん）に加えて本質を見抜く年頃だ。

engChrName: And you can't fool me, either. You're setting up some kinda trap in the underground, aren't you?
engSearchText:
And you can't fool me, either. You're setting up some
kinda trap in the underground, aren't you?
jpnChrName: アンタ──あの地下遺構全体に 何か仕掛けようとしてるんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
アンタ──あの地下遺構全体に
何か仕掛けようとしてるんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Wait, really?
engSearchText: Wait, really?
jpnChrName: な、何か、ですか……？
jpnSearchText: な、何か、ですか……？

engChrName: The only abnormality FIO picked up was the presence of the higher elements.
engSearchText:
The only abnormality FIO picked up was the
presence of the higher elements.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯが索敵しながら進んでるけど 上位属性以外に目立った異常は……
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯが索敵しながら進んでるけど
上位属性以外に目立った異常は……

engChrName: I'm not exactly sure what stunt you're pullin' here...
engSearchText: I'm not exactly sure what stunt you're pullin' here...
jpnChrName: 具体的な方法までは分からねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 具体的な方法までは分からねぇ。

engChrName: ...but I'm on to you. We know that most groups that've opposed you got silenced—permanently.
engSearchText:
...but I'm on to you. We know that most groups
that've opposed you got silenced—permanently.
jpnChrName: だが、アンタとこれまで敵対した組織は どこも少なからず“自滅”してるそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
だが、アンタとこれまで敵対した組織は
どこも少なからず“自滅”してるそうだな？

engChrName: Their cases were labeled as 'accidents,' 'resulting from internal conflict,' and other things of that nature.
engSearchText:
Their cases were labeled as 'accidents,' 'resulting from
internal conflict,' and other things of that nature.
jpnChrName: 不幸な事故、何らかの偶然、 あるいは突発的な“同士討ち”──
jpnSearchText:
不幸な事故、何らかの偶然、
あるいは突発的な“同士討ち”──

engChrName: If you don't have some kind of superpower, there aren't many ways you could pull off something like that.
engSearchText:
If you don't have some kind of superpower, there
aren't many ways you could pull off something
like that.
jpnChrName: “異能”以外でそれを可能にするとしたら 考えられる選択肢は限られてくるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
“異能”以外でそれを可能にするとしたら
考えられる選択肢は限られてくるだろう。

engChrName: That's why I'm thinkin' you're using some kind of unknown bacteria or virus—or an untraceable poison.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm thinkin' you're using some kind of
unknown bacteria or virus—or an untraceable poison.
jpnChrName: 恐らくは未発見の細菌やウイルス── もしくは検出不能な“毒物”あたりか？
jpnSearchText:
恐らくは未発見の細菌やウイルス──
もしくは検出不能な“毒物”あたりか？

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: ……あらまあ…………
jpnSearchText: ……あらまあ…………
……………………………

engChrName: He's using WHAT?!
engSearchText: He's using WHAT?!
jpnChrName: さ、細菌にウイルス…… もしくは毒物ですって……！？
jpnSearchText:
さ、細菌にウイルス……
もしくは毒物ですって……！？

engChrName: So he possesses biological and chemical weapons...
engSearchText: So he possesses biological and chemical weapons...
jpnChrName: ……ＢＣ兵器………
jpnSearchText: ……ＢＣ兵器………

engChrName: Those are illegal under international law.
engSearchText: Those are illegal under international law.
jpnChrName: 国際的にも既に禁止されている……
jpnSearchText: 国際的にも既に禁止されている……

engChrName: Heheh. That nose of yours really is something, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Heheh. That nose of yours really is something,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: クク……オジサン驚いちゃったぜ。 どうやらマジで鼻が利くようじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
クク……オジサン驚いちゃったぜ。
どうやらマジで鼻が利くようじゃねえか？

engChrName: I do indeed use both, but I prefer the chemical variety. Biological weapons are harder to handle.
engSearchText:
I do indeed use both, but I prefer the
chemical variety. Biological weapons are harder
to handle.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、ちなみに基本は“Ｃ”だ。 “Ｂ”もたまに使うが扱いが面倒でなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
──ああ、ちなみに基本は“Ｃ”だ。
“Ｂ”もたまに使うが扱いが面倒でなぁ。

engChrName: Now you know why I said there isn't a bigger monster in all of Zemuria than him.
engSearchText:
Now you know why I said there isn't a bigger monster
in all of Zemuria than him.
jpnChrName: だから言っただろう、 マジモンの最悪なんだよ、旦那は。
jpnSearchText:
だから言っただろう、
マジモンの最悪なんだよ、旦那は。

engChrName: Nice detective work, Arkride. Looks like you might walk outta this alive after all.
engSearchText:
Nice detective work, Arkride. Looks like you might
walk outta this alive after all.
jpnChrName: やるじゃねえかアークライド。 首の皮一枚、何とか繋がったな？
jpnSearchText:
やるじゃねえかアークライド。
首の皮一枚、何とか繋がったな？

engChrName: I was planning to teleport a few of you away when the time came...
engSearchText:
I was planning to teleport a few of you away when the
time came...
jpnChrName: うふふ、その時は一応“転位”で そっちもフォローするつもりやけど。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、その時は一応“転位”で
そっちもフォローするつもりやけど。

engChrName: ...but I'm not sure I could save all of you, and I wouldn't want to risk dying in the most painful way imaginable, myself.
engSearchText:
...but I'm not sure I could save all of you, and I
wouldn't want to risk dying in the most painful way
imaginable, myself.
jpnChrName: 全員は無理かもしれへんし 女神行きにならへんでよかったねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
全員は無理かもしれへんし
女神行きにならへんでよかったねぇ。

engChrName: My plan doesn't break any of the rules they laid out.
engSearchText: My plan doesn't break any of the rules they laid out.
jpnChrName: 一応、連中の提示した“ルール”には 抵触していないはずだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
一応、連中の提示した“ルール”には
抵触していないはずだぜ？

engChrName: Though that was never a concern of mine. After all, I am the Oathbreaker. Breaking oaths and rules is what I do.
engSearchText:
Though that was never a concern of mine. After all,
I am the Oathbreaker. Breaking oaths and rules is
what I do.
jpnChrName: ま、“破戒”としては 破っちまうのもアリだとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、“破戒”としては
破っちまうのもアリだとは思うが……

engChrName: And you can't deny it's the most effective way to win the game. I'm taking out all the players—and the organizers—in one fell swoop.
engSearchText:
And you can't deny it's the most effective way to win
the game. I'm taking out all the players—and the
organizers—in one fell swoop.
jpnChrName: ──連中込みで、手っ取り早くゲームを 終わらせるいい方法だとは思わねえか？
jpnSearchText:
──連中込みで、手っ取り早くゲームを
終わらせるいい方法だとは思わねえか？

engChrName: I'll spare you alone. That's your reward for figuring out my plan. You can run along back to the city and take care of requests while we wrap this up.
engSearchText:
I'll spare you alone. That's your reward for figuring
out my plan. You can run along back to the city and
take care of requests while we wrap this up.
jpnChrName: 見抜いた特典としてお前らは助かる── ４ｓｐｇをやりながら朗報を待ちゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
見抜いた特典としてお前らは助かる──
４ｓｐｇをやりながら朗報を待ちゃあいい。

engChrName: Not a bad deal, huh?
engSearchText: Not a bad deal, huh?
jpnChrName: どうだ──お互い悪くない落とし所だろう？
jpnSearchText: どうだ──お互い悪くない落とし所だろう？

engChrName: 'Not a bad deal,' my ass! You're no better than Almata!
engSearchText:
'Not a bad deal,' my ass! You're no better
than Almata!
jpnChrName: ざけんじゃねえ……！ アルマータと同じじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
ざけんじゃねえ……！
アルマータと同じじゃねえか！

engChrName: There are rules that have to be followed—even during war. We won't let you get away with this!
engSearchText:
There are rules that have to be followed—even
during war. We won't let you get away with this!
jpnChrName: 戦場でも“外道”のやり方…… そんな虐殺を許すわけにはいきません！
jpnSearchText:
戦場でも“外道”のやり方……
そんな虐殺を許すわけにはいきません！

engChrName: Well, at least you're not involvin' innocent civilians...
engSearchText: Well, at least you're not involvin' innocent civilians...
jpnChrName: ま、市民を巻き込まないだけ 連中よりはマシかもしれねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、市民を巻き込まないだけ
連中よりはマシかもしれねぇが……

engChrName: ...is what I'd like to say, but you and I both know that the rules are the only reason why you're leaving them out of this.
engSearchText:
...is what I'd like to say, but you and I both know that
the rules are the only reason why you're leaving them
out of this.
jpnChrName: ルールに抵触しなけりゃやってたな？
jpnSearchText: ルールに抵触しなけりゃやってたな？

engChrName: Heh. I make decisions like that on a case-by-case basis.
engSearchText:
Heh. I make decisions like that on a
case-by-case basis.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そりゃ状況次第だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そりゃ状況次第だろ。

engChrName: All right, I've heard enough. I want you outta this game right NOW!
engSearchText:
All right, I've heard enough. I want you outta this
game right NOW!
jpnChrName: だったらアンタら、 いや、アンタにはこのゲームから──
jpnSearchText:
だったらアンタら、
いや、アンタにはこのゲームから──

engChrName: Sure thing.
engSearchText: Sure thing.
jpnChrName: ああ、いいぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、いいぜ。

engChrName: The Fourth Anguis of the Society of Ouroboros hereby withdraws his registration from the game.
engSearchText:
The Fourth Anguis of the Society of Ouroboros
hereby withdraws his registration from the game.
jpnChrName: ──身喰らう蛇第四柱、《千の破戒者》、 今回のゲームから降りることを宣言する。
jpnSearchText:
──身喰らう蛇第四柱、《千の破戒者》、
今回のゲームから降りることを宣言する。

engChrName: Registration of Team Arkride Solutions member 'The Thousand Oathbreaker' has been withdrawn. They may no longer interfere with the game.
engSearchText:
Registration of Team Arkride Solutions member
'The Thousand Oathbreaker' has been withdrawn.
They may no longer interfere with the game.
jpnChrName: チーム　アークライド解決事務所 協力者《千の破戒者》のチーム登録を解除 以後のゲームへの干渉を禁じる
jpnSearchText:
チーム　アークライド解決事務所
協力者《千の破戒者》のチーム登録を解除
以後のゲームへの干渉を禁じる

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: ハアアアアアッ！？
jpnSearchText: ハアアアアアッ！？

engChrName: You son of a... Not even gonna let your teammates weigh in on your decisions before you make 'em?
engSearchText:
You son of a... Not even gonna let your teammates
weigh in on your decisions before you make 'em?
jpnChrName: こ、このオヤジ…… だから俺らに一言も相談ナシかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
こ、このオヤジ……
だから俺らに一言も相談ナシかよ！？

engChrName: Oh, dear. Now he can't use any of his nasty tricks on anyone.
engSearchText:
Oh, dear. Now he can't use any of his nasty tricks
on anyone.
jpnChrName: うふふ、これで旦さん十八番の 外道な手は打てなくなったわけやね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、これで旦さん十八番の
外道な手は打てなくなったわけやね。

engChrName: Wh-Why did you give up so readily?
engSearchText: Wh-Why did you give up so readily?
jpnChrName: ど、どうして……
jpnSearchText: ど、どうして……

engChrName: This must be yet another part of his scheme. I'm sure of it.
engSearchText:
This must be yet another part of his scheme. I'm sure
of it.
jpnChrName: ……まさか それすらも何らかの仕掛け……？
jpnSearchText:
……まさか
それすらも何らかの仕掛け……？

engChrName: Nope, you're wrong.
engSearchText: Nope, you're wrong.
jpnChrName: クク、いや？
jpnSearchText: クク、いや？

engChrName: Renne might've given you a push in the right direction, but the fact that you caught me in the act is impressive. Consider this your reward.
engSearchText:
Renne might've given you a push in the right
direction, but the fact that you caught me in the act
is impressive. Consider this your reward.
jpnChrName: レンのヒントがあったとはいえ、 この場に迫ったご褒美みたいなモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
レンのヒントがあったとはいえ、
この場に迫ったご褒美みたいなモンだ。

engChrName: Hope you weren't counting on my help.
engSearchText: Hope you weren't counting on my help.
jpnChrName: 元よりレティたちだけでも戦力は十分だろ？ それとも少しは俺もアテにしてたかよ。
jpnSearchText:
元よりレティたちだけでも戦力は十分だろ？
それとも少しは俺もアテにしてたかよ。

engChrName: I mean, I kinda wanted you as a last resort in case things went awry, but you clearly aren't worth the risk.
engSearchText:
I mean, I kinda wanted you as a last resort in case
things went awry, but you clearly aren't worth
the risk.
jpnChrName: ……ま、隠し札くらいにはな。 だがそういう事なら異存も文句もねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、隠し札くらいにはな。
だがそういう事なら異存も文句もねぇ。

engChrName: Better not try to go lookin' for loopholes, you hear?
engSearchText: Better not try to go lookin' for loopholes, you hear?
jpnChrName: 言っておくが──他の抜け道を使って 余計な茶々を入れてくるんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが──他の抜け道を使って
余計な茶々を入れてくるんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: Damn. There goes that plan.
engSearchText: Damn. There goes that plan.
jpnChrName: クク、信用あるねぇ。 しかし一気に暇になっちまったなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、信用あるねぇ。
しかし一気に暇になっちまったなぁ。

engChrName: Oh, well. Nothing left to do but kick back and think up my next crime. Maybe I'll try one that spans both the orbal net and the real world.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Nothing left to do but kick back and think
up my next crime. Maybe I'll try one that spans both
the orbal net and the real world.
jpnChrName: これを機に、ネットとリアルを連動した 新機軸の多重犯罪プランでも纏めとくか。
jpnSearchText:
これを機に、ネットとリアルを連動した
新機軸の多重犯罪プランでも纏めとくか。

engChrName: (Sh-Should we, umm...pretend we didn't hear that?)
engSearchText: (Sh-Should we, umm...pretend we didn't hear that?)
jpnChrName: （な、なんかしれっと   とんでもないこと言い出してるし……）
jpnSearchText:
（な、なんかしれっと
とんでもないこと言い出してるし……）

engChrName: (We'll worry about him later. For now, we should just be thankful Van thwarted his plan before it claimed any lives.)
engSearchText:
(We'll worry about him later. For now, we should just
be thankful Van thwarted his plan before it claimed
any lives.)
jpnChrName: （それはそれで気になるが……   ここは何とかヴァンが凌いだようだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（それはそれで気になるが……
ここは何とかヴァンが凌いだようだな。）

engChrName: She's amazing!
engSearchText: She's amazing!
jpnChrName: お姉ちゃんすご～い！
jpnSearchText: お姉ちゃんすご～い！

engChrName: Dance some more!
engSearchText: Dance some more!
jpnChrName: もっと踊って～！
jpnSearchText: もっと踊って～！

engChrName: Okie doke! One more time!
engSearchText: Okie doke! One more time!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ではもう一回行きますよ！
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ではもう一回行きますよ！

engChrName: Look at small fry go.
engSearchText: Look at small fry go.
jpnChrName: あそこにいるの、チビじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: あそこにいるの、チビじゃねえか？

engChrName: She's quite good.
engSearchText: She's quite good.
jpnChrName: へえ、踊りもできるのか。
jpnSearchText: へえ、踊りもできるのか。

engChrName: If memory serves, she learned how to dance from Ms. Shaheena in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
If memory serves, she learned how to dance from Ms.
Shaheena in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 確かサルバッドでシャヒーナ様から 習ったものでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
確かサルバッドでシャヒーナ様から
習ったものでしたね。

engChrName: Well, color me impressed.
engSearchText: Well, color me impressed.
jpnChrName: ええ、本当によく踊ってるわね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、本当によく踊ってるわね。

engChrName: She's got everyone's attention. I bet she'd have pretty good screen presence if she decided to take up acting.
engSearchText:
She's got everyone's attention. I bet she'd have pretty
good screen presence if she decided to take up acting.
jpnChrName: 運動神経もいいし、デビューしたら 子役としても人気が出そうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
運動神経もいいし、デビューしたら
子役としても人気が出そうねぇ。

engChrName: I can see that.
engSearchText: I can see that.
jpnChrName: そっち方面の道も十分あり得そうだが……
jpnSearchText: そっち方面の道も十分あり得そうだが……

engChrName: Anyway, I have no idea what she's up to, but there's no reason to interfere.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I have no idea what she's up to, but there's
no reason to interfere.
jpnChrName: ま、何やってるかは分からねぇが、 邪魔しねえ方がいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何やってるかは分からねぇが、
邪魔しねえ方がいいだろ。

engChrName: Agreed. Let's be on our way.
engSearchText: Agreed. Let's be on our way.
jpnChrName: うむ、行くとしよう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、行くとしよう。

engChrName: Whoa! He's so cool!
engSearchText: Whoa! He's so cool!
jpnChrName: おお～、かっけぇ！！
jpnSearchText: おお～、かっけぇ！！

engChrName: And he's hot, too...
engSearchText: And he's hot, too...
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん、キレー……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃん、キレー……

engChrName: Feast your eyes on me. Consider this a special treat!
engSearchText: Feast your eyes on me. Consider this a special treat!
jpnChrName: ハッ、特別サービスだ、 見逃すんじゃねえぞガキども！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、特別サービスだ、
見逃すんじゃねえぞガキども！

engChrName: What sort of dance is that?
engSearchText: What sort of dance is that?
jpnChrName: あ、アーロンさんだ。 あの踊りは？
jpnSearchText:
あ、アーロンさんだ。
あの踊りは？

engChrName: It's called sword dancing. He performed this at the Eastern Theater in Langport.
engSearchText:
It's called sword dancing. He performed this at the
Eastern Theater in Langport.
jpnChrName: ラングポートの華劇場でも やっていた東方の剣舞ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートの華劇場でも
やっていた東方の剣舞ですね。

engChrName: I've heard all about it from other people, but seeing it in person is just...wow.
engSearchText:
I've heard all about it from other people, but seeing it
in person is just...wow.
jpnChrName: へえ、話には聞いていたけど なかなかのものじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、話には聞いていたけど
なかなかのものじゃない。

engChrName: Oh. He blew a kiss at one of the women passing by.
engSearchText: Oh. He blew a kiss at one of the women passing by.
jpnChrName: あっ、通りかかった女性に 投げキッスした。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、通りかかった女性に
投げキッスした。

engChrName: And now young women are gathering to see the spectacle as well.
engSearchText:
And now young women are gathering to see the
spectacle as well.
jpnChrName: ふふ、年頃の女性も 集まってきだしましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、年頃の女性も
集まってきだしましたね。

engChrName: Is he really doin' his usual bit in front of the kids? What the hell's he up to?
engSearchText:
Is he really doin' his usual bit in front of the kids?
What the hell's he up to?
jpnChrName: ガキたちの前で何やってんだあいつ……
jpnSearchText: ガキたちの前で何やってんだあいつ……

engChrName: Hard to say. Perhaps he is acting in accordance to Agnès' plan.
engSearchText:
Hard to say. Perhaps he is acting in accordance to
Agnès' plan.
jpnChrName: ふむ、何かしらの考えがあっての行動だろう。 ここは邪魔をせぬ方が賢明だ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、何かしらの考えがあっての行動だろう。
ここは邪魔をせぬ方が賢明だ。

engChrName: Maybe, yeah. Well, if he's helpin' her, then we can leave him be.
engSearchText:
Maybe, yeah. Well, if he's helpin' her, then we can
leave him be.
jpnChrName: そうですね……一応アニエスの 手伝いをしてるみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……一応アニエスの
手伝いをしてるみたいですし。

engChrName: XEROS, do a handstand!
engSearchText: XEROS, do a handstand!
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳ、逆立ち！
jpnSearchText: ＸＥＲＯＳ、逆立ち！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷッ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷッ！

engChrName: Whoaaa!
engSearchText: Whoaaa!
jpnChrName: わあ～～！
jpnSearchText: わあ～～！

engChrName: The robo doggie's actually doing a handstand!
engSearchText: The robo doggie's actually doing a handstand!
jpnChrName: 本当にできた！
jpnSearchText: 本当にできた！

engChrName: That's hilarious.
engSearchText: That's hilarious.
jpnChrName: あれはカトルじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: あれはカトルじゃねえか。

engChrName: No, it's awesome! I didn't know Quatre taught them that.
engSearchText:
No, it's awesome! I didn't know Quatre taught
them that.
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳとＦＩＯも……！ あんな芸を仕込んでたんですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳとＦＩＯも……！
あんな芸を仕込んでたんですねぇ。

engChrName: Actually, it'd be more accurate to say he programmed them to perform that action.
engSearchText:
Actually, it'd be more accurate to say he programmed
them to perform that action.
jpnChrName: 仕込んだというよりは、 プログラミングしたものでしょうけれど。
jpnSearchText:
仕込んだというよりは、
