プログラミングしたものでしょうけれど。

engChrName: Either way, it's impressive.
engSearchText: Either way, it's impressive.
jpnChrName: にしても、本当に器用ね。
jpnSearchText: にしても、本当に器用ね。

engChrName: Never say you can't teach an old dog new tricks...or a robot dog in this case.
engSearchText:
Never say you can't teach an old dog new tricks...or a
robot dog in this case.
jpnChrName: 戦闘に探索に買い出し、その上 街頭で芸までできるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
戦闘に探索に買い出し、その上
街頭で芸までできるなんて。

engChrName: Goes to show that even a genius like him has a playful side.
engSearchText:
Goes to show that even a genius like him has a
playful side.
jpnChrName: 天才肌の遊び心ってな。 本人はあんま自覚はねぇだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
天才肌の遊び心ってな。
本人はあんま自覚はねぇだろうが。

engChrName: It's quite charming.
engSearchText: It's quite charming.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうですね。

engChrName: Anyway, I have no idea what he's up to, but there's no reason to interfere.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I have no idea what he's up to, but there's no
reason to interfere.
jpnChrName: なんでこんなことをやってるかは分からねえが、 とにかく邪魔しねえ方がいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでこんなことをやってるかは分からねえが、
とにかく邪魔しねえ方がいいだろ。

engChrName: Agreed. Let's be on our way.
engSearchText: Agreed. Let's be on our way.
jpnChrName: うむ、行くとしよう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、行くとしよう。

engChrName: This request is...alarming.
engSearchText: This request is...alarming.
jpnChrName: これは……気になりますね。
jpnSearchText: これは……気になりますね。

engChrName: Yeah. We better look into it.
engSearchText: Yeah. We better look into it.
jpnChrName: ああ、放置すんのも危険かもな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、放置すんのも危険かもな。

engChrName: Huh? There's some kind of gathering over there.
engSearchText: Huh? There's some kind of gathering over there.
jpnChrName: お？　あっちで なにやら催しがあるみたいだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
お？　あっちで
なにやら催しがあるみたいだぜ？

engChrName: I wonder what it is.
engSearchText: I wonder what it is.
jpnChrName: いったい何かしら？
jpnSearchText: いったい何かしら？

engChrName: Oh, two students from the music academy are performing!
engSearchText:
Oh, two students from the music academy
are performing!
jpnChrName: 音楽学校の学生二人が ゲリラ声楽会をやるんだってよ！
jpnSearchText:
音楽学校の学生二人が
ゲリラ声楽会をやるんだってよ！

engChrName: And one of them is Central Eastern.
engSearchText: And one of them is Central Eastern.
jpnChrName: しかも片方は中東の子みたいだ。
jpnSearchText: しかも片方は中東の子みたいだ。

engChrName: So here's the plan: we're gonna use decoys to lure 'em out.
engSearchText:
So here's the plan: we're gonna use decoys to lure
'em out.
jpnChrName: ──ずばり言うと囮作戦だ。
jpnSearchText: ──ずばり言うと囮作戦だ。

engChrName: We'll need you and Amalie to perform on the street.
engSearchText: We'll need you and Amalie to perform on the street.
jpnChrName: まずあんたとあのアマーリエって子に ゲリラ声楽会をやってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
まずあんたとあのアマーリエって子に
ゲリラ声楽会をやってもらう。

engChrName: Wait, you're using me as a decoy?
engSearchText: Wait, you're using me as a decoy?
jpnChrName: ゲリラ声楽会、ですか。
jpnSearchText: ゲリラ声楽会、ですか。

engChrName: So that's what you meant by 'something that'll really rile 'em up.'
engSearchText:
So that's what you meant by 'something that'll really
rile 'em up.'
jpnChrName: ふふ、相手が嫌がるようなことって そういう意味ね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、相手が嫌がるようなことって
そういう意味ね。

engChrName: I imagine that'll be effective in drawing them out of the shadows. However, I don't know how we'll tell them apart.
engSearchText:
I imagine that'll be effective in drawing them out of
the shadows. However, I don't know how we'll tell
them apart.
jpnChrName: 確かに噂を聞いたら現場に来そうなものだけど、 どうやって見分けよう？
jpnSearchText:
確かに噂を聞いたら現場に来そうなものだけど、
どうやって見分けよう？

engChrName: Also, we can't corner them without any proof.
engSearchText: Also, we can't corner them without any proof.
jpnChrName: ってか、怪しいヤツを炙り出したとしても 追い詰める証拠が不十分じゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ってか、怪しいヤツを炙り出したとしても
追い詰める証拠が不十分じゃねえか？

engChrName: I know. And that's where the third decoy comes in.
engSearchText: I know. And that's where the third decoy comes in.
jpnChrName: ああ、だから“囮”は ネリーたちだけじゃねぇ、二段構えだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だから“囮”は
ネリーたちだけじゃねぇ、二段構えだ。

engChrName: I'm thinkin' our perp is using the survey to find people who are pro-immigration.
engSearchText:
I'm thinkin' our perp is using the survey to find
people who are pro-immigration.
jpnChrName: 憶測が正しければ、犯人はアンケートを ブラフに親移民派かどうか探っている。
jpnSearchText:
憶測が正しければ、犯人はアンケートを
ブラフに親移民派かどうか探っている。

engChrName: They might even have a running list of targets.
engSearchText: They might even have a running list of targets.
jpnChrName: もしかしたらターゲットのリストなんかを 作ってるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたらターゲットのリストなんかを
作ってるかもな。

engChrName: So if someone was cheerin' Nelly on, they might make contact so they can add another name to it.
engSearchText:
So if someone was cheerin' Nelly on, they might
make contact so they can add another name to it.
jpnChrName: だとしたら、このゲリラ声楽会は 恰好の“狩り場”になるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
だとしたら、このゲリラ声楽会は
恰好の“狩り場”になるはずだ。

engChrName: Right. They would consider them a traitorous countryman.
engSearchText:
Right. They would consider them a
traitorous countryman.
jpnChrName: 移民に好意的な“裏切り者”の同胞たち── それを探すにはもってこいの場面ね。
jpnSearchText:
移民に好意的な“裏切り者”の同胞たち──
それを探すにはもってこいの場面ね。

engChrName: It's a sound plan.
engSearchText: It's a sound plan.
jpnChrName: そこへ狙われやすそうな囮を送り込めば、 犯人の方から接触してくるはずでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そこへ狙われやすそうな囮を送り込めば、
犯人の方から接触してくるはずでしょう。

engChrName: So who's going to be the third decoy?
engSearchText: So who's going to be the third decoy?
jpnChrName: なるほど……では囮になりますか？
jpnSearchText: なるほど……では囮になりますか？

engChrName: I wanna bag this asshole myself, so I'm out. I think the best person for the job would be...
engSearchText:
I wanna bag this asshole myself, so I'm out. I think
the best person for the job would be...
jpnChrName: 俺は捕まえる側に回るから除外するとして、 一番囮に適任なのは──
jpnSearchText:
俺は捕まえる側に回るから除外するとして、
一番囮に適任なのは──

engChrName: (The enemy's objective is to draw out pro-immigrant Calvardians.)
engSearchText:
(The enemy's objective is to draw out
pro-immigrant Calvardians.)
jpnChrName: （敵の狙いはカルバード人の親移民派を   炙り出すことだ。
jpnSearchText:
（敵の狙いはカルバード人の親移民派を
炙り出すことだ。

engChrName: (Feri's from the Central East, so she doesn't fit the bill here. Which means the person who's best qualified for this is...)
engSearchText:
(Feri's from the Central East, so she doesn't fit the
bill here. Which means the person who's best
qualified for this is...)
jpnChrName: （中東の血筋のフェリはそもそも該当しない。   となると──）
jpnSearchText:
（中東の血筋のフェリはそもそも該当しない。
となると──）

engChrName: (The enemy's objective is to draw out pro-immigrant Calvardians.)
engSearchText:
(The enemy's objective is to draw out
pro-immigrant Calvardians.)
jpnChrName: （敵の狙いはカルバード人の親移民派を   炙り出すことだ。
jpnSearchText:
（敵の狙いはカルバード人の親移民派を
炙り出すことだ。

engChrName: (Aaron's of Eastern descent, so he doesn't fit the bill here. Which means the person who's best qualified for this is...)
engSearchText:
(Aaron's of Eastern descent, so he doesn't fit the
bill here. Which means the person who's best
qualified for this is...)
jpnChrName: （東方人のアーロンはそもそも該当しない。   となると──）
jpnSearchText:
（東方人のアーロンはそもそも該当しない。
となると──）

engChrName: (No, that's not right.)
engSearchText: (No, that's not right.)
jpnChrName: （いや、違うな……）
jpnSearchText: （いや、違うな……）

engChrName: (They actually do fit the bill, but that outfit draws a lot of attention.)
engSearchText:
(They actually do fit the bill, but that outfit draws a
lot of attention.)
jpnChrName: （条件は満たしていそうだが……   あの恰好はそれなりに人目を引くだろうからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（条件は満たしていそうだが……
あの恰好はそれなりに人目を引くだろうからな。）

engChrName: (The culprit probably doesn't want to stand out, so I don't think they'd target her. They're more likely to go after...)
engSearchText:
(The culprit probably doesn't want to stand out, so I
don't think they'd target her. They're more likely to
go after...)
jpnChrName: （犯人が目立ちたくないなら狙う可能性は低そうだ。   もう一度よく考えてみろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（犯人が目立ちたくないなら狙う可能性は低そうだ。
もう一度よく考えてみろ。）

engChrName: (They actually do fit the bill, but their attire draws a fair bit of attention.)
engSearchText:
(They actually do fit the bill, but their attire draws a
fair bit of attention.)
jpnChrName: （条件は満たしていそうだが……   身なりが割と特殊だからな。
jpnSearchText:
（条件は満たしていそうだが……
身なりが割と特殊だからな。

engChrName: (The culprit probably doesn't want to stand out, so I don't think they'd target him. They're more likely to go after...)
engSearchText:
(The culprit probably doesn't want to stand out, so I
don't think they'd target him. They're more likely to
go after...)
jpnChrName: （犯人が目立ちたくないなら狙う可能性は低そうだ。 （もう一度よく考えてみろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（犯人が目立ちたくないなら狙う可能性は低そうだ。
（もう一度よく考えてみろ。）

engChrName: (...Nah. If her identity came to light, chaos would ensue, and our plan would be in shambles. Not happening.)
engSearchText:
(...Nah. If her identity came to light, chaos would
ensue, and our plan would be in shambles.
Not happening.)
jpnChrName: （……万が一、正体がバレたら面倒だから   こいつは駄目だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……万が一、正体がバレたら面倒だから
こいつは駄目だな。）

engChrName: (There's someone else who's better suited for this role...)
engSearchText:
(There's someone else who's better suited for
this role...)
jpnChrName: （もう一度よく考えてみろ。）
jpnSearchText: （もう一度よく考えてみろ。）

engChrName: (Master's an intimidating guy. No way our perp would approach him.)
engSearchText:
(Master's an intimidating guy. No way our perp
would approach him.)
jpnChrName: （師父は圧が強すぎるから   犯人ならまず話しかけないだろ……）
jpnSearchText:
（師父は圧が強すぎるから
犯人ならまず話しかけないだろ……）

engChrName: (There's someone else who's better suited for this role...)
engSearchText:
(There's someone else who's better suited for
this role...)
jpnChrName: （もう一度よく考えてみろ。）
jpnSearchText: （もう一度よく考えてみろ。）

engChrName: Agnès, you up for this?
engSearchText: Agnès, you up for this?
jpnChrName: ──アニエス、やってくれるか？
jpnSearchText: ──アニエス、やってくれるか？

engChrName: M-Me?
engSearchText: M-Me?
jpnChrName: わ、私ですか？
jpnSearchText: わ、私ですか？

engChrName: Not that I'm opposed, but why her?
engSearchText: Not that I'm opposed, but why her?
jpnChrName: どうしてアニエスさんに？
jpnSearchText: どうしてアニエスさんに？

engChrName: 'Cause she fulfills all the requirements. Plus she seems timid at first glance, so they'd likely think she'd be easy to deal with.
engSearchText:
'Cause she fulfills all the requirements. Plus she seems
timid at first glance, so they'd likely think she'd be
easy to deal with.
jpnChrName: 条件が合ってる上に 一見気弱で与しやすそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
条件が合ってる上に
一見気弱で与しやすそうだからな。

engChrName: She's the perfect decoy.
engSearchText: She's the perfect decoy.
jpnChrName: 囮作戦にはうってつけの人材だ。
jpnSearchText: 囮作戦にはうってつけの人材だ。

engChrName: I'm not sure I love that assessment...but all right. I'll play the part.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure I love that assessment...but all right.
I'll play the part.
jpnChrName: あまり喜べる理由ではないですけど…… 頼まれたからには頑張ります。
jpnSearchText:
あまり喜べる理由ではないですけど……
頼まれたからには頑張ります。

engChrName: Okay, so that takes care of that. Have you figured out how we're gonna catch this asshole?
engSearchText:
Okay, so that takes care of that. Have you figured out
how we're gonna catch this asshole?
jpnChrName: 囮はそれでいいとして、 犯人を追い詰める段取りはどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
囮はそれでいいとして、
犯人を追い詰める段取りはどうすんだ？

engChrName: Yeah. We're gonna need Agnès to...
engSearchText: Yeah. We're gonna need Agnès to...
jpnChrName: ああ、もう一手詰める必要があるだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、もう一手詰める必要があるだろ。

engChrName: ...get a handwriting sample from him.
engSearchText: ...get a handwriting sample from him.
jpnChrName: うまく誘導して筆跡を確保してくれ。
jpnSearchText: うまく誘導して筆跡を確保してくれ。

engChrName: Aha. Then we could compare that to the threat letter. Very clever.
engSearchText:
Aha. Then we could compare that to the threat letter.
Very clever.
jpnChrName: 脅迫状の筆跡と照合するのだな、 それなら確実であろう。
jpnSearchText:
脅迫状の筆跡と照合するのだな、
それなら確実であろう。

engChrName: Let's also record the conversation, just to be safe.
engSearchText: Let's also record the conversation, just to be safe.
jpnChrName: ええ、念のため会話も録音しておきましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、念のため会話も録音しておきましょう。

engChrName: ...record the conversation. That'll be our evidence.
engSearchText: ...record the conversation. That'll be our evidence.
jpnChrName: 会話を録音してくれ、 何かの証拠に使えるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
会話を録音してくれ、
何かの証拠に使えるはずだ。

engChrName: That may not be enough on its own. We may also need to get a handwriting sample from him.
engSearchText:
That may not be enough on its own. We may also
need to get a handwriting sample from him.
jpnChrName: しかしそれだけでは決め手に欠けるかもしれぬ。 なんとか筆跡も確保した方がよいであろう。
jpnSearchText:
しかしそれだけでは決め手に欠けるかもしれぬ。
なんとか筆跡も確保した方がよいであろう。

engChrName: Ah, good point. That would definitely seal the deal.
engSearchText: Ah, good point. That would definitely seal the deal.
jpnChrName: 確かに……その方が確実ですね。
jpnSearchText: 確かに……その方が確実ですね。

engChrName: Understood. I'll do my best.
engSearchText: Understood. I'll do my best.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、なんとかしてみます。
jpnSearchText: 分かりました、なんとかしてみます。

engChrName: Then it's settled. You okay with this plan?
engSearchText: Then it's settled. You okay with this plan?
jpnChrName: じゃあ決まりだな。 あんたもこれでいいよな？
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ決まりだな。
あんたもこれでいいよな？

engChrName: Absolutely!
engSearchText: Absolutely!
jpnChrName: はい、よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: はい、よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: I'm just glad Amalie agreed so readily.
engSearchText: I'm just glad Amalie agreed so readily.
jpnChrName: それにしても、アマーリエさんがあっさり 協力に応じてくれて本当に良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、アマーリエさんがあっさり
協力に応じてくれて本当に良かったです。

engChrName: She was rather indignant when we explained the situation.
engSearchText:
She was rather indignant when we explained
the situation.
jpnChrName: 事情を説明したら結構憤慨してたよね。
jpnSearchText: 事情を説明したら結構憤慨してたよね。

engChrName: She might come off as having a chip on her shoulder, but she has a strong sense of justice.
engSearchText:
She might come off as having a chip on her shoulder,
but she has a strong sense of justice.
jpnChrName: 態度はきついけど正義感が強い子みたいね。
jpnSearchText: 態度はきついけど正義感が強い子みたいね。

engChrName: I can respect that.
engSearchText: I can respect that.
jpnChrName: そういうのは嫌いじゃねえぜ。
jpnSearchText: そういうのは嫌いじゃねえぜ。

engChrName: People are starting to gather.
engSearchText: People are starting to gather.
jpnChrName: ……そろそろ人が集まって来たな。
jpnSearchText: ……そろそろ人が集まって来たな。

engChrName: The culprit may already be present. Keep your eyes peeled.
engSearchText:
The culprit may already be present. Keep your
eyes peeled.
jpnChrName: 既に犯人が来ているかもしれぬ。 しかと観察しよう。
jpnSearchText:
既に犯人が来ているかもしれぬ。
しかと観察しよう。

engChrName: Isn't she an immigrant? She's got some nerve.
engSearchText: Isn't she an immigrant? She's got some nerve.
jpnChrName: あの子移民だよね？ ちょっと生意気じゃない？
jpnSearchText:
あの子移民だよね？
ちょっと生意気じゃない？

engChrName: Who cares about that? She has a lovely singing voice!
engSearchText: Who cares about that? She has a lovely singing voice!
jpnChrName: でも歌はすごく上手いんだな！
jpnSearchText: でも歌はすごく上手いんだな！

engChrName: I can't believe I get to hear such beautiful music on the street. No wonder this place is called the city of art and tradition!
engSearchText:
I can't believe I get to hear such beautiful music on
the street. No wonder this place is called the city of
art and tradition!
jpnChrName: 街頭でこんな素晴らしいものが聞けるとは、 さすが芸術の都というべきか！
jpnSearchText:
街頭でこんな素晴らしいものが聞けるとは、
さすが芸術の都というべきか！

engChrName: So that damn immigrant didn't heed my warning.
engSearchText: So that damn immigrant didn't heed my warning.
jpnChrName: ちっ、忌々しい劣等種め。 俺の警告を無視したな？
jpnSearchText:
ちっ、忌々しい劣等種め。
俺の警告を無視したな？

engChrName: Well, at least I've been able to make good use of this opportunity.
engSearchText:
Well, at least I've been able to make good use of
this opportunity.
jpnChrName: フン、だがこれはこれで好都合だ……
jpnSearchText: フン、だがこれはこれで好都合だ……

engChrName: (That guy has been approaching a lot of people.)
engSearchText: (That guy has been approaching a lot of people.)
jpnChrName: （あの人……さっきから何人かに   話しかけているようですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（あの人……さっきから何人かに
話しかけているようですが……）

engChrName: (And he has a survey in his hand! He must be the one.)
engSearchText:
(And he has a survey in his hand! He must be
the one.)
jpnChrName: （あれはアンケート……！   どうやら間違いないみたいです。）
jpnSearchText:
（あれはアンケート……！
どうやら間違いないみたいです。）

engChrName: (I need to get close without raising his suspicion.)
engSearchText: (I need to get close without raising his suspicion.)
jpnChrName: （目立たないように近くへ行かないと……！）
jpnSearchText: （目立たないように近くへ行かないと……！）

engChrName: That was incredible! You're both amazing singers!
engSearchText: That was incredible! You're both amazing singers!
jpnChrName: すごいです！　私と同い年くらいで こんなにも素晴らしい歌声……！
jpnSearchText:
すごいです！　私と同い年くらいで
こんなにも素晴らしい歌声……！

engChrName: I wish I was half as talented as you!
engSearchText: I wish I was half as talented as you!
jpnChrName: 二人とも本当に素敵……憧れますね！
jpnSearchText: 二人とも本当に素敵……憧れますね！

engChrName: Hello, young lady. Might I have a moment of your time?
engSearchText:
Hello, young lady. Might I have a moment of
your time?
jpnChrName: ──お嬢さん、ちょっといいですか？
jpnSearchText: ──お嬢さん、ちょっといいですか？

engChrName: Umm... Sure. Is something the matter?
engSearchText: Umm... Sure. Is something the matter?
jpnChrName: えっと……どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText: えっと……どうかしましたか？

engChrName: No, not at all. I was just curious about your thoughts on that performance.
engSearchText:
No, not at all. I was just curious about your thoughts
on that performance.
jpnChrName: いや、先ほどのパフォーマンスに随分と 感銘を受けましてね……
jpnSearchText:
いや、先ほどのパフォーマンスに随分と
感銘を受けましてね……

engChrName: Did you enjoy it?
engSearchText: Did you enjoy it?
jpnChrName: お嬢さんもそうなのではと思って 声を掛けた次第です。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんもそうなのではと思って
声を掛けた次第です。

engChrName: Oh, yes, very much so! I thought it was splendid!
engSearchText: Oh, yes, very much so! I thought it was splendid!
jpnChrName: ええ、私もです！ 本当に素晴らしかったです！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、私もです！
本当に素晴らしかったです！

engChrName: Wonderful. I agree wholeheartedly.
engSearchText: Wonderful. I agree wholeheartedly.
jpnChrName: はは、気持ちを共有できたようで 何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
はは、気持ちを共有できたようで
何よりです。

engChrName: Did you know that one of the performers is from the Central East?
engSearchText:
Did you know that one of the performers is from the
Central East?
jpnChrName: ちなみにお一人は 中東出身の方のようですが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにお一人は
中東出身の方のようですが……

engChrName: Umm, yes, I noticed that. They were great, weren't they?
engSearchText:
Umm, yes, I noticed that. They were great,
weren't they?
jpnChrName: ？　それがどうかしましたか？ 素敵な方だったかと。
jpnSearchText:
？　それがどうかしましたか？
素敵な方だったかと。

engChrName: So I was right...
engSearchText: So I was right...

engChrName: Huh? Sorry, I didn't catch that.
engSearchText: Huh? Sorry, I didn't catch that.
jpnChrName: なにか……？
jpnSearchText: なにか……？

engChrName: Oh, think nothing of it. My name is Jacob, by the way. I'm currently running a survey.
engSearchText:
Oh, think nothing of it. My name is Jacob, by
the way. I'm currently running a survey.
jpnChrName: 申し遅れました、私の名前はヤコブ、 実はとあるアンケート調査をしている者で──
jpnSearchText:
申し遅れました、私の名前はヤコブ、
実はとあるアンケート調査をしている者で──

engChrName: It's about racial harmony. Would you mind filling it out?
engSearchText:
It's about racial harmony. Would you mind filling
it out?
jpnChrName: 《移民との融和についての意識調査》に ご協力いただけないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
《移民との融和についての意識調査》に
ご協力いただけないでしょうか？

engChrName: I might not have much power myself, but I want to do everything I can to achieve racial harmony here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
I might not have much power myself, but I want to
do everything I can to achieve racial harmony here
in Calvard.
jpnChrName: 微力ながらカルバードの多民族融和について 力を尽くしたいと思っているのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
微力ながらカルバードの多民族融和について
力を尽くしたいと思っているのですよ。

engChrName: That's an admirable goal.
engSearchText: That's an admirable goal.
jpnChrName: 多民族融和ですか……
jpnSearchText: 多民族融和ですか……

engChrName: Very well. I'd be more than happy to help.
engSearchText: Very well. I'd be more than happy to help.
jpnChrName: そういうことでしたら 喜んで協力させていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことでしたら
喜んで協力させていただきます。

engChrName: (There's nothing particularly suspect about the questions themselves.)
engSearchText:
(There's nothing particularly suspect about the
questions themselves.)
jpnChrName: （質問項目はそれほど   おかしくはないようですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（質問項目はそれほど
おかしくはないようですが……）

engChrName: (But they're asking for way too much personal information.)
engSearchText:
(But they're asking for way too much
personal information.)
jpnChrName: （氏名、職業に家族構成と住所まで……）
jpnSearchText: （氏名、職業に家族構成と住所まで……）

engChrName: (A legitimate survey would never ask for my full name, employer, and address—much less the names of my family members.)
engSearchText:
(A legitimate survey would never ask for my full
name, employer, and address—much less the names
of my family members.)
jpnChrName: （普通のアンケートはそこまで   個人情報を求めないはず……）
jpnSearchText:
（普通のアンケートはそこまで
個人情報を求めないはず……）

engChrName: (I'll just jot down what Van told me to write.)
engSearchText: (I'll just jot down what Van told me to write.)
jpnChrName: （一応事前に用意したダミー情報を   書いておきましょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（一応事前に用意したダミー情報を
書いておきましょう。）

engChrName: Okay. All done.
engSearchText: Okay. All done.
jpnChrName: 終わりました。
jpnSearchText: 終わりました。

engChrName: Thank you for your time. I'll be taking my leave now.
engSearchText: Thank you for your time. I'll be taking my leave now.
jpnChrName: ご協力、感謝いたします。 では私はこれで……
jpnSearchText:
ご協力、感謝いたします。
では私はこれで……

engChrName: Oh, one more thing!
engSearchText: Oh, one more thing!
jpnChrName: あの……ヤコブさん！
jpnSearchText: あの……ヤコブさん！

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: なんでしょう、お嬢さん？
jpnSearchText: なんでしょう、お嬢さん？

engChrName: I just wanted to say I very much enjoyed my conversation with you today!
engSearchText:
I just wanted to say I very much enjoyed my
conversation with you today!
jpnChrName: 今日こんな話ができて とても嬉しかったです！
jpnSearchText:
今日こんな話ができて
とても嬉しかったです！

engChrName: If it's okay, would you mind writing down your number for me?
engSearchText:
If it's okay, would you mind writing down your
number for me?
jpnChrName: 良かったらヤコブさんの連絡先を 教えていただけませんか？
jpnSearchText:
良かったらヤコブさんの連絡先を
教えていただけませんか？

engChrName: You...want my contact information? Whatever for?
engSearchText: You...want my contact information? Whatever for?
jpnChrName: 連絡先、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 連絡先、ですか……

engChrName: Well, you see, I'm interested in the pro-immigration movement, so I'd like to stay in touch, if possible.
engSearchText:
Well, you see, I'm interested in the pro-immigration
movement, so I'd like to stay in touch, if possible.
jpnChrName: 親移民派の活動に興味がありますし、 これからも交流を続けられればと。
jpnSearchText:
親移民派の活動に興味がありますし、
これからも交流を続けられればと。

engChrName: A-Ah, of course. In that case, I'd be all too happy to oblige. One moment.
engSearchText:
A-Ah, of course. In that case, I'd be all too happy
to oblige. One moment.
jpnChrName: え、ええ……ありがたい話です。 では少々お待ちを。
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ……ありがたい話です。
では少々お待ちを。

engChrName: Here you are.
engSearchText: Here you are.
jpnChrName: どうぞお受け取りを。
jpnSearchText: どうぞお受け取りを。

engChrName: I'll take that.
engSearchText: I'll take that.
jpnChrName: ──遠慮なくいただくぜ。
jpnSearchText: ──遠慮なくいただくぜ。

engChrName: Wh-Wha...? Who in the blazes are you?!
engSearchText: Wh-Wha...? Who in the blazes are you?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだ君は！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだ君は！？

engChrName: Just some guy who's on to your bullshit.
engSearchText: Just some guy who's on to your bullshit.
jpnChrName: おっと、騒がない方がいいぜ。
jpnSearchText: おっと、騒がない方がいいぜ。

engChrName: You need permission from the city to run this kinda survey.
engSearchText:
You need permission from the city to run this
kinda survey.
jpnChrName: 公の場でのアンケート調査は 市の許可がいるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
公の場でのアンケート調査は
市の許可がいるはずだ。

engChrName: Did you think you could skip that step?
engSearchText: Did you think you could skip that step?
jpnChrName: ちゃんと取ってるか、許可？
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと取ってるか、許可？

jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: Your silence speaks volumes. Here, let's move this conversation somewhere else—and no, you don't have a choice.
engSearchText:
Your silence speaks volumes. Here, let's move this
conversation somewhere else—and no, you don't have
a choice.
jpnChrName: 込み入った話になりそうだな、 とりあえずひと気がない場所に行こうか？
jpnSearchText:
込み入った話になりそうだな、
とりあえずひと気がない場所に行こうか？

engChrName: Nicely done, Agnès.
engSearchText: Nicely done, Agnès.
jpnChrName: とりあえずお疲れ、アニエス。
jpnSearchText: とりあえずお疲れ、アニエス。

engChrName: Thank you. I'm surprised I pulled it off, to be honest.
engSearchText: Thank you. I'm surprised I pulled it off, to be honest.
jpnChrName: ちゃんとできるか不安でしたが、 上手く行って良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんとできるか不安でしたが、
上手く行って良かったです。

engChrName: Wait, you two know each other?!
engSearchText: Wait, you two know each other?!
jpnChrName: 知り合い……！？
jpnSearchText: 知り合い……！？

engChrName: You were playing me from the start! How dare you lie to me, you damn brat!
engSearchText:
You were playing me from the start! How dare you lie
to me, you damn brat!
jpnChrName: 貴様、最初から私を騙すつもりで──！！
jpnSearchText: 貴様、最初から私を騙すつもりで──！！

engChrName: If this ain't the pot callin' the kettle black, I don't know what is.
engSearchText:
If this ain't the pot callin' the kettle black, I don't
know what is.
jpnChrName: おいおい、それはお互い様だろ？
jpnSearchText: おいおい、それはお互い様だろ？

engChrName: Van ripped Jacob's glasses and beard off.
engSearchText: Van ripped Jacob's glasses and beard off.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはヤコブの眼鏡と髭を剥ぎ取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはヤコブの眼鏡と髭を剥ぎ取った。

engChrName: After all, you're not Jacob—you're Jacobin, the anti-immigration activist!
engSearchText:
After all, you're not Jacob—you're Jacobin, the
anti-immigration activist!
jpnChrName: 反移民活動家のジャコバンさんよ！
jpnSearchText: 反移民活動家のジャコバンさんよ！

engChrName: Wh-Wha...?
engSearchText: Wh-Wha...?
jpnChrName: なッ、な………
jpnSearchText: なッ、な………

engChrName: Don't play dumb with me.
engSearchText: Don't play dumb with me.
jpnChrName: とぼけても無駄だぜ？
jpnSearchText: とぼけても無駄だぜ？

engChrName: We saw you givin' speeches earlier. Time to fess up.
engSearchText: We saw you givin' speeches earlier. Time to fess up.
jpnChrName: 前にアンタが反移民の演説をしていた所を 見かけたことがあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
前にアンタが反移民の演説をしていた所を
見かけたことがあるからな。

engChrName: I suppose there's no point in hiding it, then. Yes, I'm Jacobin.
engSearchText:
I suppose there's no point in hiding it, then. Yes,
I'm Jacobin.
jpnChrName: ……そうだ、 貴様の言う通り俺はジャコバンだ。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだ、
貴様の言う通り俺はジャコバンだ。

engChrName: But what of it?
engSearchText: But what of it?
jpnChrName: だが、それがどうした？
jpnSearchText: だが、それがどうした？

engChrName: Oh, so that's how you're gonna play this.
engSearchText: Oh, so that's how you're gonna play this.
jpnChrName: 開き直んのかよ……
jpnSearchText: 開き直んのかよ……

engChrName: I'll admit that I didn't get permission to hold this survey, but really, who cares about a trivial little rule like that?
engSearchText:
I'll admit that I didn't get permission to hold this
survey, but really, who cares about a trivial little rule
like that?
jpnChrName: たかがアンケートの許可を取ってないことくらい、 どうってことはないだろう！
jpnSearchText:
たかがアンケートの許可を取ってないことくらい、
どうってことはないだろう！

engChrName: ...Jacobin.
engSearchText: ...Jacobin.
jpnChrName: ……ジャコバンさん。
jpnSearchText: ……ジャコバンさん。

engChrName: I apologize for deceiving you.
engSearchText: I apologize for deceiving you.
jpnChrName: 騙したことは悪いと思っています。
jpnSearchText: 騙したことは悪いと思っています。

engChrName: However, what you're doing is both wrong and criminal.
engSearchText:
However, what you're doing is both wrong
and criminal.
jpnChrName: ですが貴方の行為を どうしても見過ごせなかったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ですが貴方の行為を
どうしても見過ごせなかったんです。

engChrName: That's quite the accusation—and I doubt you can back it up. After all, I did receive permission to give my speeches.
engSearchText:
That's quite the accusation—and I doubt you can
back it up. After all, I did receive permission to give
my speeches.
jpnChrName: 俺が何をしたって？ 演説に関しては一応許可を取ってるしな。
jpnSearchText:
俺が何をしたって？
演説に関しては一応許可を取ってるしな。

engChrName: That isn't what I'm referring to—although I don't approve of those, either.
engSearchText:
That isn't what I'm referring to—although I don't
approve of those, either.
jpnChrName: 何の罪もない移民の方たちを敵視して、 ネリーさんに脅迫状を送り付け……
jpnSearchText:
何の罪もない移民の方たちを敵視して、
ネリーさんに脅迫状を送り付け……

engChrName: You've been harassing innocent immigrants, sent a threat letter to Nelly, and tried to pin it on Amalie.
engSearchText:
You've been harassing innocent immigrants, sent a
threat letter to Nelly, and tried to pin it on Amalie.
jpnChrName: あまつさえアマーリエさんの好意を利用して 罪を擦り付けようとしました。
jpnSearchText:
あまつさえアマーリエさんの好意を利用して
罪を擦り付けようとしました。

engChrName: Those are all crimes.
engSearchText: Those are all crimes.
jpnChrName: ──これは立派な犯罪ではないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText: ──これは立派な犯罪ではないでしょうか。

engChrName: Hmph! I haven't the foggiest what you're referring to.
engSearchText: Hmph! I haven't the foggiest what you're referring to.
jpnChrName: ハン、何を言ってるのか まったく心当たりがないな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、何を言ってるのか
まったく心当たりがないな。

engChrName: Back to playin' dumb, are we?
engSearchText: Back to playin' dumb, are we?
jpnChrName: シラを切ろうとしても無駄だぜ？
jpnSearchText: シラを切ろうとしても無駄だぜ？

engChrName: Well, let me enlighten you: here's the threat letter in question.
engSearchText:
Well, let me enlighten you: here's the threat letter
in question.
jpnChrName: これが例の脅迫状だ。
jpnSearchText: これが例の脅迫状だ。

engChrName: So? You have no proof that I wrote it.
engSearchText: So? You have no proof that I wrote it.
jpnChrName: だからどうした？ 俺が書いた証拠でもあるのか？
jpnSearchText:
だからどうした？
俺が書いた証拠でもあるのか？

engChrName: You're about to eat your own words. We got this sheet of paper with all your contact info...
engSearchText:
You're about to eat your own words. We got this
sheet of paper with all your contact info...
jpnChrName: こっちはアンタが書いた連絡先だ。 住所はデタラメだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
こっちはアンタが書いた連絡先だ。
住所はデタラメだろうが……

engChrName: ...which you penned yourself. Dumbass.
engSearchText: ...which you penned yourself. Dumbass.
jpnChrName: 筆跡は本物だ。
jpnSearchText: 筆跡は本物だ。

engChrName: Oho! What a coinkydink! The handwriting's a perfect match.
engSearchText:
Oho! What a coinkydink! The handwriting's a
perfect match.
jpnChrName: おっと、なんて偶然だ！ 二枚の筆跡がまったく同じだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
おっと、なんて偶然だ！
二枚の筆跡がまったく同じだぞ！

engChrName: The cops wouldn't even need to run this through the lab.
engSearchText:
The cops wouldn't even need to run this through
the lab.
jpnChrName: こりゃ警察の鑑識に回す必要すらねえなぁ。
jpnSearchText: こりゃ警察の鑑識に回す必要すらねえなぁ。

engChrName: The jig is up.
engSearchText: The jig is up.
jpnChrName: ジャコバンさんよ、これでも言い逃れすんのか？
jpnSearchText: ジャコバンさんよ、これでも言い逃れすんのか？

engChrName: Ngh...!
engSearchText: Ngh...!

engChrName: Unfortunately for you, it isn't. The cops can't touch me, even if they wanted to.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately for you, it isn't. The cops can't touch
me, even if they wanted to.
jpnChrName: ……言っておくが 俺のことを警察に通報しても無駄だぞ！
jpnSearchText:
……言っておくが
俺のことを警察に通報しても無駄だぞ！

engChrName: I have powerful friends in powerful places—including the very man who sits atop the orbal automobile industry itself!
engSearchText:
I have powerful friends in powerful places—including
the very man who sits atop the orbal automobile
industry itself!
jpnChrName: 俺には導力車業界の重鎮たる、 “あの方”がバックについてるからな！
jpnSearchText:
俺には導力車業界の重鎮たる、
“あの方”がバックについてるからな！

engChrName: (Wait. Does he mean...?)
engSearchText: (Wait. Does he mean...?)
jpnChrName: （導力車業界の“あの方”……？）
jpnSearchText: （導力車業界の“あの方”……？）

engChrName: The police are in his pocket. In fact, he can arrange for them to erase this event from the—
engSearchText:
The police are in his pocket. In fact, he can arrange
for them to erase this event from the—
jpnChrName: 地方警察の案件を揉み消すことなんざ──
jpnSearchText: 地方警察の案件を揉み消すことなんざ──

engChrName: You're the idiot to end all idiots.
engSearchText: You're the idiot to end all idiots.
jpnChrName: はぁ？　警察？  なに言ってんだ？
jpnSearchText: はぁ？　警察？  なに言ってんだ？

engChrName: Did you seriously think we were gonna turn you over to the cops? Hell no.
engSearchText:
Did you seriously think we were gonna turn you over
to the cops? Hell no.
jpnChrName: これからアンタを待ってるのはそんな所じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: これからアンタを待ってるのはそんな所じゃねえ。

engChrName: I'm sendin' you to meet my friends at the Bracer Guild.
engSearchText:
I'm sendin' you to meet my friends at the
Bracer Guild.
jpnChrName: アンタはギルドに突き出す。
jpnSearchText: アンタはギルドに突き出す。

engChrName: They prioritize the safety of the citizens, so I'm sure they aren't gonna take kindly to you writing this threat letter.
engSearchText:
They prioritize the safety of the citizens, so I'm sure
they aren't gonna take kindly to you writing this
threat letter.
jpnChrName: 民間人の保護を最優先にするあいつらのことだ。 こんな脅迫状を出したアンタをどうするか……
jpnSearchText:
民間人の保護を最優先にするあいつらのことだ。
こんな脅迫状を出したアンタをどうするか……

engChrName: Gah...!
engSearchText: Gah...!

engChrName: If you somehow avoid punishment, the bracers'll still have you marked from here on out.
engSearchText:
If you somehow avoid punishment, the bracers'll still
have you marked from here on out.
jpnChrName: 運よく刑事罰を逃れたとしても、 今後はギルドから厳しくマークされるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
運よく刑事罰を逃れたとしても、
今後はギルドから厳しくマークされるだろうな。

engChrName: This can't be happening...
engSearchText: This can't be happening...
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: I'm sendin' you into the loving arms of Heiyue.
engSearchText: I'm sendin' you into the loving arms of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ちょっとした伝手（つて）があってね、 アンタは黒月に突き出す。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとした伝手（つて）があってね、
アンタは黒月に突き出す。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: 黒月だと！？
jpnSearchText: 黒月だと！？

engChrName: They're the most powerful force of immigrants in all of the Republic. I'm sure they'll be all too happy to get their hands on you.
engSearchText:
They're the most powerful force of immigrants in all
of the Republic. I'm sure they'll be all too happy to
get their hands on you.
jpnChrName: ある意味この共和国での移民の最大勢力だ。 反移民派のアンタはさぞかし目障りだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味この共和国での移民の最大勢力だ。
反移民派のアンタはさぞかし目障りだろうな。

engChrName: Nice knowin' you. May Aidios have mercy on your soul and all that.
engSearchText:
Nice knowin' you. May Aidios have mercy on your
soul and all that.
jpnChrName: 一体何をされるやら……ククッ。
jpnSearchText: 一体何をされるやら……ククッ。

engChrName: Eeeeek!
engSearchText: Eeeeek!
jpnChrName: ひぃぃ！！
jpnSearchText: ひぃぃ！！

engChrName: All right, we're done here.
engSearchText: All right, we're done here.
jpnChrName: これで一件落着だな。
jpnSearchText: これで一件落着だな。

engChrName: We'll just make a quick call, and then we'll send you on your way.
engSearchText:
We'll just make a quick call, and then we'll send you
on your way.
jpnChrName: そんじゃま、さっそく先方に連絡を……
jpnSearchText: そんじゃま、さっそく先方に連絡を……

engChrName: Gaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Gaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬッ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐぬぬッ……！

engChrName: You won't catch me alive!
engSearchText: You won't catch me alive!
jpnChrName: 冗談じゃないッ──捕まってたまるか！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>冗談じゃないッ──捕まってたまるか！！

engChrName: You just don't know when to quit, do you?
engSearchText: You just don't know when to quit, do you?
jpnChrName: ったく、つくづく諦めが悪い野郎だ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、つくづく諦めが悪い野郎だ。

engChrName: And where do you think you're going, hmm?
engSearchText: And where do you think you're going, hmm?
jpnChrName: 残念だがどこにも行けはせぬよ。
jpnSearchText: 残念だがどこにも行けはせぬよ。

jpnChrName: なッ！！？
jpnSearchText: なッ！！？

engChrName: Give it up.
engSearchText: Give it up.
jpnChrName: 観念なさい。
jpnSearchText: 観念なさい。

engChrName: We've got the evidence, you moron. Running away isn't gonna save your ass.
engSearchText:
We've got the evidence, you moron. Running away
isn't gonna save your ass.
jpnChrName: つーか証拠は揃ってんだ、逃げても無駄だぜ。
jpnSearchText: つーか証拠は揃ってんだ、逃げても無駄だぜ。

engChrName: Wh-Who in the hell are you?!
engSearchText: Wh-Who in the hell are you?!
jpnChrName: き、貴様らは一体……！？
jpnSearchText: き、貴様らは一体……！？

engChrName: That's not really important.
engSearchText: That's not really important.
jpnChrName: アンタみてえなヤツが覚える必要はねえが、 一応名乗っておくか。
jpnSearchText:
アンタみてえなヤツが覚える必要はねえが、
一応名乗っておくか。

engChrName: All you need to know is we're Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: All you need to know is we're Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは《アークライド解決事務所》、 裏解決屋だ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは《アークライド解決事務所》、
裏解決屋だ。

engChrName: We ain't on the side of justice, but for the right price, we're more than happy to bring down evildoing bastards like you.
engSearchText:
We ain't on the side of justice, but for the right price,
we're more than happy to bring down evildoing
bastards like you.
jpnChrName: 正義の味方じゃねえが―― 依頼があれば悪党退治くらいはお手のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
正義の味方じゃねえが――
依頼があれば悪党退治くらいはお手のモンだ。

engChrName: So you're fixers. Just my luck...
engSearchText: So you're fixers. Just my luck...
jpnChrName: 裏、解決屋……
jpnSearchText: 裏、解決屋……

engChrName: Jacobin was handed over to the guild.
engSearchText: Jacobin was handed over to the guild.
jpnChrName: その後、ジャコバンの身柄を ギルドに引き渡し──
jpnSearchText:
その後、ジャコバンの身柄を
ギルドに引き渡し──

engChrName: Jacobin was handed over to Heiyue.
engSearchText: Jacobin was handed over to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: その後、ジャコバンの身柄を 黒月に引き渡し──
jpnSearchText:
その後、ジャコバンの身柄を
黒月に引き渡し──

engChrName: After that, Van relayed what happened to Nelly and Amalie.
engSearchText:
After that, Van relayed what happened to Nelly
and Amalie.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは宿で待っていたネリーと アマーリエに一連の経緯を報告するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは宿で待っていたネリーと
アマーリエに一連の経緯を報告するのだった。

engChrName: You're Barton, right? We're here about your request.
engSearchText: You're Barton, right? We're here about your request.
jpnChrName: アンタが依頼人のバートンだな？
jpnSearchText: アンタが依頼人のバートンだな？

engChrName: Oh, are you the fixers? Thank goodness you came.
engSearchText: Oh, are you the fixers? Thank goodness you came.
jpnChrName: もしかして裏解決屋の方ですか？ 良かった……本当に来て頂けるとは……
jpnSearchText:
もしかして裏解決屋の方ですか？
良かった……本当に来て頂けるとは……

engChrName: You wanted us to look for someone, correct?
engSearchText: You wanted us to look for someone, correct?
jpnChrName: 依頼は“人探し”でしたね。 どなたをお探しですか？
jpnSearchText:
依頼は“人探し”でしたね。
どなたをお探しですか？

engChrName: Two people, actually. They're tourists.
engSearchText: Two people, actually. They're tourists.
jpnChrName: 僕はこのオラシオンで ツアーガイドをやっていまして。
jpnSearchText:
僕はこのオラシオンで
ツアーガイドをやっていまして。

engChrName: You see, I'm a tour guide, and I was guiding them around the city. I need you to find them.
engSearchText:
You see, I'm a tour guide, and I was guiding them
around the city. I need you to find them.
jpnChrName: 探してほしいのは 引率していた二人の旅行客のことです。
jpnSearchText:
探してほしいのは
引率していた二人の旅行客のことです。

engChrName: Okay, but why call us? This sounds like a job the police or bracers could handle well enough.
engSearchText:
Okay, but why call us? This sounds like a job the
police or bracers could handle well enough.
jpnChrName: 旅行客の迷子ね……それなら警察か 遊撃士に依頼した方がいいんじゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
旅行客の迷子ね……それなら警察か
遊撃士に依頼した方がいいんじゃないかしら？

engChrName: Well, I suppose you're not wrong...
engSearchText: Well, I suppose you're not wrong...
jpnChrName: そうなんですが、その……
jpnSearchText: そうなんですが、その……

engChrName: Lemme guess: you're feeling guilty about something.
engSearchText: Lemme guess: you're feeling guilty about something.
jpnChrName: どうせ後ろめたい事情でもあんだろ？
jpnSearchText: どうせ後ろめたい事情でもあんだろ？

engChrName: There's no way you'd call on a bunch of sketchy characters like us for help otherwise.
engSearchText:
There's no way you'd call on a bunch of sketchy
characters like us for help otherwise.
jpnChrName: でないとこんな胡散臭ぇ 裏解決屋には頼まねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
でないとこんな胡散臭ぇ
裏解決屋には頼まねぇからな。

engChrName: Don't call us sketchy in front of the damn client!
engSearchText: Don't call us sketchy in front of the damn client!
jpnChrName: 胡散臭いは余計だ……！
jpnSearchText: 胡散臭いは余計だ……！

engChrName: Umm... Part of why I came to you is because this is a matter that requires discretion.
engSearchText:
Umm... Part of why I came to you is because this is a
matter that requires discretion.
jpnChrName: えっと、事情があるのは確かでして……
jpnSearchText: えっと、事情があるのは確かでして……

engChrName: I can get into why, but first, could you accept my request?
engSearchText:
I can get into why, but first, could you accept
my request?
jpnChrName: どうか引き受けてもらえないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: どうか引き受けてもらえないでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: I'd like you to search for them if you're able. Could you please accept my request?
engSearchText:
I'd like you to search for them if you're able.
Could you please accept my request?
jpnChrName: 人探しをお願いしたくて…… どうか引き受けてもらえないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
人探しをお願いしたくて……
どうか引き受けてもらえないでしょうか？

engChrName: Jobs like this can take a while.
engSearchText: Jobs like this can take a while.
jpnChrName: 人探しだと場合によっちゃ かなり時間がかかっちまうかもな。
jpnSearchText:
人探しだと場合によっちゃ
かなり時間がかかっちまうかもな。

engChrName: You mind if we come back later?
engSearchText: You mind if we come back later?
jpnChrName: 悪いが後回しでもいいか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いが後回しでもいいか？

engChrName: Well, it's not like I can tell you no...
engSearchText: Well, it's not like I can tell you no...
jpnChrName: お忙しいのであれば 無理にとは言いません……
jpnSearchText:
お忙しいのであれば
無理にとは言いません……

engChrName: Let me know when you finish your business. I'll be waiting here in the meantime.
engSearchText:
Let me know when you finish your business. I'll be
waiting here in the meantime.
jpnChrName: しばらくここで待っているので、 気が変わったらまた来て下さい。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくここで待っているので、
気が変わったらまた来て下さい。

engChrName: Well, if you've got reason to be hush-hush about this, we'll hear you out.
engSearchText:
Well, if you've got reason to be hush-hush about this,
we'll hear you out.
jpnChrName: 事情があるなら俺たちに頼るのは正解だ。 詳しい話を聞かせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
事情があるなら俺たちに頼るのは正解だ。
詳しい話を聞かせてくれ。

engChrName: Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます……！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます……！

engChrName: So allow me to explain. You know about Vashtar Palace, right?
engSearchText:
So allow me to explain. You know about Vashtar
Palace, right?
jpnChrName: ご存じかもしれませんが、 実は先日からオラシオンの象徴とも言える──
jpnSearchText:
ご存じかもしれませんが、
実は先日からオラシオンの象徴とも言える──

engChrName: Well, the other day, it was made off limits to everyone.
engSearchText:
Well, the other day, it was made off limits
to everyone.
jpnChrName: ヴァシュタール宮殿跡が 立ち入り禁止になったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァシュタール宮殿跡が
立ち入り禁止になったんです。

engChrName: Yeah, we know about that already.
engSearchText: Yeah, we know about that already.
jpnChrName: まあ、そうだったな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そうだったな。

engChrName: (And we know the reason why, too...)
engSearchText: (And we know the reason why, too...)
jpnChrName: （それって今回の“ゲーム”が原因で……）
jpnSearchText: （それって今回の“ゲーム”が原因で……）

engChrName: (I suspect the CID is the one who made that order— though I highly doubt they knew all the details when they did so.)
engSearchText:
(I suspect the CID is the one who made that order—
though I highly doubt they knew all the details when
they did so.)
jpnChrName: （恐らく詳細が判明する前から   ＣＩＤが手を回していたのでしょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（恐らく詳細が判明する前から
ＣＩＤが手を回していたのでしょう。）

engChrName: Vashtar Palace is one of the key destinations of the tour, so needless to say, people were bummed when they heard the news.
engSearchText:
Vashtar Palace is one of the key destinations of the
tour, so needless to say, people were bummed when
they heard the news.
jpnChrName: ヴァシュタール宮はツアーの目玉ですからね。 皆さんかなり落ち込んでいました。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァシュタール宮はツアーの目玉ですからね。
皆さんかなり落ち込んでいました。

engChrName: But I also let something else slip last night at dinner.
engSearchText: But I also let something else slip last night at dinner.
jpnChrName: それもあって……昨晩の食事の席で、 うっかり漏らしてしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
それもあって……昨晩の食事の席で、
うっかり漏らしてしまったんです。

engChrName: I mentioned there were rumors of a hidden tunnel that connected the underground ruins to the palace.
engSearchText:
I mentioned there were rumors of a hidden tunnel
that connected the underground ruins to the palace.
jpnChrName: 『噂では地下遺構には宮殿に通じる   隠し通路がある』……と。
jpnSearchText:
『噂では地下遺構には宮殿に通じる
隠し通路がある』……と。

engChrName: But that's not all. One couple pressed me to tell them how to get into the underground ruins.
engSearchText:
But that's not all. One couple pressed me to tell them
how to get into the underground ruins.
jpnChrName: それだけならまだしも、カップルの二人に 遺構への入り方を教えてくれって迫られて……
jpnSearchText:
それだけならまだしも、カップルの二人に
遺構への入り方を教えてくれって迫られて……

engChrName: I know full well how dangerous that place can be, but they, umm...
engSearchText:
I know full well how dangerous that place can be, but
they, umm...
jpnChrName: あそこは危険な場所なので ダメだって分かっていたんですが、その……
jpnSearchText:
あそこは危険な場所なので
ダメだって分かっていたんですが、その……

engChrName: Lemme guess. They slid some mira your way, and you spilled the beans.
engSearchText:
Lemme guess. They slid some mira your way, and you
spilled the beans.
jpnChrName: ミラを握らされて“口が滑った”ってとこか。
jpnSearchText: ミラを握らされて“口が滑った”ってとこか。

engChrName: Y-Yes. It's shameful, I know...
engSearchText: Y-Yes. It's shameful, I know...
jpnChrName: は、はい……
jpnSearchText: は、はい……

engChrName: Shameful doesn't even begin to describe that, my dude.
engSearchText:
Shameful doesn't even begin to describe that,
my dude.
jpnChrName: おいおい、ガイドとしてそれでいいのかよ？
jpnSearchText: おいおい、ガイドとしてそれでいいのかよ？

engChrName: You put their lives in danger.
engSearchText: You put their lives in danger.
jpnChrName: 職業意識が足りないかと。
jpnSearchText: 職業意識が足りないかと。

engChrName: I know...
engSearchText: I know...
jpnChrName: ……おっしゃる通りです。
jpnSearchText: ……おっしゃる通りです。

engChrName: I may have been inebriated last night, but... No, there's no excuse for what I did.
engSearchText:
I may have been inebriated last night, but...
No, there's no excuse for what I did.
jpnChrName: 昨夜はお酒も入っていたとはいえ…… そんなのは言い訳にもなりません。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜はお酒も入っていたとはいえ……
そんなのは言い訳にもなりません。

engChrName: Anyway, fast forward to this morning. After I woke up, I tried checking on that couple, but they were nowhere to be found.
engSearchText:
Anyway, fast forward to this morning. After I woke
up, I tried checking on that couple, but they were
nowhere to be found.
jpnChrName: とにかく、今朝起きたら すでに二人の姿がどこにもなくて。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、今朝起きたら
すでに二人の姿がどこにもなくて。

engChrName: I'm almost certain they went to the underground ruins.
engSearchText:
I'm almost certain they went to the
underground ruins.
jpnChrName: 間違いなく遺構に向かったんだと思います……！
jpnSearchText: 間違いなく遺構に向かったんだと思います……！

engChrName: That's not good...
engSearchText: That's not good...
jpnChrName: それは、かなりまずいんじゃ……
jpnSearchText: それは、かなりまずいんじゃ……

engChrName: I've been beating myself up over this...
engSearchText: I've been beating myself up over this...
jpnChrName: ……今さらですが本当に後悔しています。
jpnSearchText: ……今さらですが本当に後悔しています。

engChrName: I know this won't make up for it, but I'm going to use my own money—including the amount I was given last night—to pay you for this request.
engSearchText:
I know this won't make up for it, but I'm going to use
my own money—including the amount I was given
last night—to pay you for this request.
jpnChrName: 昨晩もらったミラに上乗せする形で 依頼料の方も準備しました。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩もらったミラに上乗せする形で
依頼料の方も準備しました。

engChrName: Please bring them back safely! I'm begging you!
engSearchText: Please bring them back safely! I'm begging you!
jpnChrName: ですのでどうか二人を無事に連れ戻して下さい！
jpnSearchText: ですのでどうか二人を無事に連れ戻して下さい！

engChrName: Don't worry. We've taken the job, so you've got our guarantee that we'll bring 'em back safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. We've taken the job, so you've got our
guarantee that we'll bring 'em back safe and sound.
jpnChrName: ま、引き受けた以上は ちゃんと連れ戻すから安心してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、引き受けた以上は
ちゃんと連れ戻すから安心してくれ。

engChrName: Though you can bet your ass we'll be takin' the cash.
engSearchText: Though you can bet your ass we'll be takin' the cash.
jpnChrName: 貰うモンはきっちり貰うがな。
jpnSearchText: 貰うモンはきっちり貰うがな。

engChrName: Of course! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Of course! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます……！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます……！

engChrName: Now that that's settled, where is the entrance you told them about?
engSearchText:
Now that that's settled, where is the entrance you told
them about?
jpnChrName: して、かの二人に告げた入口は どこなのだ？
jpnSearchText:
して、かの二人に告げた入口は
どこなのだ？

engChrName: I assume you didn't inform them of every entrance point, yes?
engSearchText:
I assume you didn't inform them of every entrance
point, yes?
jpnChrName: よもや全ての場所を教えたわけではあるまい。
jpnSearchText: よもや全ての場所を教えたわけではあるまい。

engChrName: Of course not. Even I don't know where all of them are.
engSearchText:
Of course not. Even I don't know where all of
them are.
jpnChrName: はい、僕も全部 把握しているわけではありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
はい、僕も全部
把握しているわけではありませんから。

engChrName: I told them about two of them.
engSearchText: I told them about two of them.
jpnChrName: 教えたのは２箇所、 北街区の市場付近にある入口と──
jpnSearchText:
教えたのは２箇所、
北街区の市場付近にある入口と──

engChrName: The one near the market in the North District and the one next to the department store in the East District.
engSearchText:
The one near the market in the North District and
the one next to the department store in the
East District.
jpnChrName: 東街区のデパートの隣にある入口です。
jpnSearchText: 東街区のデパートの隣にある入口です。

engChrName: We can easily search both of them on our own.
engSearchText: We can easily search both of them on our own.
jpnChrName: ２箇所でしたら、 わたしたちだけでも捜索できそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
２箇所でしたら、
わたしたちだけでも捜索できそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Though keep in mind, we're running up against the clock here.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Though keep in mind, we're running up
against the clock here.
jpnChrName: ああ、だがこっちも動ける時間が 限られているからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だがこっちも動ける時間が
限られているからな。

engChrName: If we don't think we can finish it in time, we'll pass this one over to the guild. That sound good?
engSearchText:
If we don't think we can finish it in time, we'll pass
this one over to the guild. That sound good?
jpnChrName: 間に合わなさそうな場合はギルドに 任せることになるが、それでいいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
間に合わなさそうな場合はギルドに
任せることになるが、それでいいんだな？

engChrName: Yes, that's fine.
engSearchText: Yes, that's fine.
jpnChrName: ……はい、それでお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ……はい、それでお願いします。

engChrName: I still have tours to conduct, so I'll leave the rest to you all.
engSearchText:
I still have tours to conduct, so I'll leave the rest to
you all.
jpnChrName: 僕はまだ他の観光客の引率があるので、 後は皆さんにお任せします。
jpnSearchText:
僕はまだ他の観光客の引率があるので、
後は皆さんにお任せします。

engChrName: If anything happens, please contact me.
engSearchText: If anything happens, please contact me.
jpnChrName: 何かあったら通信で連絡をください。
jpnSearchText: 何かあったら通信で連絡をください。

engChrName: It just had to be the underground ruins.
engSearchText: It just had to be the underground ruins.
jpnChrName: よりによって地下遺構とはな。
jpnSearchText: よりによって地下遺構とはな。

engChrName: We must do something about this.
engSearchText: We must do something about this.
jpnChrName: 確かにこれは放って置けませんね。
jpnSearchText: 確かにこれは放って置けませんね。

engChrName: I know. Thankfully, they don't have an access key, so there's no way they could've gotten far in.
engSearchText:
I know. Thankfully, they don't have an access key, so
there's no way they could've gotten far in.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーがないから 流石に深くまで潜られることはないが。
jpnSearchText:
アクセスキーがないから
流石に深くまで潜られることはないが。

engChrName: But they ain't out of the woods. There are monsters roamin' near the entrances.
engSearchText:
But they ain't out of the woods. There are monsters
roamin' near the entrances.
jpnChrName: 入口のあたりでも 魔獣がウロチョロしてて十分危険だろ。
jpnSearchText:
入口のあたりでも
魔獣がウロチョロしてて十分危険だろ。

engChrName: True. We should make haste.
engSearchText: True. We should make haste.
jpnChrName: 幸い候補となる入口は２箇所のみ。 手早く捜索するとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
幸い候補となる入口は２箇所のみ。
手早く捜索するとしよう。

engChrName: Should we search the one near the market? That one's closer to the palace.
engSearchText:
Should we search the one near the market? That one's
closer to the palace.
jpnChrName: 宮殿に近い方だと、市場付近の入口でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: 宮殿に近い方だと、市場付近の入口でしょうか？

engChrName: Yeah, we'll hit that one first.
engSearchText: Yeah, we'll hit that one first.
jpnChrName: ああ、このホテルからも近いしな。 先にそっちから調べるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、このホテルからも近いしな。
先にそっちから調べるぞ。

engChrName: Quest Tourist Trouble started!
engSearchText: Quest Tourist Trouble started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【観光客についての相談】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>観光客についての相談<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Halt. This place is off limits.
engSearchText: Halt. This place is off limits.
jpnChrName: 待て、そこは立ち入り禁止だ。
jpnSearchText: 待て、そこは立ち入り禁止だ。

engChrName: (It's a police officer.)
engSearchText: (It's a police officer.)
jpnChrName: （あ、警察の方。）
jpnSearchText: （あ、警察の方。）

engChrName: (Damn. What a pain in the ass.)
engSearchText: (Damn. What a pain in the ass.)
jpnChrName: （チッ、面倒な……）
jpnSearchText: （チッ、面倒な……）

engChrName: Actually, we've got business in there.
engSearchText: Actually, we've got business in there.
jpnChrName: 悪いがこの先にちょいと用があってな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いがこの先にちょいと用があってな。

engChrName: We're—
engSearchText: We're—
jpnChrName: 俺たちは別に怪しいもんじゃねぇ、 疑うようなら──
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは別に怪しいもんじゃねぇ、
疑うようなら──

engChrName: Arkride Solutions, correct?
engSearchText: Arkride Solutions, correct?
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所か。
jpnSearchText: アークライド解決事務所か。

engChrName: You know about us?
engSearchText: You know about us?
jpnChrName: どうして私たちのことを……
jpnSearchText: どうして私たちのことを……

engChrName: Ah! He's from Ikaruga?!
engSearchText: Ah! He's from Ikaruga?!
jpnChrName: 《斑鳩》の！？
jpnSearchText: 《斑鳩》の！？

engChrName: He must be guarding this entrance.
engSearchText: He must be guarding this entrance.
jpnChrName: ここは彼らが確保した入口だったな。
jpnSearchText: ここは彼らが確保した入口だったな。

engChrName: So that was merely a disguise.
engSearchText: So that was merely a disguise.
jpnChrName: 先ほどの警官姿は変装でしたか。
jpnSearchText: 先ほどの警官姿は変装でしたか。

engChrName: Obviously.
engSearchText: Obviously.
jpnChrName: いかにも。
jpnSearchText: いかにも。

engChrName: Damn. You could give a certain phantom thief lady I know a run for her money.
engSearchText:
Damn. You could give a certain phantom thief lady I
know a run for her money.
jpnChrName: どっかの怪盗よりは上手いな。
jpnSearchText: どっかの怪盗よりは上手いな。

engChrName: Shut up!
engSearchText: Shut up!
jpnChrName: 方向性が違うわよ！
jpnSearchText: 方向性が違うわよ！

engChrName: Uhh, I mean... Never mind.
engSearchText: Uhh, I mean... Never mind.
jpnChrName: ……じゃなくて、今は依頼の話ね。
jpnSearchText: ……じゃなくて、今は依頼の話ね。

engChrName: Well, you know who we are, so why not let us through?
engSearchText:
Well, you know who we are, so why not let
us through?
jpnChrName: とにかく、互いに素性を知ってるなら話が早い。 ここを通してもらえないか？
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、互いに素性を知ってるなら話が早い。
ここを通してもらえないか？

engChrName: I suppose we do have a contract with one another, so that should be fine.
engSearchText:
I suppose we do have a contract with one another, so
that should be fine.
jpnChrName: ここは我らが拠点の近く、協力関係にある 貴公らなら通しても構わぬが──
jpnSearchText:
ここは我らが拠点の近く、協力関係にある
貴公らなら通しても構わぬが──

engChrName: However, I'd still like you to state your business first. It's just a formality, you understand.
engSearchText:
However, I'd still like you to state your business first.
It's just a formality, you understand.
jpnChrName: 一応理由を聞こう。
jpnSearchText: 一応理由を聞こう。

engChrName: This is Ikaruga territory. We cannot let you through without a valid reason.
engSearchText:
This is Ikaruga territory. We cannot let you through
without a valid reason.
jpnChrName: ここは我ら《斑鳩》の拠点。 理由もなく通すわけにはいかぬ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは我ら《斑鳩》の拠点。
理由もなく通すわけにはいかぬ。

engChrName: First, state your business.
engSearchText: First, state your business.
jpnChrName: まずは要件を聞こう。
jpnSearchText: まずは要件を聞こう。

engChrName: A pair of tourists may have wandered underground from this entrance.
engSearchText:
A pair of tourists may have wandered underground
from this entrance.
jpnChrName: 実は観光客がこの入口から 地下に迷い込んだかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
実は観光客がこの入口から
地下に迷い込んだかもしれません。

engChrName: We received a request to search for them.
engSearchText: We received a request to search for them.
jpnChrName: 私たちは依頼を受けて その方たちを探しに来たんです。
jpnSearchText:
私たちは依頼を受けて
その方たちを探しに来たんです。

engChrName: Oh? Was this pair composed of a young man and woman, by any chance?
engSearchText:
Oh? Was this pair composed of a young man and
woman, by any chance?
jpnChrName: 観光客……もしや若い男女の二人組か？
jpnSearchText: 観光客……もしや若い男女の二人組か？

engChrName: You've seen them?!
engSearchText: You've seen them?!
jpnChrName: 見かけたんですか！？
jpnSearchText: 見かけたんですか！？

engChrName: Yes. Not too long ago, I told them exactly what I told you—that this area was off limits.
engSearchText:
Yes. Not too long ago, I told them exactly what I told
you—that this area was off limits.
jpnChrName: しばらく前に彼らが遺構に入ろうとした所、 先ほどと同じ変装で追い返した。
jpnSearchText:
しばらく前に彼らが遺構に入ろうとした所、
先ほどと同じ変装で追い返した。

engChrName: I imagine they would've backed off if you were in your disguise.
engSearchText:
I imagine they would've backed off if you were in
your disguise.
jpnChrName: ああ、警察の……
jpnSearchText: ああ、警察の……

engChrName: Yeah, no doubt.
engSearchText: Yeah, no doubt.
jpnChrName: あれで追い返されちゃあ退くしかないわな。
jpnSearchText: あれで追い返されちゃあ退くしかないわな。

engChrName: Soon after, I heard a bit of a ruckus coming from the marketplace.
engSearchText:
Soon after, I heard a bit of a ruckus coming from
the marketplace.
jpnChrName: そのすぐ後に市場の方で ちょっとした騒ぎもあったが……
jpnSearchText:
そのすぐ後に市場の方で
ちょっとした騒ぎもあったが……

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: 騒ぎ？
jpnSearchText: 騒ぎ？

engChrName: Nevertheless, it turned out to be nothing. I doubt it has any bearing on your request.
engSearchText:
Nevertheless, it turned out to be nothing. I doubt it
has any bearing on your request.
jpnChrName: いや、結果は何事もなかった上、 貴公らの目的とも関係はないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや、結果は何事もなかった上、
貴公らの目的とも関係はないだろう。

engChrName: If you say so.
engSearchText: If you say so.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、アンタがそう言うなら。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、アンタがそう言うなら。

engChrName: Well, then. I'd say your business here is concluded.
engSearchText: Well, then. I'd say your business here is concluded.
jpnChrName: どうやら要件は済んだようだ。
jpnSearchText: どうやら要件は済んだようだ。

engChrName: If you will excuse me.
engSearchText: If you will excuse me.
jpnChrName: では、拙者はこれにて。
jpnSearchText: では、拙者はこれにて。

engChrName: He's gone...
engSearchText: He's gone...
jpnChrName: さっきの変装もそうですが、 すごい身のこなしです……
jpnSearchText:
さっきの変装もそうですが、
すごい身のこなしです……

engChrName: If all of the Ikaruga jaegers are on his level, then it's no wonder they're known as the strongest corps in the East.
engSearchText:
If all of the Ikaruga jaegers are on his level, then it's
no wonder they're known as the strongest corps in
the East.
jpnChrName: あの《剣聖》じゃなくてもこのレベルかよ、 東部最強の団は伊達じゃねえな……
jpnSearchText:
あの《剣聖》じゃなくてもこのレベルかよ、
東部最強の団は伊達じゃねえな……

engChrName: We should return to our search. If they were chased away, there's only one place they could have gone.
engSearchText:
We should return to our search. If they were chased
away, there's only one place they could have gone.
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、今は観光客の捜索が先決だ。 ここを去ったとなれば行く先は一つだろう。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、今は観光客の捜索が先決だ。
ここを去ったとなれば行く先は一つだろう。

engChrName: And that is the underground ruins entrance next to the East District's department store.
engSearchText:
And that is the underground ruins entrance next to
the East District's department store.
jpnChrName: 東街区、デパートの隣にある 遺構の入口に向かったと思われます。
jpnSearchText:
東街区、デパートの隣にある
遺構の入口に向かったと思われます。

engChrName: Right. Let's get moving.
engSearchText: Right. Let's get moving.
jpnChrName: ああ、さっさと向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、さっさと向かうぞ。

engChrName: The female tourist rode XEROS back to the surface, and Van's group joined her soon afterward.
engSearchText:
The female tourist rode XEROS back to the surface,
and Van's group joined her soon afterward.
jpnChrName: その後女性の観光客をＸＥＲＯＳに乗せて、 ヴァンたちは地上に戻った。
jpnSearchText:
その後女性の観光客をＸＥＲＯＳに乗せて、
ヴァンたちは地上に戻った。

engChrName: Thank you so much for saving us.
engSearchText: Thank you so much for saving us.
jpnChrName: 助けてくれて、本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: 助けてくれて、本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: Well, we may not've been able to if those airsoft players didn't find you first.
engSearchText:
Well, we may not've been able to if those airsoft
players didn't find you first.
jpnChrName: まあ、アンタを見つけたのは あのサバゲの連中だけどな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アンタを見つけたのは
あのサバゲの連中だけどな。

engChrName: Though they did get an earful from the police after the fact.
engSearchText:
Though they did get an earful from the police after
the fact.
jpnChrName: 連中もあの後、 警察から厳重注意を受けたらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
連中もあの後、
警察から厳重注意を受けたらしいが。

engChrName: Anyway, no more wandering into dangerous places like that. Got it?
engSearchText:
Anyway, no more wandering into dangerous places
like that. Got it?
jpnChrName: とにかく、これに懲りたら もう勝手に危険な場所に入らないことね。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、これに懲りたら
もう勝手に危険な場所に入らないことね。

engChrName: You don't have to tell me twice. I'd rather not die if I can help it.
engSearchText:
You don't have to tell me twice. I'd rather not die if I
can help it.
jpnChrName: ああ、それはもちろん…… じゃないと命がいくつあっても足りねえよ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それはもちろん……
じゃないと命がいくつあっても足りねえよ……

engChrName: Well, I'm glad these two came out unharmed. It's all thanks to you.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm glad these two came out unharmed. It's all
thanks to you.
jpnChrName: 大事にならずに済んでよかったです。 ……本当に皆さんのおかげです。
jpnSearchText:
大事にならずに済んでよかったです。
……本当に皆さんのおかげです。

engChrName: It's a good thing he contacted the bracers, huh? We can always count on them to keep us safe.
engSearchText:
It's a good thing he contacted the bracers, huh?
We can always count on them to keep us safe.
jpnChrName: ガイドさんにも礼を言わないとね、 わざわざ私たちのために遊撃士まで呼んで。
jpnSearchText:
ガイドさんにも礼を言わないとね、
わざわざ私たちのために遊撃士まで呼んで。

engChrName: Sorry, but we aren't bracers.
engSearchText: Sorry, but we aren't bracers.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士じゃねえがな。
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士じゃねえがな。

engChrName: You aren't?
engSearchText: You aren't?
jpnChrName: え？
jpnSearchText: え？

engChrName: Nope. We're Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Nope. We're Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは《アークライド解決事務所》、 裏解決屋だ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは《アークライド解決事務所》、
裏解決屋だ。

engChrName: We ain't allies of justice like the bracers, but if you're in a jam, we'll get you out of it—for the right price, of course.
engSearchText:
We ain't allies of justice like the bracers, but if
you're in a jam, we'll get you out of it—for the right
price, of course.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士のような正義の味方じゃねえが、 報酬次第で込み入った事情がある相談に乗るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士のような正義の味方じゃねえが、
報酬次第で込み入った事情がある相談に乗るぜ。

engChrName: Oh, you're fixers. I had no idea.
engSearchText: Oh, you're fixers. I had no idea.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、そんなものが……
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋、そんなものが……

engChrName: We'll make sure to remember that. I'm looking forward to the day I can send you all a request!
engSearchText:
We'll make sure to remember that. I'm looking
forward to the day I can send you all a request!
jpnChrName: 憶えておくよ、いつかあんたたちに 依頼する日を楽しみに待ってる！
jpnSearchText:
憶えておくよ、いつかあんたたちに
依頼する日を楽しみに待ってる！

engChrName: Umm... Respectfully, I don't think that's something you should be looking forward to.
engSearchText:
Umm... Respectfully, I don't think that's something
you should be looking forward to.
jpnChrName: そんな事態にならない方が一番ですけど……
jpnSearchText: そんな事態にならない方が一番ですけど……

engChrName: Quest Tourist Trouble completed!
engSearchText: Quest Tourist Trouble completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【観光客についての相談】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>観光客についての相談<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Okay, so we need to find the total number of films they're showing here.
engSearchText:
Okay, so we need to find the total number of films
they're showing here.
jpnChrName: この映画館で上映中の映画の数ね……
jpnSearchText: この映画館で上映中の映画の数ね……

engChrName: Let's ask the receptionist. Ready to go in?
engSearchText: Let's ask the receptionist. Ready to go in?
jpnChrName: 受付にでも聞けば分かるだろ。
jpnSearchText: 受付にでも聞けば分かるだろ。

engChrName: I...think it might be best for me to wait out here.
engSearchText: I...think it might be best for me to wait out here.
jpnChrName: そうなんだけど、 入るのはちょっと躊躇うわね……
jpnSearchText:
そうなんだけど、
入るのはちょっと躊躇うわね……

engChrName: Ah, right. You might be recognized in there.
engSearchText: Ah, right. You might be recognized in there.
jpnChrName: ああ、バレるかもしれませんからね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、バレるかもしれませんからね。

engChrName: Nah, I think she'd be fine. She ain't wearin' anything too sexy, so I doubt anyone would connect the dots.
engSearchText:
Nah, I think she'd be fine. She ain't wearin' anything
too sexy, so I doubt anyone would connect the dots.
jpnChrName: もっと露出度が高い服装ならともかく、 今の恰好なら大丈夫じゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
もっと露出度が高い服装ならともかく、
今の恰好なら大丈夫じゃねえか？

engChrName: Excuse me?! Do you seriously think sexy outfits are tied to my identity?!
engSearchText:
Excuse me?! Do you seriously think sexy outfits are
tied to my identity?!
jpnChrName: あたしってどういうイメージなわけ！？
jpnSearchText: あたしってどういうイメージなわけ！？

engChrName: *gasp* Zoe?!
engSearchText: *gasp* Zoe?!
jpnChrName: あら、ゾーイじゃない……！？
jpnSearchText: あら、ゾーイじゃない……！？

engChrName: Oh, I'm sorry. I mistook you for someone else.
engSearchText: Oh, I'm sorry. I mistook you for someone else.
jpnChrName: すまないねぇ、 どうやら見間違いだったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
すまないねぇ、
どうやら見間違いだったみたい。

engChrName: Zoe always dresses in much more revealing outfits.
engSearchText: Zoe always dresses in much more revealing outfits.
jpnChrName: ゾーイの人ならもっと はしたない恰好をしているはずだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ゾーイの人ならもっと
はしたない恰好をしているはずだしねぇ。

engChrName: O-Oh, it's fine. Ahaha...
engSearchText: O-Oh, it's fine. Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あ、あはは…… そうですねぇ、ええ………
jpnSearchText:
あ、あはは……
そうですねぇ、ええ………

engChrName: Do you like movies, ma'am?
engSearchText: Do you like movies, ma'am?
jpnChrName: お婆さん、映画が好きなんですか？
jpnSearchText: お婆さん、映画が好きなんですか？

engChrName: Yes, I do, young lady. I've seen every film that's in the theater right now.
engSearchText:
Yes, I do, young lady. I've seen every film that's in the
theater right now.
jpnChrName: ええまぁ、今この映画館で 公開されている作品は全部観たわよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええまぁ、今この映画館で
公開されている作品は全部観たわよ。

engChrName: Well, that's convenient.
engSearchText: Well, that's convenient.
jpnChrName: へえ、そいつはちょうどよかった。
jpnSearchText: へえ、そいつはちょうどよかった。

engChrName: Could you tell us how many films are presently being screened here?
engSearchText:
Could you tell us how many films are presently being
screened here?
jpnChrName: よろしければ、今ここで上映している 映画の数を教えていただけませんか？
jpnSearchText:
よろしければ、今ここで上映している
映画の数を教えていただけませんか？

engChrName: Of course. They're showing eight films right now.
engSearchText: Of course. They're showing eight films right now.
jpnChrName: 構わないよ。 今上映しているのは８本だねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
構わないよ。
今上映しているのは８本だねぇ。

engChrName: If you haven't seen it, I'd highly recommend Climber's Story, by the way.
engSearchText:
If you haven't seen it, I'd highly recommend
Climber's Story, by the way.
jpnChrName: ちなみにおすすめは 『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』かねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにおすすめは
『ストーリー・オブ・クライマーズ』かねぇ。

engChrName: It's a documentary about mountain climbing. It made me want to try my hand at it.
engSearchText:
It's a documentary about mountain climbing. It made
me want to try my hand at it.
jpnChrName: 登山のドキュメンタリーでねぇ。 こっちまで山に登りたくなってきたよ。
jpnSearchText:
登山のドキュメンタリーでねぇ。
こっちまで山に登りたくなってきたよ。

engChrName: We'll consider watching it. Thank you very much.
engSearchText: We'll consider watching it. Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます。

engChrName: If you decide to try mountain climbing, please do be careful.
engSearchText:
If you decide to try mountain climbing, please do
be careful.
jpnChrName: ですが登山はお体の状態と相談しましょう。
jpnSearchText: ですが登山はお体の状態と相談しましょう。

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you for your concern, dearie.
engSearchText: Heehee. Thank you for your concern, dearie.
jpnChrName: ふふ、心配してくれて有難うねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、心配してくれて有難うねぇ。

engChrName: Now, then. I hope you all enjoy the films here.
engSearchText: Now, then. I hope you all enjoy the films here.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、貴方たちも 存分に映画を楽しんでいっておくれ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、貴方たちも
存分に映画を楽しんでいっておくれ。

engChrName: So there's eight in total. That's more than I had anticipated.
engSearchText:
So there's eight in total. That's more than I
had anticipated.
jpnChrName: ８本か、思ったよりは多いようだ。
jpnSearchText: ８本か、思ったよりは多いようだ。

engChrName: I heard they screen them on rotation.
engSearchText: I heard they screen them on rotation.
jpnChrName: ローテーションで上映してるんでしょう。
jpnSearchText: ローテーションで上映してるんでしょう。

engChrName: Anyway, we have our answer now. She saved us a trip to the receptionist's desk.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we have our answer now. She saved us a trip
to the receptionist's desk.
jpnChrName: とにかくこれでクイズの答えが分かったな。 中に入る手間も省けた。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくこれでクイズの答えが分かったな。
中に入る手間も省けた。

engChrName: Though she caused one of us a fair amount of distress, it seems.
engSearchText:
Though she caused one of us a fair amount of
distress, it seems.
jpnChrName: 若干一名、かなり凹んでるみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText: 若干一名、かなり凹んでるみたいだけど。

engChrName: Urgh... I don't just take on sexy roles...
engSearchText: Urgh... I don't just take on sexy roles...
jpnChrName: 一応、お色気キャラばかりじゃないんだけど……
jpnSearchText: 一応、お色気キャラばかりじゃないんだけど……

engChrName: Let's, uh, leave her be for the time being.
engSearchText: Let's, uh, leave her be for the time being.
jpnChrName: ま……ほっとこう。
jpnSearchText: ま……ほっとこう。

engChrName: Aha! Here's the red tram.
engSearchText: Aha! Here's the red tram.
jpnChrName: 見つけました、赤いトラムです！
jpnSearchText: 見つけました、赤いトラムです！

engChrName: Just like Van said.
engSearchText: Just like Van said.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァンさんの仰った通りでしたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ヴァンさんの仰った通りでしたね。

engChrName: The color really makes it stick out.
engSearchText: The color really makes it stick out.
jpnChrName: ハッ、赤は目立ってていいよな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、赤は目立ってていいよな。

engChrName: Let's get the number before it starts moving.
engSearchText: Let's get the number before it starts moving.
jpnChrName: ──発車する前に、 とっとと管理番号とやらを調べるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──発車する前に、
とっとと管理番号とやらを調べるぞ。

engChrName: Looks like it's 3451.
engSearchText: Looks like it's 3451.
jpnChrName: 番号は──３４５１ですね。
jpnSearchText: 番号は──３４５１ですね。

engChrName: That matches the number FIO recorded.
engSearchText: That matches the number FIO recorded.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯが認識・記録した番号とも一致する。 間違いないね。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯが認識・記録した番号とも一致する。
間違いないね。

engChrName: Phew. Just in the nick of time.
engSearchText: Phew. Just in the nick of time.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……間に合ってよかった。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……間に合ってよかった。

engChrName: Finding that tram was a real hassle.
engSearchText: Finding that tram was a real hassle.
jpnChrName: それにしても、 見つけるのが大変だったわね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
見つけるのが大変だったわね。

engChrName: Surprised that it was, given that it's the only tram in Oración with a red top. Sticks out like a sore thumb.
engSearchText:
Surprised that it was, given that it's the only tram in
Oración with a red top. Sticks out like a sore thumb.
jpnChrName: オラシオンで運行してるトラムの中で 赤いのはあの一両だけだからな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンで運行してるトラムの中で
赤いのはあの一両だけだからな。

engChrName: I wonder why it's the only one with that color.
engSearchText: I wonder why it's the only one with that color.
jpnChrName: どうしてそうなっているのでしょう？
jpnSearchText: どうしてそうなっているのでしょう？

engChrName: There's a story behind that, actually. Decades ago, the painters who were workin' on that tram got mixed up about which color to use.
engSearchText:
There's a story behind that, actually. Decades ago, the
painters who were workin' on that tram got mixed up
about which color to use.
jpnChrName: 何十年前の話だが、最初は手違いで 塗る予定のペンキを取り違えたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
何十年前の話だが、最初は手違いで
塗る予定のペンキを取り違えたらしい。

engChrName: It was scheduled to get a repaint job a few days later, but while it was in operation, a string of miracles was bein' spun.
engSearchText:
It was scheduled to get a repaint job a few days later,
but while it was in operation, a string of miracles was
bein' spun.
jpnChrName: 数日後に塗り直すはずだったが、 その間に生き別れた家族を運んだり──
jpnSearchText:
数日後に塗り直すはずだったが、
その間に生き別れた家族を運んだり──

engChrName: On that very tram, separated families reunited, and quarreling lovers kissed and made up. People were meetin' famous celebrities on it, too.
engSearchText:
On that very tram, separated families reunited, and
quarreling lovers kissed and made up. People were
meetin' famous celebrities on it, too.
jpnChrName: ケンカした恋人が偶然車内で会って仲直りしたり、 有名人を何人も乗せたりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
ケンカした恋人が偶然車内で会って仲直りしたり、
有名人を何人も乗せたりしてな。

engChrName: Soon enough, all the citizens were callin' it the Lucky Red Tram.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, all the citizens were callin' it the Lucky
Red Tram.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか“幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム” と呼ばれるようになっちまった。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか“幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム”
と呼ばれるようになっちまった。

engChrName: That's a cute nickname.
engSearchText: That's a cute nickname.
jpnChrName: 幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム……！
jpnSearchText: 幸運を運ぶ赤いトラム……！

engChrName: Yeah, and it really caught on. It was so popular, the tram company decided to leave the paint job as is.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and it really caught on. It was so popular, the
tram company decided to leave the paint job as is.
jpnChrName: 運営会社はそれを受けて赤いヤツを そのまま残したってわけさ。
jpnSearchText:
運営会社はそれを受けて赤いヤツを
そのまま残したってわけさ。

engChrName: Since then, they've always made sure to have one red-roofed tram in operation.
engSearchText:
Since then, they've always made sure to have one
red-roofed tram in operation.
jpnChrName: それが定着して、オラシオンのトラムには 一両だけ赤く塗るのが伝統になってる。
jpnSearchText:
それが定着して、オラシオンのトラムには
一両だけ赤く塗るのが伝統になってる。

engChrName: What a lovely story.
engSearchText: What a lovely story.
jpnChrName: ロマンチックな話ですね。
jpnSearchText: ロマンチックな話ですね。

engChrName: It was marketing gold that fell right in the tram company's laps. Helped them get a shitton of butts in seats.
engSearchText:
It was marketing gold that fell right in the tram
company's laps. Helped them get a shitton of butts
in seats.
jpnChrName: 運営会社にとってはいい宣伝材料だからな。 どっちかっつーとミラの話だ。
jpnSearchText:
運営会社にとってはいい宣伝材料だからな。
どっちかっつーとミラの話だ。

engChrName: Aaand it's ruined now.
engSearchText: Aaand it's ruined now.
jpnChrName: 情緒がないわねまったく……
jpnSearchText: 情緒がないわねまったく……

engChrName: You're Crema, right? Arkride Solutions, at your service.
engSearchText:
You're Crema, right? Arkride Solutions, at
your service.
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。 アンタが依頼を出したクレマか？
jpnSearchText:
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
アンタが依頼を出したクレマか？

engChrName: Actually, I'm her coworker, Katarina.
engSearchText: Actually, I'm her coworker, Katarina.
jpnChrName: いいえ……私はカタリナです。
jpnSearchText: いいえ……私はカタリナです。

engChrName: Crema couldn't be here due to, umm, personal reasons. I'll be issuing the request in her stead.
engSearchText:
Crema couldn't be here due to, umm,
personal reasons. I'll be issuing the request in
her stead.
jpnChrName: クレマは諸事情でここにはいないので、 代わりに私から依頼させて頂きたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
クレマは諸事情でここにはいないので、
代わりに私から依頼させて頂きたいと思います。

engChrName: Wait, is that allowed?
engSearchText: Wait, is that allowed?
jpnChrName: 代理ですか……！？ こういうのは初めてかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
代理ですか……！？
こういうのは初めてかもしれませんね。

engChrName: It shouldn't be. She could be acting without the original client's consent.
engSearchText:
It shouldn't be. She could be acting without the
original client's consent.
jpnChrName: だが、本人に隠れて“代理”を 名乗る事も出来るよな？
jpnSearchText:
だが、本人に隠れて“代理”を
名乗る事も出来るよな？

engChrName: Always the skeptic.
engSearchText: Always the skeptic.
jpnChrName: 疑り深いわね……
jpnSearchText: 疑り深いわね……

engChrName: But I guess it's best to not be too trusting in this line of work.
engSearchText:
But I guess it's best to not be too trusting in this line
of work.
jpnChrName: でも、それくらいじゃないと 裏解決屋はやっていけないのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
でも、それくらいじゃないと
裏解決屋はやっていけないのかしら。

engChrName: You got that right.
engSearchText: You got that right.
jpnChrName: ああ、依頼主のクレマ巡査は 席を外してるっつう事だったが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、依頼主のクレマ巡査は
席を外してるっつう事だったが……

engChrName: I'm willin' to hear you out, though. Why'd you take her place?
engSearchText:
I'm willin' to hear you out, though. Why'd you take
her place?
jpnChrName: どうしてアンタが代理になったんだ？ 念の為聞かせてもらえるか。
jpnSearchText:
どうしてアンタが代理になったんだ？
念の為聞かせてもらえるか。

engChrName: Allow me to get right to the point. I want to make a different request of you.
engSearchText:
Allow me to get right to the point. I want to make a
different request of you.
jpnChrName: ええ……正確に言えば、代理ではなくて 別口で私から依頼させてほしいのです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……正確に言えば、代理ではなくて
別口で私から依頼させてほしいのです。

engChrName: Please save her. Save Crema from herself.
engSearchText: Please save her. Save Crema from herself.
jpnChrName: どうか私の代わりに── クレマを助けてもらえないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
どうか私の代わりに──
クレマを助けてもらえないでしょうか？

engChrName: Oh, boy. We haven't even started, and I'm already gettin' a migraine.
engSearchText:
Oh, boy. We haven't even started, and I'm already
gettin' a migraine.
jpnChrName: ふむ……なんかややこしい事に なってるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……なんかややこしい事に
なってるみてえだな。

engChrName: All right. Gimme the deets.
engSearchText: All right. Gimme the deets.
jpnChrName: 詳しく聞かせてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText: 詳しく聞かせてもらおうか。

engChrName: It all started a few days ago.
engSearchText: It all started a few days ago.
jpnChrName: 事の始まりは数日前──
jpnSearchText: 事の始まりは数日前──

engChrName: Crema's beloved—a bracer named Ewan— passed away.
engSearchText:
Crema's beloved—a bracer named Ewan—
passed away.
jpnChrName: クレマと付き合っていた 遊撃士のユアンさんが亡くなったんです。
jpnSearchText:
クレマと付き合っていた
遊撃士のユアンさんが亡くなったんです。

engChrName: He was brutally murdered by someone we suspect is connected to or a part of A.
engSearchText:
He was brutally murdered by someone we suspect is
connected to or a part of A.
jpnChrName: それも、《Ａ》と思われる者の手によって 無残に殺される形で……
jpnSearchText:
それも、《Ａ》と思われる者の手によって
無残に殺される形で……

engChrName: Right. We heard about that from the guild.
engSearchText: Right. We heard about that from the guild.
jpnChrName: ギルドでもその話は聞いたけど……
jpnSearchText: ギルドでもその話は聞いたけど……

engChrName: That's...awful.
engSearchText: That's...awful.
jpnChrName: そんな事が…………
jpnSearchText: そんな事が…………

engChrName: I feel so sorry for her.
engSearchText: I feel so sorry for her.
jpnChrName: 辛いでしょうね…… あたし達じゃ想像できない程に。
jpnSearchText:
辛いでしょうね……
あたし達じゃ想像できない程に。

engChrName: A bracer and cop couple? Well, there's something I don't hear every day.
engSearchText:
A bracer and cop couple? Well, there's something I
don't hear every day.
jpnChrName: それにしても、遊撃士と警察が 恋仲っていうのは珍しい話だな。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、遊撃士と警察が
恋仲っていうのは珍しい話だな。

engChrName: Those two organizations aren't exactly on the best of terms in most places.
engSearchText:
Those two organizations aren't exactly on the best of
terms in most places.
jpnChrName: ギルドと警察はある意味 ライバル同士だってのによ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドと警察はある意味
ライバル同士だってのによ。

engChrName: And that's very much the case here. It's why Crema kept her relationship under wraps—at least for those of us at the station.
engSearchText:
And that's very much the case here. It's why Crema
kept her relationship under wraps—at least for those
of us at the station.
jpnChrName: ええ、だからこそクレマは署内の全員に ユアンさんとの事は隠すつもりだったようです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、だからこそクレマは署内の全員に
ユアンさんとの事は隠すつもりだったようです。

engChrName: I hear things were getting serious between the two. They were considering tying the knot, in fact.
engSearchText:
I hear things were getting serious between the two.
They were considering tying the knot, in fact.
jpnChrName: 茶化されたりしたくなかったんでしょうね。 二人は結婚まで考えていたそうですから……
jpnSearchText:
茶化されたりしたくなかったんでしょうね。
二人は結婚まで考えていたそうですから……

engChrName: No wonder she's so determined to gather information on Almata.
engSearchText:
No wonder she's so determined to gather information
on Almata.
jpnChrName: だからこそ……クレマ巡査は 《Ａ》の情報を集めているんですね。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ……クレマ巡査は
《Ａ》の情報を集めているんですね。

engChrName: Yes... Since then, revenge has been the only thing on her mind.
engSearchText:
Yes... Since then, revenge has been the only thing on
her mind.
jpnChrName: ええ……あれから彼女は 復讐ばかり考えているようです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……あれから彼女は
復讐ばかり考えているようです。

engChrName: I've been trying to be there for her. I wanted to help her get through this.
engSearchText:
I've been trying to be there for her. I wanted to help
her get through this.
jpnChrName: 私も友達として力になりたくて、 彼女の事は気にかけていました……
jpnSearchText:
私も友達として力になりたくて、
彼女の事は気にかけていました……

engChrName: But I found out she put up a request on the bulletin board.
engSearchText:
But I found out she put up a request on the
bulletin board.
jpnChrName: その中で、彼女が今日“解決屋”に 依頼を出したという事も知ったのです。
jpnSearchText:
その中で、彼女が今日“解決屋”に
依頼を出したという事も知ったのです。

engChrName: Yeah, but she ain't here for some reason.
engSearchText: Yeah, but she ain't here for some reason.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……そんな状況なら、 尚更この場に依頼主がいない事が気になるが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……そんな状況なら、
尚更この場に依頼主がいない事が気になるが。

engChrName: Right. And I know what that reason is: she started tailing someone on her own.
engSearchText:
Right. And I know what that reason is: she started
tailing someone on her own.
jpnChrName: ええ、彼女はつい先程 何者かを尾行して行ったようなのです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、彼女はつい先程
何者かを尾行して行ったようなのです。

engChrName: Oh, dear.
engSearchText: Oh, dear.
jpnChrName: 尾行ですか……
jpnSearchText: 尾行ですか……

engChrName: I saw her doing that a few minutes ago.
engSearchText: I saw her doing that a few minutes ago.
jpnChrName: 数分前──クレマの様子が心配で 駐在所に立ち寄ったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
数分前──クレマの様子が心配で
駐在所に立ち寄ったのですが。

engChrName: Earlier, I had gone by the station to check on her. She was supposed to be on duty, but I didn't see her there.
engSearchText:
Earlier, I had gone by the station to check on her.
She was supposed to be on duty, but I didn't see
her there.
jpnChrName: この時間に当直になっているはずの クレマの姿はなく……
jpnSearchText:
この時間に当直になっているはずの
クレマの姿はなく……

engChrName: I asked another officer if they knew where she was, and they told me she suddenly took time off.
engSearchText:
I asked another officer if they knew where she was,
and they told me she suddenly took time off.
jpnChrName: 駐在所にいた警官に話を聞くと、 クレマは用事が出来て不在だという事でした。
jpnSearchText:
駐在所にいた警官に話を聞くと、
クレマは用事が出来て不在だという事でした。

engChrName: After that, I started frantically looking for her around the city.
engSearchText:
After that, I started frantically looking for her around
the city.
jpnChrName: 嫌な予感がして辺りを探したら…… 裏手の道路を張り込んでいる彼女の姿がありました。
jpnSearchText:
嫌な予感がして辺りを探したら……
裏手の道路を張り込んでいる彼女の姿がありました。

engChrName: I finally found her in a back alley. She was staring at the entrance of an exchange shop.
engSearchText:
I finally found her in a back alley. She was staring at
the entrance of an exchange shop.
jpnChrName: あの位置からすると、恐らく交換屋の方角を 警戒していたのだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
あの位置からすると、恐らく交換屋の方角を
警戒していたのだと思います。

engChrName: Just as I was thinking about calling out to her, she left her hiding spot and began following someone from a distance.
engSearchText:
Just as I was thinking about calling out to her, she left
her hiding spot and began following someone from
a distance.
jpnChrName: 声をかけようとしましたが…… 丁度彼女が尾行を開始してしまって。
jpnSearchText:
声をかけようとしましたが……
丁度彼女が尾行を開始してしまって。

engChrName: I'm surprised to hear she didn't call it in.
engSearchText: I'm surprised to hear she didn't call it in.
jpnChrName: それが警官としての職務の一環であれば 違和感のない話だがな。
jpnSearchText:
それが警官としての職務の一環であれば
違和感のない話だがな。

engChrName: You and me both. That's what we're supposed to do when we spot someone acting suspicious.
